ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Steve,
You were absolutely right about Boudreaux. Hot damn, can that ghoul make magic in the kitchen! I can't understand most of what he says, but I'm getting the gist of it. The guy can perform miracles with the worst meats, even the bugs. He was made something called Étouffée, and holy shit I almost cried it was so good.
Only downside is that he's a cranky old bastard, on top of the language barrier. You said he was a good friend of Bobby, right? Figures he'd be upset after what went down. Damn shame.
Hope you're doing all right with the business up there with Bodeen. Might make my way up there eventually.
- Ahab
ESP.TRADUIT:
史蒂夫，
你对布德罗的看法是完全正确的。该死，那个食尸鬼会在厨房变魔术吗！他说的话我大部分都听不懂，但我明白了其中的要点。这家伙能用最烂的肉，甚至是虫子，创造奇迹。他制作了一种叫焖煮的东西，我的天，我差点哭出来，太棒了。
唯一的缺点是，除了语言障碍，他还是个脾气暴躁的老混蛋。你说他是鲍比的一个好朋友，对吧？我猜发生了那样的事，他一定很难过。真遗憾。
希望你和博丁的生意进展顺利，也许我最终会成功的。
- 亚哈

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Fowler,
We got the shipment of merchandise last week without any hiccups. A lot of clients are dishing out serious caps for these kids. 80s and the smaller gangs always like fresh recruits to indoctrinate, but the biggest client is that group up at Mount Irish. Something weird about those guys. Seen my share of cults, but something is off. If you've got business up here, keep your distance from that place.
Otherwise, keep them coming. We're growing fast, been poaching muscle from the Vipers, 80s and other gangs. Not much other news from the north. El Reloj and Requin are still active, but that's all past 93, not in my territory.
One last thing - if you have spare manpower, send a crew to scout out the Sheep Range. Pretty sure some of the runaways are organizing a town up there. Need to nip that in the bud before it becomes a problem. Thanks again.
Best, Bodeen
ESP.TRADUIT:
福勒，
我们上周顺利地收到了这批货物，很多客户都为这些孩子出了高价。80号公路帮和其它小帮派总是喜欢新招募些人来教化，但最大的客户是爱尔兰山那边的那群人。那些家伙有点奇怪，我也见过一些邪教，但有些不对劲。如果你要在这里做生意，就离那地方远点。
否则，就让他们来，我们发展很快，一直在从毒蛇帮、80号公路帮和其他帮派那里挖人。北方那边也没什么消息。埃尔雷诺和鲛鲨还在活动，但已经超过93号公路了，不在我的管辖范围内。
最后一件事：如果你有多余的人力，派一组人去侦察牧羊区。我很确定一些逃亡者在那里组建了一个小镇，我们需要在它变成问题之前把它扼杀在萌芽状态。再次感谢。
最好的， - 博丁

ESP.ORIGINAL: Recipes - Blackened Radroach
ESP.TRADUIT: 配方 - 熏制辐射蟑螂

ESP.ORIGINAL: This recipe allows you to make Blackened Radroach.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个食谱可以让你制作熏制辐射蟑螂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: While I'm Away
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在的时候

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Cynthia, here are some notes for while I'm away:
- Don't budge on the no-contact order for Steve and Oliver. They're both good earners, and I don't want their personal animosity causing a rift in the town. Keep the peace best as you can and threaten them in my name if need be. NO POISONING OF STEVE'S ROACHES!
- Crack the whip any time you hear gossip about Nurse Wilkes. It was hard enough to get a medical professional out here, I don't want these whiners undermining her with smartass remarks or hearsay. She came highly recommended. I believe her bedside manner will improve in time.
- Ramsay is not permitted to own slaves of any kind. Do not fall for his charms. We tried it once and it was a disaster. Armfield has threatened to shoot him for "destruction of property" on multiple occasions.
- Tell Armfield if he impregnates another slave that he'll be a slave.
- Cram. Remember that he's special. Don't let him speak at the town hall. He'll babble until the others start bullying him, then he'll get worked up and threaten to unleash that collection of freaks he keeps in the store. Speak softly and don't look him in the eyes for extended periods. He's a brilliant scavenger but he's simply off in the head. Also, be sure to compliment his posters. It helps his self-esteem.
- Tell Todd to keep his singing to a minimum. In his shop, he can do whatever he wants, but singing in public places always causes friction. NO KILLING OF CLIENTS! WE'RE LIVING IN A SOCIETY! Yell if necessary.
- Ensure Pietro pays his full rent. He's constantly inventing excuses, but don't accept them. He's just a cheapskate.
Me and the cousins will be gone for a few weeks for a recruiting drive. There's a group of 80s who are planning to join up. Possibly some tribals, too. Gonna meet them on the road outside Mount Irish. Not too close to that place, hopefully. Let me reiterate - while I'm gone, you are the acting boss. Don't take any shit and use the cattle prod liberally. If anyone crosses you they'll answer to me. I have full faith in you.
- Bodeen
ESP.TRADUIT:
辛西娅，这是我离开期间的一些注意事项：
- 不要在史蒂夫和奥利弗的禁止接触命令上让步。他们都是赚钱的好手，我不希望他们的个人仇恨在镇上造成隔阂。尽你所能维护和平，必要时以我的名义威胁他们。不要毒死史蒂夫家的蟑螂！
- 只要你听到有关威尔克斯护士的闲话，就马上挥鞭子。找个专业医生来已经够难的了，我不想让这些牢骚鬼用自作聪明的言论或道听途说来诋毁她。她得到了强烈的推荐，我相信她对病人的态度会慢慢改善的。
- 拉姆塞不允许拥有任何形式的奴隶。不要被他的魅力所迷惑，我们试过一次，结果是一场灾难。阿姆菲尔德曾多次以“破坏财产”为由威胁要射杀他。
- 告诉阿姆菲尔德，如果他让另一个奴隶怀孕，他就会成为奴隶。
- 午餐肉。记住他是特别的，别让他在市政厅讲话。他会喋喋不休，直到其他人开始欺负他，然后他就会生气，威胁要释放他在店里养的那些怪胎。轻声说话，不要长时间直视他的眼睛。他是一个聪明的拾荒者，但他头脑不正常。另外，一定要称赞他的海报，这有助于维护他的自尊。
- 告诉陶德少唱点歌。在他的店里，他可以做任何他想做的事情，但在公共场所唱歌总是会引起摩擦。禁止杀害客户！我们生活在一个社会！必要时大喊一声。
- 确保彼得罗付足房租。他不断地找借口，但不要接受，他就是个吝啬鬼。
我和表亲们要离开几周去招募新兵，有一群80号公路帮计划加入，可能还有一些部落。在爱尔兰山外的路上和他们汇合，希望离那地方不太近。让我重申一遍，我不在的时候，你是代理老大。不要随便受气，也不要随便用赶牛棒。如果有人挑衅你，我会让他们负责。我对你充满信心。
— 博丁

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dear Thief
ESP.TRADUIT: 亲爱的小偷

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dear Thief,
I can only assume that I've long since passed out of this realm, so permit me to whisper a few humble requests from the grave.
Do whatever you wish with the Legion tender. Few things have boosted my spirits like pilfering the vaults of those skirt-wearing savages, and it would delight my ghost if that coin was used for merriment, feasting and fornication. Defy the Legion by enjoying life's pleasures, I say.
Please deliver the caps (all 5,000) and the reprint of Hygeia to Doctor Tyler at the Mormon Fort. She's a fine physician and a trusted friend, and this windfall should silence her excuses about building the clinic in Westside. Please resist the impulse to indulge in short-term profiteering. You will net a tidy sum from the other oddities in my safe. Please stifle your greed for one moment and assist the one worthwhile faction in this sandy pit.
If by some chance you are my friend, Robert - I hope you and your hounds are healthy, and you are no longer living life in the shadows. You can always start over. Put down the gun. Find Lydia. Learn to love again. Eat your biscuits in peace.
For all others - live long, live free and embrace the beauty of our world. Adieu!
ESP.TRADUIT:
亲爱的小偷，
我只能假设我已经离开这个世界很久了，所以请允许我在坟墓里低声说几句卑微的请求。
你可以随意处置军团投标，没有什么比偷那些穿裙子的野蛮人的金库更能振奋精神的了，如果那枚硬币被用来寻欢作乐，大吃大喝，与人私通，我的鬼魂会感到很高兴的。我的意思是，通过享受生活的乐趣来反抗军团。
请把这些瓶盖(一共5000)和《健康女神》的再版寄给摩门要塞的泰勒医生。她是一位优秀的医生，也是一位值得信赖的朋友，这笔意外之财应该能让她不再为在西区建诊所找借口。请克制住沉溺于短期暴利的冲动，你可以从我保险箱里的其他稀奇古怪的东西里捞到一大笔钱。请暂时抑制你的贪婪，帮助这个鬼沙漠里唯一有价值的派系。
如果你碰巧是我的朋友，罗伯特，我希望你和你的猎犬都很健康，不再生活在阴影中。你可以重新开始，放下枪，找到莉迪亚，学会再次去爱。安静的吃你的饼干。
致所有其他的人，活得长久，活得自由，拥抱我们世界的美丽。告别！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regarding Sam
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于山姆

ESP.ORIGINAL:
&PCName;,
I captured Sam when he tried to steal my favorite painting. My only painting, in fact. A Rembrandt. He killed five of my men before he succumbed to his injuries.
I tortured him for six days. Very strong, even for a mutant. It was an impressive display of willpower. We held a number of extended discussions in that chamber. I was surprised to learn that he had only one friend aside from that mangy coyote - you. That's right. Blinded, flayed and bleeding from every pore, he only claimed you as a trusted compatriot.
On that note, I'm informing you that your friend is dead, along with his coyote. He bequeathed you his house and all his ill-gotten belongings. Passing this message was the least I could do in light of his bravery.
If the mood strikes you, seek me out at Ruby Lake. We'll have a grand old time.
Sincerely, Requin
ESP.TRADUIT:
&PCName;，
山姆想偷我最喜欢的画时被我抓住了。事实上，这是我唯一的一幅画，伦勃朗的作品。他伤重不治之前杀了我的五个人。
我折磨了他六天，即使对变种人来说也很强大，这是一次令人印象深刻的意志力展示。我们在那个会议厅举行了若干次长期讨论，我很惊讶地得知，除了那只脏兮兮的郊狼，他只有一个朋友 - 你。没错，他被弄瞎了，剥了皮，每个毛孔都流着血，他只说你是他信任的同胞。
说到这里，我要通知你，你的朋友死了，还有他的狼。他把他的房子和所有不义之财都留给了你，鉴于他的勇敢，传递这个消息是我能做的最起码的事。
如果你有兴趣，来红宝石湖找我。我们会度过美好的时光。
真诚地， - 鲛鲨

ESP.ORIGINAL: Competiton
ESP.TRADUIT: 竞争者

ESP.ORIGINAL:
A competitor has arrived in town. "Sly Oliver", he calls himself. A puffed-up, preening buffoon of a man, grinning like a chem-addled mutant, offering discounts and gambling to every fool in town!
Gambling? What's gambling compared to the finest food and beer in town?
POSTERS? No one west of the Colorado has this collection of vintage ads, not even Joe Briggs. Oliver has one ugly Enclave poster! People don't even like the Enclave. More importantly, why in the hell is George Washington a dog? It's sub-kitsch, that's what it is.
Atmosphere? People have a great time here. Every day they tell me the roaches are adorable! Oliver calls this place "Roach-infested"! I say it's "Roach-Blessed!" Uppity bastard better not insult Junior to my face.
Oh, and the damn discounts. He's taking a loss right now, I know it. Bastard is probably fresh off some score and can float his charity bar for a while. He can keep the dregs and hobos who don't appreciate a fine establishment. We will perservere!
ESP.TRADUIT:
一个竞争者已经到达了镇上。他自称“滑头奥利弗”。一个趾高气昂，自命清高的小丑，像个嗑嗨了的变种人一样咧着嘴笑，向镇上的每一个傻瓜提供折扣和赌博！
赌博？赌博和镇上最好的食物和啤酒比起来算什么？
海报？科罗拉多以西没有人有这样的古董广告收藏，即使是乔·布里格斯也没有。奥利弗有一张丑陋的英克雷海报！人们甚至不喜欢英克雷。更重要的是，为什么乔治·华盛顿是条狗？这连庸俗的作品都算不上，就是这样。
氛围？人们在这里过得很愉快，每天他们都跟我说蟑螂很可爱！奥利弗说这地方“蟑螂横行”！我觉得是"蟑螂保佑"！傲慢的混蛋，最好别当着我的面侮辱小强。
哦，还有该死的折扣。我知道他现在在承受损失，这混蛋可能是刚从哪里赚了点钱，可以让他的慈善酒吧飘飘然一阵子。他可以留住那些不欣赏高档设施的渣滓和流浪汉，我们会坚持下去的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: MURDER
ESP.TRADUIT: 谋杀

ESP.ORIGINAL:
OLIVER. POISONED. MY. ROACHES.
Foul, unspeakable murder! Bodeen insists it could've been anyone, but I know it was Oliver. That sleazy circus performer can strut around in a pimp suit, acting like he's the emperor of commerce in the canyon, but I see him for what he is - a cold-blooded murderer!
There will be a memorial service held tonight with incense and candles. Cram will provide Cram for attendees. I'm expecting a large turnout. I intend to lead a public procession down main street in order to shame that maniac. OPEN CASKET! Let everyone behold the senseless brutality of Oliver!
I will make a formal appeal to Bodeen after the funeral. I'll invoke Roy Bee's name if I have to! I was here at the beginning! I stood beside Roy against the flies! I've bled for this canyon! Surely my babies are entitled to fair justice. Public hanging would be proportional.
ESP.TRADUIT:
奥利弗。毒死了。我的。蟑螂。
卑鄙的，不可言说的谋杀！博丁坚称可能是任何人，但我知道是奥利弗。那个肮脏的马戏团演员可以穿着皮条客的衣服趾高气扬地走来走去，好像他是峡谷里的商业皇帝，但我看到了他的本质——一个冷血的杀人犯！
今晚将举行一个焚香和蜡烛的追悼会，克拉姆将为参与者提供克拉姆课程，我预计会有很多人来。为了羞辱那个疯子，我打算在大街上组织一场游行。打开棺材！让所有人都见识一下奥利弗的残忍无情！
葬礼结束后我会向博丁提出正式申诉。如果有必要，我会呼唤罗伊·比的名字！我一开始就在这里！我站在罗伊身边抵挡苍蝇！我为这峡谷流过血！我的孩子们当然有权得到公正的审判。公开绞刑将是相称的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No Justice
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有正义

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Bodeen has failed me.
He dismissed my allegations against Oliver, citing "Lack of evidence". Where is the justice in Arrow Canyon?
I remember the days when we had order in this canyon, back when Roy Bee ran this town. Yes, we were an arnarchistic collection of slave-owning raiders, but by God we had a code! Roy was swift with his judgments. Impartial? Not necessarily, but he was decisive!
If Bodeen can't provide justice, then I'll just make my own. It would be a damn shame if Oliver's joint was suddenly hit with a radroach infestation...
ESP.TRADUIT:
博丁辜负了我。
他以“缺乏证据”为由驳回了我对奥利弗的指控，箭头峡谷的正义在哪里？
我还记得罗伊·比统治这个小镇的时候，我们在这个峡谷里过着有秩序的日子。是的，我们是一群无组织的奴隶掠夺者，但上帝保佑，我们有自己的准则！罗伊的判断很迅速，公正？不一定，但他很果断！
如果博丁不能伸张正义，那我就自己伸张正义。如果奥利弗的酒吧突然被蟑螂侵扰，那就太可惜了...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scouting Report: Alamo and Others
ESP.TRADUIT: 侦察报告：阿拉莫和其他

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Alamo is growing. Got a strong-willed sheriff from the look of it. Still have some slaves but they're transitioning over to the law-and-order stuff like Caliente. Could be a problem if they keep growing. Good water source and they're actively mining. Might be worth a look for infiltration.
Went up to Tikaboo Peak since Garth told us there was a camp up there. Whoever was living there is gone now. Had a small settlement started from the look of things, but they all up and left. No signs of struggle or theft, everything was right where they left it. Just some strange burn marks left in the vegetation. Got an uneasy feeling so we left before sundown.
Boss Red-Knife runs Crystal Springs now. Remains to be seen if he's as tough as his father. They're still loyal to the 80s. Collect plenty of tolls and slaves from the roads. Good location.
- Mikey
ESP.TRADUIT:
阿拉莫正在成长，看起来有个意志坚强的治安官。仍然有一些奴隶，但他们正在过渡到像卡连特那样有法律和秩序的地方。如果他们继续成长，可能会出问题。水源很好，而且他们还在积极开采，渗透可能值得一试。
我去了提卡布峰，因为加斯告诉我们那里有个营地。住在那里的人现在已经不在了，本来有一个小定居点开始的样子，但他们都离开了。没有挣扎或盗窃的痕迹，所有东西都在原地，只是在植被上留下了一些奇怪的烧伤痕迹。有一种不安的感觉，所以我们在日落前离开了。
红刀老大现在掌管水晶泉，他是否会像他父亲一样强硬还有待观察。他们仍然效忠于80号公路帮，从公路上收取大量的通行费和奴隶。位置不错。
- 米奇

ESP.ORIGINAL: A New Beginning
ESP.TRADUIT: 崭新的开始

ESP.ORIGINAL:
We are now open for business!
What a turn of events. Ostracized and cursed in Alamo, pushed into the wilds with hardly a cap to my name, and here I am... reborn! This canyon has been slandered for too long - it is not the bug-infested, criminal cesspit as described by glib travellers! No, it is an oasis. A new Eden - or better yet, a new America!
No taxation. No oppressive governments. No goddamn sheriff. Just a growing population of eager, free-spirited patrons with full pockets.
I will make something special here. Those fools at Alamo will rue the day they cast me out of their stinking town. Damn that sheriff and his minions. Vengeance will be mine.
The first step in my long, bloody road to justice - cupcakes. I will hold an open house with free drinks and chocolate cupcakes. Some have mocked this method, but I aver that it has never failed me. Even the most sinister, blood-spattered savage enjoys a cupcake. Yes, the bloody path starts with baked goods and beer. My vision is clear... now I will make it reality!
ESP.TRADUIT:
我们现在开始营业了！
多么大的变化啊，在阿拉莫受到排斥和诅咒，被驱赶到野外，几乎没有瓶盖，我就在这里...重生！这个峡谷已经被诽谤太久了，它不是油嘴滑舌的旅行者所描述的虫子出没、犯罪的粪坑！不，它是一片绿洲，一个新的伊甸园...或者更好，一个新的美国！
没有税收，没有压迫性的政府，没有该死的治安官。只是越来越多的热切的，自由的，口袋鼓鼓的顾客。
我会在这里做一些特别的事情，阿拉莫的那些蠢货会后悔把我赶出他们的臭镇的。该死的治安官和他的爪牙，我会报仇的。
漫长而血腥的正义之路的第一步，纸杯蛋糕。我会举办一个开放招待会，提供免费饮料和巧克力蛋糕。有些人嘲笑这种方法，但我认为它从来没有让我失望过。即使是最邪恶、浑身是血的野蛮人也喜欢吃纸杯蛋糕。是的，血腥之路始于烘焙食品和啤酒，我的眼光很清晰...现在就让它成为现实吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Insulted
ESP.TRADUIT: 侮辱！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The grand opening was a delight for almost everyone. Bodeen delivered a moving speech, Rinn complimented the construction (which he aided - at a cost), and Armfield's slaves danced for our amusement. Even Cram's monotone babbling about preservatives contained an odd kernel of charming factuality. It was perfect - until the roach-hugger spoke.
Steve pointed out minor flaws in my slot machines. Pardon me, I hauled them across miles of arid wasteland. They're going to be a little weathered. Everyone else was pleased with them.
Then he questioned the CO2 content in my beer. He opined that he was, "something of a beer snob" and could "taste the difference". Well, pardon my primitive brew, beermaster McRoach! At least I don't serve FUCKING ROACH MEAT! "Blackened" radroach? He's charring bugs with gunpowder and acting like it's the main course at the Ultra-Luxe! Insanity!
Even those slights were forgiveable - but he crossed the line with his comment on my poster. No, I don't have a hodgepodge of low-budget film posters collected from every beshitted ruin in the wasteland. I have one poster - a pristine testament to the glory of the Enclave. He had the gall to snicker at the majesty of President Washington! I politely informed him that my grandfather served in the Enclave. He asked if my grandfather was a dog, too. It took all my willpower to refrain from stabbing him to death then and there! This will not stand!
Curious thing, roaches. Very tough, but susceptable to poisoning. A little pest control is in order, I think.
ESP.TRADUIT:
盛大的开幕式几乎让每个人都感到高兴。博丁发表了一篇感人的演说，里恩赞扬了这幢建筑(他帮助建造了这幢建筑，并花了钱)，阿姆菲尔德的奴隶们为我们跳舞取乐。就连克拉姆关于防腐剂的单调唠叨也包含着迷人的事实内核。一切都很完美——直到那个拥抱蟑螂的人开口了。
史蒂夫指出了我的老虎机的小缺陷，不好意思，我拖着他们穿过几英里干旱的荒地，它们会有点风化。其他人对它们都很满意。
然后他质疑我啤酒中的二氧化碳含量。他认为自己是“某种程度上的啤酒痴”，能够“品尝出不同”。请原谅我的原始酿造，啤酒大师蟑螂之子！至少我不吃该死的蟑螂肉！熏制辐射蟑螂？他在用火药烤虫子还假装这是超豪华餐厅的主菜！神经病！
即使是这些轻视也是可以原谅的...但他在我的海报上发表的评论越界了。不，我没有从废土上每一处破烂废墟里收集低成本电影海报大杂烩。我有一张海报，是对英克雷荣耀的原始证明。他竟然有脸嘲笑华盛顿总统的威严！我礼貌地告诉他，我祖父曾在英克雷服役，他问我爷爷是不是也是条狗。我用尽了所有的意志力才忍住没有当场刺死他！这是不能容忍的!！
奇怪的东西，蟑螂。非常坚韧，但容易中毒。我认为应该采取一些虫害防治措施了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slander
ESP.TRADUIT: 诽谤！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Steve is mad. Nurse Wilkes should examine him (preferably with her sledgehammer) for signs of insanity. He's publically accused me of "murdering" his roaches.
Murder. Of. Roaches.
And I'm the suspect! Ridiculous!
The mere accusation prompted more than a few guffaws from observers, only fueling his childish tantrum. A child, yes. Surrounded by silly posters, pet bugs and a dwindling number of patrons. He's desperate. It's no surprise that my roach-free business is gaining a greater share of the market.
Later he held a funeral procession for his dead bugs. I once saw a mentally handicapped child hold a service for the charred remains of his pet squirrel. That had more dignity than Steve's cartoonish parade through the streets. It was an insult to this town, and to human decency as a whole. First, it's funerals for roaches. Next there's incest and bestiality. These are dark times for Arrow Canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT:
史蒂夫疯了，威尔克斯护士应该检查他(最好是用她的大锤)，看他是否有精神错乱的迹象。他公开指控我"谋杀"了他的蟑螂。
谋杀。了。蟑螂。
而我就是嫌疑犯！荒谬！
仅仅是这一指控就引起了旁观者的一阵大笑，这只会助长他孩子气的愤怒。是的，一个孩子。周围都是傻乎乎的海报、宠物臭虫和越来越少的顾客，他很绝望。毫无疑问，我的无蟑螂业务正在获得更大的市场份额。
后来，他为死去的虫子举行了葬礼。我曾经见过一个智障儿童为他的宠物松鼠烧焦的尸体举行仪式，这比史蒂夫在街上的卡通游行更有尊严。这是对这个小镇的侮辱，也是对整个人类尊严的侮辱。首先，这是蟑螂的葬礼，接下来是乱伦和兽交。现在是箭头峡谷的黑暗时期。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Update On Kids
ESP.TRADUIT: 孩子们的最新情况

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Boss,
I spoke with that trader who meets with the tribals at Quinn Canyon. He said your kids are healthy and fully invested in the tribal life. As you requested, they have no contact with the outside world and seem to be happy. That little group is pretty well isolated up in those mountains and only a handful of traders make contact with them, much less know they exist. If anything changes I'll let you know.
- Mikey
P.S. The boy is real hellraiser. Must take after his daddy.
ESP.TRADUIT:
老大，
我和那个在奎恩峡谷与部落会面的商人谈过了。他说你的孩子们很健康，并且全身心投入到部落生活中。按照你的要求，他们与外界没有联系，看起来很快乐。那一小群人在山里与世隔绝，只有少数商人与他们有联系，更不用说知道他们的存在了。如果有任何变化，我会告诉你的。
— 米奇
附言：这孩子真是个惹是生非的家伙，肯定是像他爸爸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scouting Report: Conclusion
ESP.TRADUIT: 侦察报告：结论

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Saw Mount Irish from a distance. Had a few caravans coming in and out, looked peaceful at first. Then we watched a boy walk out on a cliff, cut his own tongue off, then jump off without blinking. I'm guessing we meet their slave trader far outside the town for a reason. I couldn't convince the boys to go in for a closer look, so we moved on.
Scout from the 80s said Majors Place has a new Major. Mines are still cranking out metal but they're burning through slaves in the process.
Commercial traffic is picking up out of Ghouldom. They're trading more with St. Thomas. It's still pretty poor, but they're getting more organized. Walls and militia now. Can't confirm, but the Legion may have a presence on the north shore now. Could be a problem.
I did like you asked and did a thorough sweep of the Sheep Range. Weather was rough, lots of snow and poor visibility. Cobb is our best tracker and he didn't find anything. Just an abandoned church and some cabin. If there are any slaves up there, they're scattered and starving. All evidence suggests that San Salvador is a myth.
Went further west to Saddle Mountain. Hills are teeming with Fire Ants. I heard rumors about a new settlement, but I didn't see signs of development.
That concluded the survey. Lost two to Cazadors and one to Fire Ants. Otherwise it went smoothly.
- Mikey
ESP.TRADUIT:
从远处看到了爱尔兰山。有几辆大篷车进进出出，一开始看起来很平静。然后我们看到一个男孩走到悬崖上，割下了自己的舌头，然后眼皮都不眨地跳了下去。我猜我们在镇外遇到他们的奴隶贩子是有原因的。我无法说服孩子们进去仔细看看，所以我们就离开了。
80号公路帮的侦察员说马约尔广场来了一位新的少校，矿山仍在生产金属，但在此过程中，他们正在焚烧奴隶。
食尸鬼镇的商业流量正在回升，他们和圣托马斯的贸易越来越多。它仍然很穷，但他们越来越有组织，现在有了城墙和民兵。还不能确认，但军团现在可能在北岸有据点，可能是个问题。
我照你说的做了，彻底搜查了牧羊场。天气很恶劣，大雪纷飞，能见度很低。柯布是我们最好的追踪者，但他什么都没发现，只有一个废弃的教堂和一间小屋。如果那边有奴隶的话，他们一定也是四散挨饿了。所有的证据都表明圣萨尔瓦多是个神话。
再往西走到马鞍山，山丘上到处都是火蚁。我听到了新的定居点的传闻，但我没有看到任何发展的迹象。
调查至此结束。两人死于猎蜂，一人死于火蚁，除此之外一切都很顺利。
- 米奇

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scouting Report: Moapa
ESP.TRADUIT: 侦察报告：莫阿帕

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The warlord called Delicious is based out of a small compound outside Moapa. They're mostly nomadic, hence the small fort. He's strong, charismatic and determined. The rumors about mass cannibalism are not unfounded. He and his boys haul a giant barbecue pit with them everyone and turn every raid into a massive cookout. I won't lie - it smelled amazing. I swear most of that crew sticks around just to eat his cooking.
His chief rival is King Coffee, who's affiliated with the Vipers. They have a larger compound up by Mormon Peak that supports some primitive agriculture. They're only part-time raiders from the look of them, plenty of women and children running around. Have some slaves that are carrying Armfield's brand.
- Mikey
ESP.TRADUIT:
这个名字叫美味的军阀以莫阿帕外的一个小院落为基地。他们大多是游牧民族，所以堡垒很小。他坚强、有魅力、有决心。关于大规模食人的传言并非毫无根据，他和他的孩子们随身带着一个巨大的烧烤炉，把每次突袭都变成一次大规模的野炊。我不骗你，闻起来很香。我发誓，那伙人大部分都是为了吃他做的菜才留下来的。
他的主要竞争对手是隶属于毒蛇帮的国王咖啡，他们在摩门山顶有一个较大的农场，支持一些原始农业。从外表上看，他们只是兼职的掠夺者，到处都是妇女和儿童。有一些带有阿姆菲尔德烙印的奴隶。
- 米奇

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_GREETING_0000E2DE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to the new clinic! It's a little rough around the edges, but we're already making a big difference here in Westside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到新诊所！虽然有点不顺利，但我们已经给西区带来了很大的改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_GREETING_0000E697_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just can't thank you enough. Bless you... and bless Sam. He wasn't perfect, but he's left a wonderful legacy here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对你感激不尽。祝福你...也祝福山姆。他并不完美，但他在这里留下了美好的遗产。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_GREETING_0000E697_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I can ever help you in any way, please let me know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我能在任何方面帮助你，请告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_GREETING_0000E697_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamDialogue_GREETING_000042A6_1.ogg
NPC : Larch [03000E01] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your kink, baby? Threesomes? Butt stuff? You like a tongue in your ass? I'm down for anything if you got the caps, sugar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么癖好，宝贝？3P？屁屁？你喜欢舌头插屁眼吗？如果你有瓶盖，我什么都愿意做，甜心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felicity Cockburn [03002315] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNMisc_GREETING_00002317_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be here if you change your mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你改变主意了，我就在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felicity Cockburn [03002315] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNMisc_GREETING_00002318_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They sent you, didn't they? Came swooping in from the sky, stealing brahmin! I've seen them! Sweet Jesus on a unicorn, I seen them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们派你来的，不是吗？从天而降，偷走婆罗门牛！我看到他们了！骑在独角兽上的耶稣，我看见他们了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE:
NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue
Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_GREETING_0000231F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_GREETING_00002329_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Singing>
ESP.TRADUIT: <唱歌>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_GREETING_0000EF85_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't get it out of my head!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么也忘不掉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_GREETING_0000EF85_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're watching!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们在看着！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_GREETING_0000EF86_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The child is sharpening his knife to a fine edge. He takes the time to finish before looking up at you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [那孩子正在把刀磨得锋利无比，他慢慢磨完后才抬头看你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: The fuck do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈想干什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_GREETING_0000232A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_GREETING_0000232E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there, friends. You here to help with the food handouts? Some of these little tykes are real hungry... just desperate to get a single morsel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，朋友们。你是来帮忙发放食物的吗？这群小鬼里，有几个真的很饿...就是不顾一切想要吃一口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marvin [0300233E] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFNMisc_GREETING_00002BE8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 能帮你什么忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marvin [0300233E] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFNMisc_GREETING_00002BEE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {CUT}Didn't expect to see you fuckers again. Wait... did you do it? Is Marvin... you know? [He makes a slashing motion across his throat].
ESP.TRADUIT: {CUT}没想到还能再见到你们这帮混蛋。等等...是你干的吗？是马尔文...你知道吗？[他做了一个割喉的动作]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marvin [0300233E] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I can see it in your eyes. He's deader than my stepdad. Burn in hell, Marvin. So, what can I do for you? Chems? Smokes? Knives?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我能从你的眼睛里看出来。他死得比我继父还惨，下地狱吧，马尔文。我能为你做些什么？药？烟？刀？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marvin [0300233E] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {CUT}Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: {CUT}嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marvin [0300233E] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for saving those kids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你救了那些孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anne [03003BB3] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleGhoul02\aaSGFNMisc_GREETING_00003BCB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please keep Patrick safe for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请替我保护好帕特里克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anne [03003BB3] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleGhoul02\aaSGFNMisc_GREETING_00003BCC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're just another lying ol' dirty birdy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只是另一个满嘴谎话的肮脏的家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nurse Wilkes [03006F7D] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult05\aaSGFNMisc_GREETING_00006FC7_1.ogg
NPC : Nurse Wilkes [03006F7D] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_GREETING_00000DCC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_GREETING_00001FCF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's over. Not sure how I feel about all this. Been a while since I had a surge of adrenaline like that... not since I was serving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 结束了，我不确定我对此有何感想。我已经有一段时间没有肾上腺素那样飙升了...自从我服役后就没有了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000D09D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe... maybe Jessica will rest a little easier. If her spirit is around, I suspect she's still cussing Bodeen's corpse. What a woman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许...也许杰西卡能好好休息一下。如果她的灵魂还在附近，我怀疑她还在诅咒博丁的尸体。真是个好女人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000D09D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just... I know he had it coming... but now that it's done... was it right? Was it worth it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是...我知道他是咎由自取...但现在一切都结束了...这样做对吗？值得吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000D09D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd rather not linger here. Grab the stash and we'll divvy it up, then we can go our separate ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还是不要在这里逗留了。把货拿过来，我们分了，然后我们就可以分道扬镳了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000DCBB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You better talk some sense into Lee or he's going to get himself killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好劝劝李，否则他会送命的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000C15A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's finished. I know Lee and I had our differences, but I never meant for him to go out like that. He died standing up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 完成了。我知道我和李有分歧，但我从没想过让他这样离开。他是站着死去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000C461_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not too sure what to make of this, though. Strange feeling. I wouldn't call it peace. No. Just... release. Like I can finally rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我不太确定这是怎么回事，奇怪的感觉。我不会称之为平静，不，只是...释放。好像我终于可以休息了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000C461_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Couldn't have done this without you. Wasn't sure what to think of you back at the outpost, but you sure as hell came through for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有你，这一切都不可能完成。我不知道在前哨该怎么看你，但你确实为我挺身而出了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000C461_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't one for speeches, so I'll end with thank you. Time to get those caps back to Silver Springs. Minus your share, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不擅长演讲，所以最后我要说谢谢，是时候把这些帽子带回银泉了。当然，减去你的那份。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000C461_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn it, Lee. Didn't leave us with any choice. Even with everything that happened... I didn't wish him dead. Damn shame.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可恶，李，我们没得选择。即使发生了那样的事...我不希望他死，太遗憾了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000C762_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for backing me up. You could've gone with Lee just as easily. He was never big on sharing, though. Wise choice on your part.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你支持我，你也可以选择李的。但他从来不喜欢分享，你的选择很明智。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000C762_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Couldn't have done this without you. Wasn't sure what to think of you back at the outpost, but you sure as hell came through for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有你，这一切都不可能完成。我不知道在前哨该怎么看你，但你确实为我挺身而出了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000C762_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't one for speeches, so I'll end with thank you. Time to get those caps back to Silver Springs. Minus your share, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不擅长演讲，所以最后我要说谢谢，是时候把这些帽子带回银泉了。当然，减去你的那份。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000C762_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Won't lie, I was betting that I'd have to throw down with him over the caps. Talking was never my strong suit. Glad you were here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不骗你，我打赌我得和他在瓶盖的事上较量一番。说话从来不是我的强项，很高兴你来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000C763_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe Lee can find some peace out there. Same for you. If you do want to settle down, I'd stay away from Silver Springs. Maybe Goliad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许李可以在那里找到一些平静，你也一样。如果你真的想定居下来，我会远离银泉，也许去戈利亚德。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000C763_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My grandma always liked to quote the bible. She told me, "But let justice roll on like a river, righteousness like a never-failing stream."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我奶奶总是喜欢引用《圣经》。她告诉我：“但愿公正好像潮水滚流，公义好像河水长流。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000C763_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wherever you go... whatever you do... be the river that bears justice. Lift up the oppressed... and drown their oppressors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你走到哪里...无论你做什么...成为承载正义的河流。浮起被压迫的人...淹没压迫者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000C763_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_GREETING_00000DD6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not a good time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000C15C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I must say that this has all gone swimmingly. It has all the makings of a tremendous country song.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得说这一切都进行得很顺利。它具备成为一首伟大的乡村歌曲的所有条件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000C764_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But first there are the pecuniary details. I know we discussed splitting the caps. That was... a prevarication on my part.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但首先是金钱方面的细节。我知道我们讨论过分瓶盖，那是...我的搪塞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000C764_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not a half-measure sort of guy. Nor do I like compromises. It's all or nothing. That's what I learned when my skin melted off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是那种优柔寡断的人，我也不喜欢妥协。要么全有，要么全无，这就是我在皮肤融化后学到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000C764_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rest in peace, Walker. Strange how these things happen. Gunfights, that is. Dime novels and newspapers make them out to be some elaborate dance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安息吧，沃克。奇怪的是这些事情是怎么发生的。枪战，廉价的小说和报纸把它们描绘成某种精心设计的舞蹈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000CA4B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Greeks put it well: "Quick decisions are not safe decisions." This is what Walker wanted, really. Gunsmoke, dust and a lot of dead bad guys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 俗话说得好：“三思而后行。”这就是沃克想要的，真的。硝烟，灰尘，还有很多死去的坏人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000CA4B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me? I want to enjoy my retirement. On that note, it's time to divvy out the caps and go our separate ways. Fifty-fifty?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我？我想享受退休生活。说到这里，是时候把瓶盖分掉，各走各的路了。五五分成？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000CA4B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, you can't let him do this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 求你了，你不能让他这么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jed Phillips [03001CD9] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFN01_GREETING_00002006_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep the fuck back! You hear me? Stay away!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别他妈过来！听到了吗？离远点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bethany Phillips [03001CDA] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult01Default\aaSGFN01_GREETING_00002007_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult04\aaSGFN01_GREETING_0000200A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never mind. I'll be going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了。我先走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_GoodbyeMojave_0000E2DF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_GoodbyeMojave_0000429F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go! Run while you can! They're coming for us all!
ESP.TRADUIT: 走吧！趁你还能跑的时候赶紧跑！他们要来抓我们了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_GoodbyeMojave_00002323_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you see Al... run away as fast as you can!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你看到艾尔...跑得越快越好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_GoodbyeMojave_0000EF80_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glasses! Get those glasses!
ESP.TRADUIT: 眼镜！戴上眼镜！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_GoodbyeMojave_0000EF82_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you do, don't go to the lake!
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你做什么，都不要去湖边！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_GoodbyeMojave_0000EF83_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you in Arizona, Al!
ESP.TRADUIT: 艾尔，亚利桑那见！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_GoodbyeMojave_0000EF84_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_GoodbyeMojave_0000232D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回头见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marvin [0300233E] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFNMisc_GoodbyeMojave_00002BEF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_GoodbyeMojave_00000DCD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_GoodbyeMojave_00000DDE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay out of my way when this starts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 开始的时候别挡我的路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_GoodbyeMojave_0000C166_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult04\aaSGFN01_GoodbyeMojave_0000200E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you are. Got a Pip-Boy, so you can navigate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原来如此。有个哔哔小子，你可以导航。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DD1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He looks you over with a skeptical expression across his face.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他脸上带着怀疑的表情打量着你]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you killed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你杀过人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DD1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here about the job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来找工作的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reconsidered?
ESP.TRADUIT: 重新考虑？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DDF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to discuss the job again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想再讨论一下工作的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Allow me to introduce myself. Patrick Lee - reformed robber, murderer, womanizer and all-around scoundrel, at your service!
ESP.TRADUIT: 请允许我自我介绍。帕特里克·李，改过自新的强盗、杀人犯、好色之徒、全能恶棍，随时为您效劳！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeIntro01_00000DEF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a semi-willing participant in this bloody endeavor. It's a matter of reckoning for both of us, I suppose. Money for me, blood for Walker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我半自愿地参与了这场血腥的行动。我想这对我们俩来说都是一个算账的问题，我要钱，沃克要血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeIntro01_00000DEF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To be clear... if you'd told me a few weeks ago I'd be working alongside Walker... I would've judged you insane. Life is strange.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先说清楚...如果你几周前告诉我，我会和沃克一起工作...我会认为你疯了。生活很奇怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeIntro01_00000DEF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Walker offered me a choice - throw in with him for monetary gain... or catch a bullet. I prefer caps over lead poisoning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃克给了我一个选择，和他一起赚钱...或者接一颗子弹。比起铅中毒，我更喜欢瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeIntro01_00000DF3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Semi-willing participant?
ESP.TRADUIT: 半自愿参与？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ashamed to admit that I wasn't always a taxpaying citizen on the straight and narrow. Yes, I succumbed to temptation and vice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很惭愧地承认，我并非一直是个循规蹈矩的纳税公民。是的，我屈服于诱惑和邪恶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeIntro01_00000DF4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was the folly of youth... well, ghoul youth. I threw in with Bodeen's pack of miscreants for the hope of short-term gain and worldly delights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是年轻人的愚蠢行为...好吧，青年食尸鬼。我加入博丁那帮恶棍的行列只是为了短期的利益和世俗的快乐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeIntro01_00000DF4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and there were delights. Violent delights with violents ends, and I loved... er, I mean... I'm ashamed to admit it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，还有美味。暴力的享受，暴力的结局，我喜欢...呃，我是说...我羞于承认这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeIntro01_00000DF4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All was well until I announced my intention to... retire. The lowly varmints beat me near to death and confiscated my share.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一切都很好，直到我宣布我打算...退休。那些卑鄙的恶棍几乎把我打死，还没收了我的份额。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeIntro01_00000DF4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... after some time I set out to find these men and recover my wages. Walker found me first, so here we are. An enduring partnership.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...过了一段时间，我准备动身去找这些人，要回我的工资。沃克先找到了我，所以我们就在这里，持久的伙伴关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeIntro01_00000DF4_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Again, youthful follies... I was... incarcerated in the Silver Springs jail for a time. Forcefully incarcerated. Very forcefully.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再一次，年轻时的愚蠢行为...我是...被关在银泉监狱一段时间。被强制监禁，非常强力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeIntro01_00000DF5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stubborn bastard tracked me all the way to Valley Wells. That's why we came in from the southwest. He's a determined man, I'll give him that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个顽固的混蛋一路跟踪我到威尔斯谷，所以我们才从西南方向过来。我承认，他是个有决心的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeIntro01_00000DF5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did Walker know you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃克怎么认识你的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He is not my friend. He's... a business partner. A very temporary business partner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不是我的朋友。他是...一个商业伙伴，一个非常临时的商业伙伴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBackg_00000DE6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's your friend?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的朋友是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The prevailing rumor is that Bodeen came from the east, ran with some real bad hombres in the Great Basin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坊间传言说博丁来自东部，在大盆地跟一些真正的坏人混在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBackg_00001708_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want details, talk to Lee. He ran with them for a little while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想知道细节，去问李。他跟着他们混了一会儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about this gang we're after?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说我们要找的这个团伙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Grew up in Truckee, way up in the mountains west of Reno. Cold. Lots of snow. Beautiful, but unforgiving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在特拉基长大，在里诺西边的山上。冷，很多雪，美丽，但无情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBackg_00001709_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Joined up young to get away, did a few years as a grunt, a few more with the rangers. Met a girl in Silver Springs and decided to settle down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 年轻时就参军逃跑了，当了几年步兵，又干了几年游骑兵。在银泉遇到了一个女孩，决定安定下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBackg_00001709_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Worked up there for a while. Pretty good life in hindsight, but all that's gone now. No point dwelling on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那里工作了一段时间。事后看来，生活还不错，但现在一切都没了。没必要纠结于此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBackg_00001709_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are you from, originally?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你原来是哪里人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I failed. That's what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我失败了，事情就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBackg_00001FEE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've been working together for a bit. I'd like to know what happened in Silver Springs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们一起工作有一段时间了，我想知道在银泉发生了什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: One daughter who hates my guts... Hanna. I got Jessica pregnant when we were kids, and that was all she wrote. Spent the next few years deployed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个恨我入骨的女儿...汉娜。我们小时候我让杰西卡怀孕了，她就写了这么多，在接下来的几年里一直在服役。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBackg_0000690A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was a shit father from the start. Missed her childhood in the service, then mostly worked nights once I was sworn in as sheriff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从一开始就是个糟糕的父亲。怀念她服役时的童年，宣誓就任治安官后，大部分时间都在晚上工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBackg_0000690A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hannah was a strong-willed girl, definitely didn't mince words in our many arguments. She ran off with a dumb farm boy when they were sixteen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 汉娜是一个意志坚强的女孩，在我们的多次争吵中，她从不拐弯抹角。十六岁的时候，她和一个乡下傻小子私奔了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBackg_0000690A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jessica kept in touch with her. Last I heard she had one boy and another on the way. They live near Goliad, doing real well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰西卡和她保持着联系。上次我听说她生了一个男孩，还有一个即将出生。他们住在戈利亚德附近，过得很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBackg_0000690A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any other family?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还有其他家人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was a family man, believe it or not. Lived a quiet, tranquil life while I studied with the Followers. This was prior to my epidermal misfortunes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是个顾家的男人，信不信由你。在我和追随者们一起学习的时候过着平静而宁静的生活。在我的表皮不幸之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_000016FA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: History was my passion, along with all manner of letters. My wife was a fellow academic... a great intellect. We were utterly devoted to each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 历史是我的爱好，还有各种各样的信件。我的妻子是一位学者...非常有智慧，我们全心全意地爱着彼此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_000016FA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Followers dispatched me to an archeological dig. I was accidently exposed to a lethal dose... what should have been a lethal dose of radiation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天启追随者派我去考古发掘。我不小心接触到了致命的辐射...这本该是致命剂量的辐射。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_000016FA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I returned to my loving spouse in this condition. She promptly divorced me and remarried a colleague. Later, I pushed them both down a well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这种情况下，我回到了我亲爱的妻子身边。她很快就和我离婚了，改嫁给了一位同事。后来，我把他们俩都推下了井。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_000016FA_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you do before your time as an outlaw?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你成为亡命之徒之前你是做什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The world over... well, the world west of the Rio Grande. I'd love nothing more than to see the plains. Legion is a stickler for rules, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 世界各地...格兰德河以西的世界。我最喜欢的就是看平原，然而，军团坚守规则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_00001701_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of my travels and travails have been confined to the Great Basin. It's a wild place, littered with strange towns and petty kingdoms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的大部分旅行和艰辛都仅限于大盆地。这是一个荒凉的地方，遍布着陌生的城镇和小王国。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_00001701_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Much is made of the 80s. They're certainly dangerous to hapless damsels and witless caravaneers. I am neither. This is also why I stayed in gangs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很多都从属于80号公路帮。对于不幸的少女和无知的商队商人来说，它们无疑是危险的。我两者都不是，这也是我留在帮派的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_00001701_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, they're often uneducated brutes, but there is... correction, there was mutual respect in the most Neolithic sense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，他们往往是没有受过教育的野蛮人，但也有...更正一下，是新石器时代意义上的相互尊重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_00001701_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid things took a treacherous turn for the Bodeen Gang, hence my pursuit. Yes, there will be a reckoning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我担心博丁团伙的情况发生了变化，所以我才来追捕他们。是的，将会有清算。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_00001701_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where have you travelled?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去过哪些地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Interesting as in... homicidal? If so, then yes in the utmost. Conversation with killers is always more engaging, I've found.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣的...杀人？如果是的话，那是绝对的。我发现，与杀手交谈总是更有吸引力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_00001706_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mutual respect. Colorful anecdotes. The underlying threat of violence. Oh, it's titillating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相互尊重。丰富多彩的轶事，潜在的暴力威胁。噢，太刺激了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_00001706_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was El Reloj. Smooth... cold... like a reptile, but clearly haunted by something. Commanded great respect. Excellent Spanish, rare up there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有埃尔雷诺，圆滑...冷酷...就像爬行动物，但显然被什么困扰着。赢得了极大的尊重，西班牙语很棒，很少见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I did meet the mutant Ares while I journeyed in Old Mexico. Utterly charismatic. Good command of mythology, obviously.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我在旧墨西哥旅行的时候见过变种人阿瑞斯，非常有魅力。很明显，他精通神话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_00001706_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not always pleasant. Take Requin. Saw him cut out a living captive's heart and eat it in front of his men. Laughed the whole time. A demon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这并不总是令人愉快的。以鲛鲨为例，我看见他在部下面前挖出一个俘虏的心脏吃了，整个过程都在笑。一个恶魔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_00001706_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, there were others. Many others. There was one, though... well... a subject for another day, perhaps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，还有其他人，还有很多。倒是有一个...嗯...也许这个话题改天再谈吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_00001706_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Met any interesting people in your travels?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在旅行中遇到有趣的人了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, yes. Bodeen the brute. Bodeen the snake. A cold-blooded, fork-tongued beast if there ever was one. No higher intellect, just low cunning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，可以。博丁这个畜生，卑劣的博丁，一个冷血，舌头分叉的野兽。没有更高的智慧，只有低级的狡猾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_0000170A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Adept with the gun, make no mistake. A pistolero on par with Walker and the other storied trigger-pullers of the wastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 枪法娴熟，别犯错。一个和沃克以及其他著名的废土枪手齐名的神射手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_0000170A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But in the end... just a thug. A backwards step in evolution, made flesh. Homo Retro, if you will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但最后...就是个暴徒。进化的倒退，制造了血肉，如果你愿意，可以称之为“复古人类”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_0000170A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and he's good with knives, blunt items, all the implements of the cave-dweller. He beat animals. He beat people. He even beat rocks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，他还擅长使用刀和钝器，所有穴居人的工具。他打动物，他打人，他甚至还打石头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_0000170A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was married to some tribal for a bit. Savage cunny, no doubt. Got a few kids out of her before she went to the great sweat lodge in the sky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他和某个部落民结过婚，毫无疑问的野蛮人。在她去天上的大汗屋之前从她那里得到了几个孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_0000170A_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Bodeen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说博丁吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: More? Certainly. He's a hideous specimen, sports a mammal on his face that doubles as a moustache. It's utterly repulsive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有？当然有。他是个丑陋的标本，脸上长着哺乳动物的胡子。这完全令人反感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_0000A269_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Always wears a unique duster, supposedly collected it from a Desert Ranger some time in the past. Many rumors about how that transpired.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总是穿着一件独特的罩衫，据说是过去某个时候从一个沙漠游骑兵那里弄来的。关于这件事是怎么发生的有很多谣言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_0000A269_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Story goes that prior to the Unification Treaty, one of the oldest hands in the rangers went after Bodeen. Name of... McCall, that's it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说在统一条约签订之前，游骑兵中最老的一个家伙盯上了博丁。名字叫...麦考尔，就是这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_0000A269_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: McCall tracked him deep into 80s territory. Too deep. Got bushwhacked by Bodeen and a band of 80s. Put up a hell of a fight, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 麦考尔追踪到了80号公路帮的地盘。太深入了，被博丁和一群80号公路帮的人偷袭了。但他还是激烈的打了一架。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_0000A269_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bodeen has a funny gait when he shambles around, caveman that he is. Rumor is that he's carrying one of McCall's slugs in his thigh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 博丁走路的样子很滑稽，他是个穴居人。有传言说他的大腿里有一颗麦考尔的子弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_0000A269_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything else you can tell me about Bodeen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么关于博丁的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A trifling pittance. No, that won't do. Rest assured I'm not going through all this for five percent. For that matter, neither should you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一点小钱，不，那也不是。你放心，我不会为了百分之五而经历这些的。就这点而言，你也不应该。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBackgrou_0000554C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Walker mentioned you'd be getting a share of the recovered assets. Mind if I ask how much?
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃克说你会分到被追回资产的一部分。介意我问一下多少钱吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, Larch. Lord of the trash cans and rats, that one. Smelly beast who came up with that illustrious band of outlaws, the Jackals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，拉尔奇。垃圾桶和老鼠之王，就是他，臭气熏天的野兽，他造就了那群杰出的亡命之徒，豺狼帮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00000DF6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He refused to conduct even the most basic hygiene... utterly intolerable. Even in the bush, where we all stunk... his stench shone through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他连最基本的卫生都不肯做，完全无法忍受。即使是在我们都发臭的灌木丛里...他的恶臭也能透出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00000DF6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You get me near some Jackals... and I reckon I can track his smell. Yes, I'm sure of it. Lead on, brave hero! We follow in your wake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你让我接近豺狼帮...我估计我能追踪到他的气味。是的，我敢肯定，前进吧，勇敢的英雄！我们跟随你的脚步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the first target?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我第一个目标是什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Terry Clinton, the gun nut. An arms dealer and smuggler. Supposedly even armed some of the 80s up north. Had a keen mind for business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 特里·克林顿，枪迷。一个军火商和走私者，据说甚至武装了北方的一些80号公路帮的人。有敏锐的商业头脑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00000E2B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He also had a keen nose for chems. A shame, really. Could've done something productive in the private sector. Well, so could I. But that's boring.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他对化学药品也有敏锐的嗅觉。真的很遗憾，本来可以在私营部门做点有成效的事。嗯，我也想，但那太无聊了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00000E2B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clinton had a deviant brother in the prison out here. Talked about meeting up with him, ripping off caravans once we finished the bank job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克林顿有个不正常的兄弟在监狱里。说过要和他汇合，等我们完成银行的任务，就去抢劫商队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00000E2B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I imagine if we traced the caravan routes we could get a lead on them... or they could be waiting to ambush us. The Fates can be cruel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想如果我们追踪商队的路线，应该能找到他们的线索...或者他们可能在等着伏击我们。命运有时是残酷的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00000E2B_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Walker said we're after someone named Clinton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃克说我们在找一个叫克林顿的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The sharpshooter extraordinaire! A veritable Mozart with the rifle, minus the scatological fixation. Oh, that's relevant for you, Walker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非凡的神枪手！一个拿着步枪的莫扎特，除去他的粪便癖。哦，这跟你有关系，沃克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00001417_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Lick me in the ass!" Relax, I was just quoting Mozart! I digress. Oh, Phillips. Yeah, he's got a singular obsession that exceeds all others.
ESP.TRADUIT: “舔我的屁股！”别紧张，我只是在引用莫扎特的作品！我跑题了。哦，菲利普斯，是啊，他有一种超乎常人的痴迷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00001417_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deathclaws. Hunting them and collecting trophies. Man lives for it, year-round. So... know any places teeming with the beasts?
ESP.TRADUIT: 死亡爪。猎杀它们，收集战利品，这人一年到头都在为它而活。所以...你知道什么地方有很多野兽出没吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00001417_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Jed Phillips?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于杰德·菲利普斯你知道些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, yes. The great hero of the NCR military! The undisputed master of stolen valor. He's Alexander reborn... well, according to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，是的。NCR军队的伟大英雄！无可争议的偷来的勇气的主人。他是转世的亚历山大...嗯，据他说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00001FF6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mason's purported exploits include single-handedly disemboweling an entire force of Legion scouts... with a spear in his thigh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 梅森所谓的功绩包括以一己之力将整个军团斥候部队开膛破肚...大腿上还插着长矛！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00001FF6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As it happens... I managed to dig into his actual records thanks to a liaison with an admin clerk in Reno. His service record is... undistinguished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 巧的是...多亏了我和里诺的一个行政职员的联系，我才查到了他的真实记录。他的服役记录...平平无奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00001FF6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He received an administrative discharge shortly after arriving at his unit. Multiple instances of non-judicial punishment for malingering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他到部队后不久就被行政开除，多次因弄虚作假受到非司法处罚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00001FF6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: According to one statement... he ate cigarettes and gargled his own urine to fake illness. He also developed an appetite for Psycho.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据一种说法...他靠吃香烟和用自己的尿液漱口来装病。他还喜欢疯狂药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00001FF6_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He often moonlights as a guard for Crimson Caravan. All we need to do is draw him out off the compound. I'm sure you'll think of something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他经常兼职做深红商队的警卫，我们要做的就是把他引出来。我相信你会想出办法的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00001FF6_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Walker said we're after a guy named Mason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃克说我们在找一个叫梅森的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, this will be good. King of the perverts! Easy to find. Anywhere there's a great mass of diddlers, fiddlers and other deviants. He'll be there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这太好了。变态之王！很容易找到。任何地方都有大量的游手好闲者、诈骗者和其他异类。他都会在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_0000202D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or more accurately, we should look for his minion, Marvin. That really rolls of the tongue. Minion Marvin. Anyway, he's the key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者更准确地说，我们应该去找他的走狗，马尔文。这句话真的很拗口，走狗马尔文。总之，他是关键。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_0000202D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While I'm not suggesting you indulge in such indiscretions, I'm sure you know where such vermin congregate. Lead on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我不是建议你沉溺于这种不检点的行为，但我相信你知道这种害虫的聚集地。领路！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_0000202D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fowler?
ESP.TRADUIT: 福勒？

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Guy" in the loosest sense of the word... a mutant. Not just a mutant, but a Nightkin, so the most... extra sort of mutant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最宽泛意义上的“家伙”...变种人。不只是变种人，还是夜行族，所以是最...特别的变种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00003BE0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A little conflicted about this one. We had something of a friendship, being the only freaks in the bunch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个有点矛盾。我们有些交情，因为我们都是这群人中的怪胎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00003BE0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not to mention he's surpisingly well-read on art history. Utterly obsessed with Rubens. Must like 'em thick. No judgment here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 更何况他对艺术史的研究出乎意料地深入，对鲁本斯非常着迷。他一定很喜欢鲁本斯的画，这里不做评判。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00003BE0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's only mildly paranoid, which makes him a social butterfly by Nightkin standards. I'd wager he's up in that mountain town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他只是有点偏执狂，这让他成为了夜行族的社交达人。我打赌他在山上的小镇里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00003BE0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The trick will be enticing him outside. My suggestion? Pose as an art dealer. Convince him that you have a Rubens. Say... Two Satyrs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关键是要把他引出来。我的建议是？假扮成艺术品经销商。让他相信你有鲁本斯的画，就说...《两个沙特尔》。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00003BE0_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Walker mentioned a guy named Sam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃克提到一个叫山姆的家伙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah... about him. Some distance from here. Won't be alone. Has a passel of gunmen, raiders and other refuse at his shanty town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊...关于他。离这里有点距离，不会是一个人，他的棚户区里有一群枪手、掠夺者和其他垃圾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00004B82_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These rural, inbred types always seem to congregate in the worst mountain hovels. I suspect his clan is no different.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些农村的近亲繁殖的家伙似乎总是聚集在最糟糕的山间小屋。我猜他的家族也不例外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00004B82_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Arrow Canyon, that's the place. He intends to set himself up as another petty warlord between here and Coyote Springs. Means to raid the 93, I wager.
ESP.TRADUIT: 箭头峡谷，就是那个地方，他打算把自己打造成从这里到郊狼泉的另一个小军阀。我敢打赌，他打算突袭93号公路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00004B82_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know, uh... the general area. I reckon we can find it without a hitch. Meet us up at the Northern Passage and we'll begin our grand expedition.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道，呃...大致区域，我想我们能毫不费力的找到。在北部通道与我们汇合，开始我们的远征。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeTargetIn_00004B82_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're finally down to Bodeen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们终于来到了博丁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clinton, the smuggler. Lee can fill you in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克林顿，那个走私贩。李会告诉你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerProgr_00000E20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's next?
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一个是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could be them. Seems like the convicts have a monopoly on bushwhacking here, so... good chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能是他们。看来罪犯垄断了这里的偷猎，所以...好机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerProgr_00000E3F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I say we set up in cover a ways back, see if we can't wait them out. These groups tend to hit the same spots as long as they can get away with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在后面埋伏好，看看能不能等他们出来。这些团体倾向于攻击相同的地方，只要他们能逃脱惩罚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerProgr_00000E3F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we wait patiently, we should get the drop on them. Better than the alternative.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们耐心等待，我们应该能抓住他们。比另一种选择要好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerProgr_00000E3F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you make of this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么看这个？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now we hurry up and wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我们抓紧时间等待吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerProgr_00002031_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Wait for ambush> This seems like a good spot.
ESP.TRADUIT: <等待伏击>这似乎是个好地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jed Phillips, the marksman. Lee knows him well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰德·菲利普斯，神枪手。李很了解他。
