ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerProgr_00001418_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's next?
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一个是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mason, the mercenary. Not a good friend of Lee's, if I recall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 梅森，那个雇佣兵。我没记错的话，不是李的好朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerProgr_00001FF5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's next?
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一个是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fowler, slimiest of the bunch by far. Looking forward to this one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 福勒，这群家伙里最虚伪的。期待这次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerProgr_0000202C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's next?
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一个是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our sure-fire ticket through the gate is dead now. Gonna need a kid to convincingly play the captive... not as easy as... wait a minute.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的通行证没戏了，我们需要一个孩子来令人信服的扮演俘虏...这可不容易...等等。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerProgr_00002C02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet that Ronaldo kid could do it. He'll probably charge us an arm and a leg, but he's got moxy. Worth a shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打赌那个叫罗纳尔多的孩子能做到。他可能会收我们一大笔钱，但他很有胆量，值得一试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerProgr_00002C02_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We know where Fowler is. The trick will be getting through the entrance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们知道福勒在哪里，关键是如何通过入口。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sam, the safecracker. Before you talk to Lee, be sure to send Ronaldo home. Bad enough we got him mixed up in all this. And... thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 山姆，保险箱窃贼。在你和李谈话之前，一定要把罗纳尔多送回家，我们把他牵扯进来已经够糟糕的了。还有...谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerProgr_000035E2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only two left. Who's next?
ESP.TRADUIT: 只剩下两个了。下一个是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a thief and a murderer. He'll keep stealing and killing until someone puts him down. He'll never change, no matter how he spins it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个小偷和杀人犯，他会继续偷窃和杀人，直到有人干掉他。他永远不会改变，不管他怎么粉饰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerProgr_00004B6A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've managed on our own so far. I'll give him a quick death, and that's being generous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到目前为止，我们都是靠自己。我会让他死得痛快点，这算是慷慨了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerProgr_00004B6A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He surrendered. Why don't we give him a chance to redeem himself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他投降了。我们为什么不给他一个改过自新的机会呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. Gonna have to work for it, though. Long trip, probably a real fight at the end. Lee can fill you in on the details.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，不过还得费点劲。长途跋涉，最后可能还得打场大仗。李可以告诉你细节。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerProgr_00004B7E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is it, then. The last man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就这样吧，最后一个人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A little walking never hurt anyone. Let's get moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走一走不会伤到任何人，我们出发吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerProgr_00004E6B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ready to travel?
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好旅行了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll do. I'm here to hunt down the men who robbed the bank in Silver Springs. I need a guide who knows the area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以。我是来追捕抢劫银泉银行的人的，我需要一个熟悉这个地区的向导。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DD7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pay is five percent of the recovered bank assets. Any other... forfeited assets along the way are yours, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 薪酬是追回的银行资产的5%。还有其他...沿途被没收的财产也是你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DD7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've killed everything that walks or crawls at one time or another.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经杀过所有会走路或爬行的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you killed men? Specifically, men who are trying to kill you at the same time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你杀过人吗？确切的说，特别是那些同时想杀你的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DD9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I ask again - have you killed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我再问一遍，你杀过人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DD9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll do. I'm here to hunt down the men who robbed the bank in Silver Springs. I need a guide who knows the area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以。我是来追捕抢劫银泉银行的人的，我需要一个熟悉这个地区的向导。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DD8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pay is five percent of the recovered bank assets. Any other... forfeited assets along the way are yours, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 薪酬是追回的银行资产的5%。还有其他...沿途被没收的财产也是你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DD8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This might not be for you. If it's any assurance, all the men I'm after have it coming. But... if you got qualms... a nagging conscience... then no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可能不适合你。如果这有什么保证的话，我追捕的所有人都是罪有应得。但是...如果你有疑虑...良心不安...那就不行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DDC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So let me pose the question again - have you killed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以让我再问一遍，你杀过人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DDC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I try to avoid killing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尽量避免杀人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to hunt down and kill the men who robbed the bank in Silver Springs. You don't have to join in. Just need a steady guide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要追捕并杀死在银泉抢劫银行的人。你不必加入，只需要一个稳定的向导。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DE0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That said... we could be in some tight spots, and you'd be forced to defend yourself. Also don't want someone who's going to preach at me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 话虽如此...我们可能会陷入困境，而你会被迫自卫。我也不想有人对我说教。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DE0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pay is five percent of the recovered bank assets. Any other... forfeited assets along the way are yours, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 薪酬是追回的银行资产的5%。还有其他...沿途被没收的财产也是你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DE0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What type of killing are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的是哪种类型的杀人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was. Not anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经是，现在不会了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DE4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You some kind of law?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是什么法律吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not talking about this with you. Leave it alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想跟你谈这个。别管了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DE9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, were you some kind of sheriff?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么，你是什么治安官吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes... and I'm not going to talk about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的...我不想谈这个
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DE7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This seems personal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这似乎是私人恩怨。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and Lee will get a share for labor provided... then I'll take the remainder back to the bank. Then... then it's over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和李会得到一份劳务费...然后我会把剩下的拿回银行。 然后...然后就结束了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DE8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you going to do with the recovered assets?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你打算如何处理收回的资产？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Strictly speaking, no. We're not agents of the court or sworn officers. Part of your job is to lure our targets away from watchful eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 严格来说，不合法。我们不是法院的特工，也不是宣誓就职的警官，你们的工作之一就是引诱我们的目标远离监管视线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DE3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All these men are outlaws. All of them are murderers. If you're going to fret over the legality of this, you should bow out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些人都是亡命之徒，都是杀人凶手。如果你还在为这件事的合法性发愁，你应该退出。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DE3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this legal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这合法吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Silver Springs is just outside NCR. No official bounties with the agencies. Eventually... yes. Ain't gonna wait for competition, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 银泉不属于NCR，没有官方悬赏机构。最终...是的，不过我等不到竞争的时候了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DE5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I collect bounties on these men?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能从这些人身上收赏金吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_000016F9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aren't you a little worried about the legal consequences?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就不担心法律上的后果吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: First man is Larch. Scum came up with the Jackals out here. Talk to Lee for details. I'm behind you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一个人是拉尔奇，这人渣带着豺狼帮来到这里。详情跟李谈，我在你身后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DEA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm in. Let's get started.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我加入。让我们开始吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't take too long. I'll hire someone else if they're competent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要拖太久。如果他们能胜任，我会雇其它人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerIntro_00000DEB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need some time to think about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要时间考虑一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fat chance of that happening. You seen the bumpkins passing through this shithole? Lucky if they can walk in a straight line without tripping.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种情况发生的可能性很小。你看到那些乡巴佬穿过这鬼地方了吗？如果他们能走直线而不被绊倒，那就太幸运了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBarks_00000DED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hallelujah and hail Mary, let the righteous slaughter begin! I for one am excited to be leaving this dusty sphincter. Lead on, sheriff!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈利路亚，万福玛利亚，让正义的杀戮开始吧！我很高兴能离开这个布满灰尘的括约肌。带路，警长！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBarks_00000DEE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, let's see what we're working with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，让我们看看我们在做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBarks_00000DFC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Sniffing>
ESP.TRADUIT: <嗅探>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBarks_00000DFC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... yeah, I got something. Terminal swamp ass... and shit-covered leather. Yeah, that's him!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...嗯，我有发现。无可救药的三角区潮湿...还有满是屎的皮革。对，就是他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBarks_00000DFC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Sniffing>
ESP.TRADUIT: <嗅探>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh, a hint of halitosis mingled with rotten meat... and it's not me. Getting closer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔，腐肉中夹杂着口臭的味道...而且不是我的。越来越近了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBarks_00000E05_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Sniffing>
ESP.TRADUIT: <嗅探>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, he's... well, I'll just go fuck myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，他...好吧，我还是去操我自己吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBarks_00000E09_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seems a little harsh. Could've just made him take a bath.
ESP.TRADUIT: 似乎有点苛刻，干脆让他洗个澡算了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Call no man happy till he is dead." That's what the Greeks said. Well, this guy is positively jubilant.
ESP.TRADUIT: “人死了才叫快乐。”希腊人是这么说的。好吧，这家伙可真是喜气洋洋啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're just gonna bushwhack 'em? Not gonna tell him something cold-blooded first? That's what revenge is all about!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们就这么伏击他们？不打算先跟他说点冷血的吗？这才是复仇的意义！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, he can count.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，他会数数。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now what is a perfectly good mole rat doing... oh, fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么一只好好的鼹鼠在做什么呢...噢，我操。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure Bodeen will say the same thing about Silver Springs. Look on the bright side - you got two for the price of one!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信博丁也会对银泉说同样的话。往好的方面想吧，你买一送一！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: "O Rose, thou art sick."
ESP.TRADUIT: “噢，玫瑰，你病了。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever I am... whatever I've done... I don't hurt kids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管我是什么人...不管我做过什么事...我不会伤害孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: Walker, he has a point. I sort of know the way to Arrow Canyon. I don't know-know it. Could be useful to keep Sam along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃克，他说的有道理。我大概知道去箭头峡谷的路，我不知道...我知道。带着山姆可能会有用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn hobos and their sob stories. Whole yarn was a farce, most likely. Sky wagons? A mass murderer named Al? Wasteland myth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的流浪汉和他们的悲情故事，整个故事很可能就是一场闹剧。空中马车？一个叫艾尔的杀人狂？废土神话罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe he went for a walk. I find a walks to be deeply invigorating, provided they're not with you, Walker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许他去散步了。我觉得散步能让人精神振奋，前提是你不在，沃克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: That worked out nicely. Get Bodeen's key and grab the loot. I'll be right here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 结果很好。拿上博丁的钥匙，拿上赃物。我就在这儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Manners maketh man." This is a pleasant surprise. Here I was expecting another illiterate beast... and you've gone and impressed me.
ESP.TRADUIT: “举止造就人品。”这真是个惊喜，我还以为又是一只不识字的野兽呢...你给我留下了深刻的印象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aSGFNLeeIntroShak_00000E23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Shake his hand> I'm &PCName;. Nice to meet you.
ESP.TRADUIT: <和他握手>我是&PCName;，见到你很高兴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Likewise. I hope our partnership is profitable for all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也是。我希望我们的合作对大家都有利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aSGFNLeeIntroCool_00000E21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to meet you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴认识你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, so that's your part in this. I recall the Bard: "Our very eyes... are sometimes like our judgments, blind."
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔，这就是你的角色吗。我想起了莎士比亚说过：“我们的眼睛...有时就像我们的判断一样，是盲目的。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aSGFNLeeIntroDick_00000E22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You play your games and I'll play mine. Maybe we'll both come out of this alive and a little richer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你玩你的，我玩我的。也许我们俩都能活着回来，还能更富有一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aSGFNLeeIntroDick_00000E22_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't get chummy with me, bub. I can see through your bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别跟我这么亲密，小老弟。我能看穿你的鬼话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stand and deliver! It's your caps or your lives, trespassers!
ESP.TRADUIT: 留下买路财！要瓶盖还是要命，入侵者！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larch [03000E01] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello, Larch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，拉尔奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Walker? Lee? What... what are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃克？李？什么...你在这里干什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larch [03000E01] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know why we're here, young man. Make your peace and get ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我们来这里的原因，年轻人。平静下来，做好准备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, whoa, whoa! I was just the lookout, see? I had debts, just needed a little to get back on my feet! It was Bodeen, all Bodeen!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，哇，哇！我只是把风的，明白吗？我有债务，只是需要一点钱来重新振作！是博丁，全是博丁干的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larch [03000E01] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, they wouldn't even let me do jobs with them! Ask Lee, he'll tell you! I was just a lookout, never hurt anybody!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，他们甚至不让我和他们一起工作！问李，他会告诉你的！我只是个把风的，从没伤害过任何人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larch [03000E01] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: He ain't lying, Walker. Besides... he's pretty pathetic. How about we just take his caps, sanitize them, and then get on to the real outlaws?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他没说谎，沃克。而且...他很可怜，不如我们拿走他的瓶盖，清洗干净，然后去找真正的亡命之徒？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. For Jessica.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不行，为了杰西卡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBark_00000E1D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here they come. Wait until they're all in our line of sight, then open up with whatever will cause the most casualties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们来了。等他们全部进入我们的视线，然后用能造成最大伤亡的武器开火。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBark_0000112E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll say it to him in hell. Now shut up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会在地狱里对他说的，现在闭嘴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBark_00001130_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Two.
ESP.TRADUIT: 两个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBark_00001133_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, that is not what I wanted. Didn't give me a choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可恶，这不是我想要的。我没得选。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBark_00001FDF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll be outside the compound. Try not to cause a scene in there... unless he starts it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会在院子外面。尽量不要在里面制造事端...除非他先动手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBark_00001FFE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to question him first. See if you can find something useful on him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想先问问他，看看能不能从他身上找到什么有用的信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBark_00002BE7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Five. Burn in hell, scum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 五个。下地狱吧，渣滓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBark_000035DF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Same deal, we'll be waiting outside town. Don't cause any trouble in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老规矩。我们在城外等你，别在里面惹麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBark_00003EBE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something's off. We just cleaned out the canyon, he still hasn't shown. Check out the admin building, see if he slipped out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有点不对劲。我们刚刚清理了峡谷，他还没出现。去行政大楼看看，看他是不是溜出去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBark_0000B253_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just take a quick look inside, see if he left any notes. We'll be watching the street.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快去里面看看，看他有没有留下什么笔记。我们会监视街道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBark_0000B253_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's done. Grab the key and get the cash from the safe. I'll be out here... something I have to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞定了。拿上钥匙，去保险柜拿现金。我就在外面...有些事我必须做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBark_0000BB7A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is going to be tedious. Waiting around so we can ambush the ambushers. Wish I'd brought a book. For Whom the Bell Tolls would be fitting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这会很无聊的，伺机伏击埋伏者。真希望我带了一本书，《丧钟为谁而鸣》才是最合适的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNStage22Exch_00000E2E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Walker... can I call you my little rabbit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃克...我可以叫你我的小兔子吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: You call me that and I'll shoot your kneecaps off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你敢这么叫我，我就一枪崩了你的膝盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNStage22Exch_00000E2F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Un dia pronto... te matare. Estupido paleto.
ESP.TRADUIT: (西语)总有一天...我会杀了你的。愚蠢的乡巴佬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNStage22Exch_00000E38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNStage22Exch_00000E39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was just complimenting your stunning intellect, Walker. You're a marvel to behold. So happy to be here with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是在称赞你惊人的智慧，沃克。你真是个奇迹，很高兴能和你在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNStage22Exch_00000E3A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, at least he doesn't like collecting Cazador venom. That's the secret of my optimism - remember it can always be so much worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，至少他不喜欢收集猎蜂的毒液。这就是我乐观的秘诀...记住，事情总是可以变得更糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeDeathcla_0000141B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got to be fucking kidding me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈开什么玩笑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then lead on to the great hunting grounds. I'll be... well behind you and Wild Bill the Second while you tilt at Deathclaw-shaped windmills.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后去大猎场。我会...跟在你和野蛮比尔二世的身后，看你们在死亡爪形状的风车上玩耍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeDeathcla_00001419_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He'll probably be at Sloan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他可能会在斯隆。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then lead on to the great hunting grounds. I'll be... well behind you and Wild Bill the Second while you tilt at Deathclaw-shaped windmills.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后去大猎场。我会...跟在你和野蛮比尔二世的身后，看你们在死亡爪形状的风车上玩耍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeDeathcla_0000141A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I might know a place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可能知道一个地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't the need nor the urge to hide it. She was a rancid, shallow cow, and it warmed my soul to see her thrash like a goldfish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不需要也不想隐瞒。她是一头腐臭的、肤浅的母牛，看着她像金鱼一样被鞭打，我的灵魂感到温暖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBack01Ca_000016FE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do regret killing Bill, though. Amazing linguist, loved his work on language isolates. I think he screeched in Basque and Ainu while drowning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我确实后悔杀了比尔。了不起的语言学家，热爱他对孤立语言的研究，我想他溺水时是用巴斯克语和阿伊努语尖叫的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBack01Ca_000016FE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't pontificate about some grand, internal transformation. It was just an epiphany, nothing more. I live freely now, and I don't look back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会高谈阔论说什么伟大的、内在的转变。那只是一种顿悟，仅此而已。我现在活得自由自在，不回头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBack01Ca_000016FE_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're very open about killing your former spouse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对杀死你的前配偶这件事很坦率。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, don't be. In hindsight, she was a domineering she-beast... closer to Shelob in temperament, apt to suck the joy out of me... but never my seed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，别这样。事后看来，她是头跋扈的母兽...性情更接近尸罗，总是吸走我的快乐...但绝不会吸走我的种子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBack01So_000016FF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was some time ago, too. If not for the blessings of the atom, I'd be buried in some simple plot back in California, long forgotten.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那也是一段时间以前的事了。如果不是原子的祝福，我早就被埋在加利福尼亚的某个简单的墓地里，被人遗忘了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBack01So_000016FF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry you had to go through that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很抱歉让你经历这些。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Friend, I'm all seven courses of shit and I'm delicious. You don't even know the half of it. I'm just living to the fullest. You should try it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 朋友，就算是屎也是上完七道菜的屎，而且我很美味，你连一半都不知道。我只是活得很充实，你应该试试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBack01To_00001700_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a piece of shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是一坨屎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Very well, no point in prevaricating. I... may have pilfered a tiny sum from Bodeen. He overreacted, beast that he is.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]好吧，搪塞也没用。我...可能从博丁那里偷了一小笔钱。他反应过度了，他是个禽兽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBack02Sp_00001704_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No dialogue, no discourse, just a primitive beating. Forfeiture of shares and banishment would've sufficed. Wouldn't have been my first time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有对话，没有话语，只有原始的殴打。没收股份和放逐就足够了，我也不是第一次了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBack02Sp_00001704_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, he made a point to humiliate and degrade me. Like my wife did. You remember how that turned out for her, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，他故意羞辱我，贬低我，就像我妻子一样。你还记得她的下场吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBack02Sp_00001704_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: C'mon. Don't bullshit a bullshitter. What really happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，别胡扯了。到底发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I'll refrain, thank you very much.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]我就不说了，非常感谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBack02Sp_00001705_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me your secret and I'll tell you mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我你的秘密，我就告诉你我的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. In Utah I spoke with that infamous Booth fellow for a brief moment. Imposing... dangerous... and utterly obnoxious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。在犹他州，我和那个臭名昭著的布斯聊了一会儿。印象深刻...危险...完全令人讨厌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBack03An_0000170B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I recall Euripides: "He was a god of words... and words are not enough." I preferred his brother.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记得欧里庇得斯说过：“他是言语之神...但言语是不够的。”我更喜欢他的兄弟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBack03An_0000170B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you want to finish that sentence. What were you going to say? You can tell me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你想把话说完。你想说什么？你可以告诉我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, but I most certainly will not. I find babyish fits of rage to be very unpersuasive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，但我绝对不会。我觉得孩子气的暴怒是很没有说服力的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeBack03An_0000170C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: FINISH THE SENTENCE!
ESP.TRADUIT: 把话说完！！！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, he went down hard! Mole rat meat and the Macomber call get them every time! Whoo!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，他重重的倒下了！鼹鼠肉和麦康伯每次都叫他们！呜！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jed Phillips [03001CD9] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNJedPhillips_00001FBF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ya'll just wandered right up to the bait... almost became bait yourselves. You taking the scenic route or something? Wait, hold on...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们就这样走近诱饵...自己也几乎成了诱饵。 你是走观光路线还是怎么的？ 等等...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jed Phillips [03001CD9] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNJedPhillips_00001FBF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Patrick? Sheriff Walker? What in blue blazes are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 帕特里克？沃克治安官？你到底在这儿干什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jed Phillips [03001CD9] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNJedPhillips_00001FBF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to settle with you, Jed. For Jessica.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来找你算账的，杰德。为了杰西卡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNJedScene_00001FCC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, whoa. I get it... I do. You see I'm with my wife, right? We got married a few weeks back. She's a civilian, through and through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，哇哦。我明白了...我知道。你看，我和我妻子在一起，对吧？我们几周前刚结婚，她是个彻头彻尾的平民。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jed Phillips [03001CD9] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNJedScene_00001FCD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have a boy, you know? Was shacked up off an on for years. He's damn near four, up at her mama's now. I did it to support them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有一个儿子，你知道吗？我们断断续续同居了好几年。他快四岁了，现在在她妈妈家，我这么做是为了养活他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jed Phillips [03001CD9] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I know I don't deserve it... but I'm asking you... let me walk out of here so I can support my family. You'll never see me again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我知道我不配...但我想请求你...让我离开这里，我才能养活我的家人。你永远不会再见到我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jed Phillips [03001CD9] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only thing I'm pulling the trigger on is deathclaws so I can put food on the table. Never liked the work with Bodeen. Not going back to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我扣动扳机的唯一目标是死亡爪，这样我才能有饭吃。我一直不喜欢和博丁一起工作，我不会再回去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jed Phillips [03001CD9] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. You don't get to hide behind your family. Their suffering is on your head. You made your choices, took the easy way with Bodeen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。你没资格躲在家人身后，他们的痛苦都算在你头上。你做出了自己的选择，和博丁选择了简单的方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNJedScene_00001FCE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't just me you hurt. I know all about those caravans. The robbing, the raping, the murder. I know what you are... what you'll always be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你伤害的不只是我。我知道所有关于商队的事，抢劫，强奸，谋杀。我知道你是什么人...你永远都是这样的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your wife can walk out of here, which is more than you or Bodeen would've offered. Ma'am, you'd best be on your way home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的妻子可以离开这里，这比你和博丁提供的条件都要好了。夫人，你最好现在就回家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mister, you don't get tell me what to do. You ain't no law. You don't get to threaten us here. We have laws, judges and courts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先生，你没资格对我指手画脚。你不是什么法律，你没资格在这里威胁我们。我们有法律、法官和法院。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bethany Phillips [03001CDA] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult01Default\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNJedScene_00001FD0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jed, I'm staying here with you. You hear that, bushwhackers? I'm not going anywhere!
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰德，我要留在这里陪你。听到了吗，丛林强盗？我哪儿也不去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bethany Phillips [03001CDA] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: Words, words, words. Kill them both and let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 废话，废话，废话。把他们两个都杀了，我们就走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNJedScene_00001FD1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lee, shut your fucking mouth. Jed, say your goodbyes. Ma'am, go home. Go home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李，闭上你的臭嘴。杰德，说再见吧，夫人，回家了。回家吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNJedScene_00001FD2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honey, think of our boy. Tommy needs you. I love you. Go. Go now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亲爱的，想想我们的孩子，汤米需要你。我爱你，走吧，现在就走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jed Phillips [03001CD9] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNJedScene_00001FD3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Piss on that. These people are cowards. Just petty bushwhackers. You hear that, you sonofabitch? You need to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去你的吧。这些人都是懦夫，只是些微不足道的丛林强盗。听到了吗，你个狗娘养的？你得离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bethany Phillips [03001CDA] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult01Default\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNJedScene_00001FD4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The girl has sand. Do it, I believe in you, sister!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这女孩挺有勇气。动手吧，我相信你，妹妹！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ma'am, put that gun down. Put it down and walk away. Jed, get control of her. I will defend myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 女士，把枪放下，把它放下，然后走开。杰德，控制住她，我会自卫的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNJedScene_00001FD9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, he's gonna hurt us! I don't believe him... he's just another raider, gonna take advantage of us. I won't let him do it! I won't!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，他会伤害我们！我不相信他...他就是另一个掠夺者，要占我们便宜。我不会让他得逞的！我不会！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bethany Phillips [03001CDA] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult01Default\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNJedScene_00001FDB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there, hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好啊，英雄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonScene_00002024_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lee? What the... uh, Sheriff Walker. What, uh.. what brings you here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 李？搞什么...呃，沃克治安官。什么，呃...什么风把你给吹来了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult04\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonScene_00002025_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know why we're here, son. Got anything to say for yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我们为什么在这里，孩子。你有什么要说的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonScene_00002026_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, hold on. I didn't pull the trigger there. Bodeen. It was all him. Shit, I tried to hold him back. I was the only one who stood up to him!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，等一下，我没有扣扳机。博丁，都是他干的。该死，我还想拉住他，只有我一个人反抗他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult04\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonScene_00002027_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lee, you tell him! You remember how it was!
ESP.TRADUIT: 李，你去告诉他！你还记得是怎么回事吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: I recall... a certain lackey who kept his nose right up Bodeen's ass, dawn to dusk. Boy, did you try... even dressed like him. The duster, remember?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记得...一个从早到晚一直盯着博丁屁股的走狗。孩子，你试过...甚至像他一样打扮，那个罩衫，记得吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonScene_00002028_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nah, I suspect you were right there egging him on. "Great shot, Bodeen." That's what you always said, right? Truckling little weasel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我怀疑是你在怂恿他。“射得好，博丁。”你总是这么说，对吧？谄媚的小黄鼠狼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonScene_00002028_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That wasn't my fault! None of it was my fault! You... you can't do this. I served, remember? Isn't that worth something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不是我的错！都不是我的错！你...你不能这么做。我当过兵，记得吗？这难道不值得吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult04\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonScene_00002029_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So did I.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonScene_0000202A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He doesn't get to walk... live a normal, happy life. No, I won't stand for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不能走了...过正常、快乐的生活。不，我不会容忍的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerJedLe_00001FE6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you should let him go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你应该放了他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I just... no, can't be helped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我只是...不，没办法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerJedKi_00001FE5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quit fiddlefarting around and kill him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别再瞎折腾了，杀了他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] This doesn't sit well with me... but yeah... you're right. That woman is innocent. Jessica wouldn't want her harmed.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]这让我很不舒服...但是没错...你说得对。那个女人是无辜的，杰西卡不会希望她受到伤害的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerJedLe_00001FE9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There will be another time and place. Don't risk killing an innocent. You're better than that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 会有另一个时间和地点的。不要冒险杀死一个无辜的人，你不是那样的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Sorry? He can say it to the devil.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]抱歉？他可以去跟魔鬼说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerJedLe_00001FEA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, he said he was sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，他说他很抱歉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... uh, okay. Yeah, it's the right thing. I'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...呃，好吧。嗯，这是正确的选择，我会的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerJedLe_00001FE8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let him go or the next grave is yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放了他，不然下一个坟墓就是你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have... it's just... I honestly don't like talking about it. But you have put your ass on the line for me, so I'll tell you the truth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有...只是...说实话，我不喜欢谈论这件事。但你为我冒了这么大的风险，所以我就告诉你真相。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00001FF2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might've heard Lee call me "Sheriff". It's true, I wore a star for years up in Silver Springs. Was respected, known for being fair... and tough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能听过李叫我"治安官"，是真的，我在银泉镇戴了好几年星章。受到尊敬，以公正著称...还有强硬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00001FF2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Behind that reputation for toughness was... well, a lot of anger. I wanted all the raiders and scum in the basin to know my town was off-limits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在强硬的名声背后是...嗯，很多愤怒。我想让盆地里所有的掠夺者和人渣知道我的小镇是禁区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00001FF2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It worked well, for a time. But anger is... well, it's a drug. A blinding, intoxicating drug. It was a high for me, tuning up raiders or riff-raff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在一段时间内，这很有效。但是愤怒是...嗯，这是一种毒品，一种致盲的、令人陶醉的药物。这对我来说是一种高潮，调教掠夺者或流氓地痞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00001FF2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got to where my own people got to be scared of me. They wanted someone more... amicable, friendly. Voted my ass out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到了连自己人都怕我的地步，他们想要一个更...亲切，友好的人。投票把我踢出局了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00001FF2_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm putting my life on the line for you. It's important that we trust each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在为你冒着生命危险，我们彼此信任很重要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suspect it ain't your first time killing men for caps, didn't figure you'd be so curious. It is worth killing over, though. Worth dying... for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜这不是你第一次为了瓶盖杀人了，没想到你会这么好奇。尽管如此，还是值得一杀，值得去死...对我来说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00001FF1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might've heard Lee call me "Sheriff". It's true, I wore a star for years up in Silver Springs. Was respected, known for being fair... and tough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能听过李叫我"治安官"，是真的，我在银泉镇戴了好几年星章。受到尊敬，以公正著称...还有强硬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00001FF1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Behind that reputation for toughness was... well, a lot of anger. I wanted all the raiders and scum in the basin to know my town was off-limits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在强硬的名声背后是...嗯，很多愤怒。我想让盆地里所有的掠夺者和人渣知道我的小镇是禁区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00001FF1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It worked well, for a time. But anger is... well, it's a drug. A blinding, intoxicating drug. It was a high for me, tuning up raiders or riff-raff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在一段时间内，这很有效。但是愤怒是...嗯，这是一种毒品，一种致盲的、令人陶醉的药物。这对我来说是一种高潮，调教掠夺者或流氓地痞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00001FF1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got to where my own people got to be scared of me. They wanted someone more... amicable, friendly. Voted my ass out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到了连自己人都怕我的地步，他们想要一个更...亲切，友好的人。投票把我踢出局了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00001FF1_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If this is worth killing men over, I'd like to know the reason why.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这值得杀人，我想知道为什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Town put a politician in charge, real friendly... people person. I could've stayed on as a deputy, but... couldn't do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 镇上派了个政客来管事，真的很友好...善于交际。我本来可以继续当副手的，但是...我做不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00001FF8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because I was stubborn, refused to work as a deputy... my wife took up a position as a clerk at the bank, just to keep us afloat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我很固执，拒绝做副手...我妻子在银行找了一份职员的工作，只是为了维持我们的生计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bodeen and his boys hit the bank... Jessica was the only one that stood up to them. She was stubborn... strong. So they killed her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 博丁和他的手下抢劫了银行...杰西卡是唯一敢于反抗他们的人。她很固执...强硬，所以他们杀了她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00001FF8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bodeen executed her... that's why I'm saving him for last. Might be another grave after his. That's what I deserve, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 博丁处决了她...所以我把他留到最后。 在他之后可能是另一个坟墓，反正这是我应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go on, I'm listening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续说，我在听。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. I figured as much. Let's get back to work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我想也是。我们回去工作吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00001FF7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Yawn>
ESP.TRADUIT: <打哈欠>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had a hand in it, to be sure. Even if I were just a deputy, presence alone might've deterred Bodeen. But I had to be cock of the walk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也有份，这是肯定的。就算我只是个副治安官，光我在场也能吓退博丁。但我习惯了称王称霸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00001FFD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, doesn't matter. They're getting me now. I'll hunt Bodeen all the way to Baja if I have to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，没关系，他们现在抓住我了。如果有必要，我会一路追捕博丁到巴哈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00001FFD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That wasn't your fault. Bodeen and his men did this, and they're going to pay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不是你的错。博丁和他的手下干的，他们会付出代价的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was the best part of the job when I had the chance to do it... which was rare. More often than not I was corralling drunks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我有机会做这件事的时候，是这份工作最棒的部分...这很罕见。我更多的时候是在驱赶醉汉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00002000_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hard to think about right now. I've been so focused on this... sad part is that it's given me real purpose for the first time in years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在很难去想，我一直都很专注于这件事...可悲的是，这么多年来，这让我第一次有了真正的目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00002000_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell of a thing to admit... I've been a better husband to Jessica since she's been dead than I ever was while she was alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 承认这种事真的很糟...杰西卡去世后，我一直是比她活着时更称职。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00002000_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe... maybe I will start over. Figure some of these frontier towns can use a lawman. No point dreaming right now, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许...也许我会重新开始，我想一些边境城镇需要一个执法者。不过，现在做梦是没有意义的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00002000_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can still help people after all this is done. Go someplace new and start over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一切结束后，你还是可以帮助别人的。去一个新的地方重新开始。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, outright giving up doesn't sit well with me. I just don't know what I'll do after this... if I'll be worth a damn at honest work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，直接放弃我不太舒服。我只是不知道在这之后我要做什么...如果我能做点正经工作的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00002001_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a problem for tomorrow, frankly. Right now let's focus on killing these bastards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坦白说，这是明天的问题。现在我们集中精力杀了这些杂种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00002001_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I pictured you as more of a fighter. Don't see you giving up after this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为你是个斗士，你不会在这之后就放弃的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe. Maybe not. We'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许会，也许不会。我们拭目以待。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00001FFF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do it. I'm not sure if you can come back from something like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去吧。我不确定你是否能从这样的事情中恢复过来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Waiting for the next job. Gonna be guarding a caravan from here to the Mojave Outpost. Might get hairy. Good thing they have me watching them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等待下一份工作，护卫一辆从这里到莫哈维前哨的大篷车。可能会很棘手，还好他们有我看着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult04\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonWhatDo_00002011_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to Alice if you're looking for work. She's been fair with me from day one. Not too concerned about past employment, if you know what I mean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你在找工作，可以和爱丽丝谈谈。她从一开始就对我很公平，不要太关心过去的工作，如果你明白我的意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult04\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonWhatDo_00002011_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's just say that you learn a lot about guarding caravans once you've... been on the other side of things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说吧，你会学到很多关于保护商队的知识，一旦你...站在事情的另一边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult04\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonWhatDo_00002012_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing too crazy, certainly never hit Crimson Caravan or any of the other big players. Just small stuff. You learn what not to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有什么太疯狂的事，当然也从没袭击过深红商队或任何其他大人物。 只是小打小闹，你能学到什么是不该做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult04\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonWhatDo_00002012_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of "Past Employment"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么样的“过去的工作”？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was all outside NCR, way up in the Great Basin. Different world up there. Towns and warlords fighting, everyone is raiding each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 都在NCR之外，在大盆地的很远的地方。那里是另一个世界，城镇和军阀混战，每个人都在互相袭击。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult04\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonWhatDo_00002013_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I'm no angel, but I never got mixed up in hurting citizens... except maybe once. Part of the reason I'm down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我不是天使，但我从来没有卷入伤害市民的事情...也许有一次。这也是我来这里的原因之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult04\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonWhatDo_00002013_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I figure it's best to leave that part of my life behind and play it straight for a while. Plenty of caps to be made down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我想我最好把那段生活抛在脑后，过一段时间正直的生活。这里有很多瓶盖能赚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult04\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonWhatDo_00002013_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem pretty open about your past.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对自己的过去似乎很坦诚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'm listening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好啊，我在听。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult04\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonWhatDo_0000201A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I might have an interesting business proposal for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可能有个有趣的商业提议给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn right I served. I was a combat culinary specialist. Basically infantry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，我服过役。我是战斗烹饪专家，基本上是步兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult04\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonVetera_00002014_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I fought the Legion at Parker Dam. Killed a centurion in single combat. Would've gotten a battlefield commission... but I got fucked over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在帕克水坝和军团战斗过，在一场战斗中杀死了一名百夫长。还以为会得到战场委任...但我被骗了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult04\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonVetera_00002014_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just be aware... if we work together, sometimes I get flashbacks... and snap! I'm back there fighting!
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是要注意...如果我们一起工作，有时我会闪回...然后啪！我又回到那里战斗了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult04\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonVetera_00002014_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He produces a knife and waves it erratically for several moments. This is an intensely-choreographed yet wholly unimpressive performance.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他拿出一把刀，不规律地挥舞了一会儿。这是一场精心设计却毫无亮点的表演。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's how I fucking do it, man. I just see fucking red and I go! Raiders won't fuck with us. Legion? Fuck no, they see me and they run.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就是这么干的，伙计。我一发脾气就走！掠夺不会来惹我们的，军团？不，他们看到我就跑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult04\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonVetera_00002014_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a veteran?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个老兵？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, say what? Who you been talking to? What did they say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，说了什么？谁跟你说的？他们怎么说？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult04\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonVetera_00002019_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's interesting. I heard a different story about your enlistment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真有意思。关于你的入伍经历，我听说了一个不同的故事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Who... who the fuck told you that? I'm a hero, goddamn it! A hero! I'm not gonna take this shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]谁...谁他妈跟你说的？我是个英雄，该死！英雄！我才不要听你胡扯！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult04\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonSpeech_0000201B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Provoke.> I heard... you gargled your own piss and ate cigarettes so you could fake an illness.
ESP.TRADUIT: <挑衅>我听说...你用自己的尿漱口，吃香烟，就为了假装生病。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Yeah, you're welcome. Thank you for recognizing my sacrifices.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]嗯，不客气。感谢你认可我的牺牲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult04\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonSpeech_0000201D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind, thank you for your service.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了，谢谢你的服务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {CUT}Okay, but you better not be fucking with me. It was goddamn Sergeant Parker, wasn't it? Fucking bully! Smoke me? I'll smoke you!
ESP.TRADUIT: {CUT}好吧，但你最好别耍我。是该死的帕克中士，对吧？该死的恶棍！诓我？我要杀了你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll meet you outside. I'm gonna have words with whoever is spreading this bullshit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在外面等你。我要和散播这种谣言的人好好谈谈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't say it here. Meet me outside and I'll tell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里我不能说。在外面等我，我会告诉你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, put that shit away. Of course I'm interested. I'll buy it in bulk if you got it. Meet me outside. Fucking discretion, man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，把那玩意收起来。我当然感兴趣，如果你有的话，我就大量购买。外面等我，妈的小心点，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mason [03002003] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult04\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNMasonChems_0000201E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Show Psycho> I got a strong supplier if you're in the market.
ESP.TRADUIT: <展示疯狂药>如果你想要的话，我有个很好的供应商。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marvin? Don't know him. I can be your Marvin if you need. Got a homemade strap-on that I can lube up for you. Fifty caps and I'm yours, sugar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔文？我不认识他。如果你需要，我可以当你的马尔文。我有个自制的固定装置，我可以帮你抹润滑油。50瓶盖，我就是你的了，甜心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felicity Cockburn [03002315] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNHookerLoo_0000231B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for a guy named Marvin. You seen him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一个叫马尔文的人，你见过他吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, it's some Da Vinci shit. Rebar core with a rubber exterior, firm and girthy. That's how you like it, don't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，有点达芬奇的味道。螺纹钢芯与橡胶外部，坚固而结实。这就是你喜欢的，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felicity Cockburn [03002315] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNHookerLoo_0000231C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She thrusts her hips in a suggestive manner while licking her lips. You notice droplets of an unspecified bodily fluid on her clothing.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她在舔嘴唇的同时，以一种暗示的方式翘起她的臀部。你注意到她的衣服上有一种不明体液的水滴。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felicity Cockburn [03002315] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about it, honey? You need mama to take care of you and your friends? They can play too, even the ghoul. I don't discriminate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亲爱的，怎么样？你需要妈妈照顾你和你的朋友吗？他们甚至也可以玩，食尸鬼也行，我不歧视。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felicity Cockburn [03002315] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNHookerLoo_0000231C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A homemade strap-on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 自制的捆绑装置？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be a stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别当陌生人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felicity Cockburn [03002315] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNHookerBye_0000231D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不了谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Silver wagons in the stars... bright... warm light. Then I was up there. They poked me! Put things in me! Nobody believes me! Do you believe me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 星空中银色的马车...明亮...温暖的光，然后我就上去了。他们插我！把东西放进我身体里！没人相信我！你相信我吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNDrunkWW_00002322_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They? Who are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们？你在说谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you get it... maybe you've seen them. They're everywhere, you know... gotta have special glasses to see them. Magical glasses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你就明白了...也许你见过他们。他们无处不在，你知道的...得戴上特殊的眼镜才能看到，魔法眼镜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNDrunkWW_00002324_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had 'em, but an invisible man stole 'em from me. Asked him his name. "Nobody," he said. Look out for an invisible man with sunglasses!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本来有，但被一个看不见的人偷走了。问他的名字，“没有人，”他说。小心一个戴着墨镜的隐形人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNDrunkWW_00002324_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I believe you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我相信你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He knows too much... seen even more than me. He stays hidden so they can't catch him or probe him again. Wish I had those glasses...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他知道得太多...比我看到的还多。他一直藏着，这样他们就没法再次抓住他或刺探他。要是我有那副眼镜就好了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNDrunkWW_00002325_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew a Marvin. We served together in Baja. Machine gunner. Funny guy, liked to tell jokes. They blew his brains out all over the Pacific.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认识一个叫马尔文的，我们一起在巴哈服役。机枪手，有趣的家伙，喜欢讲笑话。他们在太平洋上一枪爆了他的头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNDrunkMarv_00002326_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for a guy named Marvin. Have you seen him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一个叫马尔文的人。你见过他吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't know any Marvins in Freeside. I know an Al. Is that you, Al? It's been a long time, but I remember everything... I was there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在自由城不认识什么马尔文。我认识一个叫艾尔的人，是你吗，艾尔？已经很久了，但我记得所有的事情...我当时在场！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNDrunkMarv_00002327_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I remember how you shot those kids and laughed... how you sang those songs. I'll never forget that laugh. I still hear it at night. I can't sleep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记得你朝那些孩子开枪，然后大笑...你唱的那些歌，我永远不会忘记那笑声，我晚上还能听到它。我睡不着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNDrunkMarv_00002327_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You thought I was gone, didn't you? I never left, Al. Just went away for a while... I'm... I'm just getting warmed up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为我走了，是吗？我没有离开，艾尔，只是离开了一段时间...我...我还在热身呢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNDrunkMarv_00002327_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry about that. The Marvin I'm looking for is a young man, should be here in Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不好意思。我要找的马尔文是个年轻人，应该在自由城。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could be Al in disguise. He has many names, you know. Fancied himself a doctor at one point. Killed all his patients. Stay. Away. From. Al.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能是艾尔伪装的，你知道，他有很多名字。曾经幻想自己是个医生，杀死了他所有的病人。留下来。离开。来自。艾尔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNDrunkMarv_00002328_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it ain't Al... the boy might know. Stays by the big gate with the robots. He's a survivor. Escaped a madman's dungeon, that's what I heard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这不是艾尔...那孩子也许知道。和机器人一起守在大门前那个，他是幸存者，我听说是从一个疯子的地牢里逃出来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNDrunkMarv_00002328_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a survivor, too! Survived two enlistments! Why did I re-enlist? Because of brain damage, that's why! Used explosives. Broke my brain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也是幸存者！两次入伍都活下来了！我为什么要重新入伍？因为脑损伤，这就是原因！使用炸药，我的脑子都碎了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNDrunkMarv_00002328_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... you don't know Marvin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...你不认识马尔文？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My pleasure. Have you ever seen what a shaped charge does to a child's skull? Perfect. Circle. That's what it does. It's a work of art.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的荣幸。你见过聚能炸药对小孩头骨的影响吗？完美的，圆，这就是它的作用，这是一件艺术品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNDrunkMarv_00005F6D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Saw Al do it, back when he had the full team. Amazing chemistry. Killed a lot of bad men. Women and children, too. Those were the days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我见过艾尔这么做，那时候他有一个完整的团队，神奇的化学反应。杀了很多坏人，还有妇女和儿童，那些日子都过去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNDrunkMarv_00005F6D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I lost my way, Al. I wandered far and wide. Saw things you can't imagine. I found myself out there... something snapped in me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我迷失了方向，艾尔，我四处游荡，看到了你无法想象的事情。我发现自己在那里...我心里有什么东西突然崩溃了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNDrunkMarv_00005F6D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had to come back... back to Vegas. I'll never leave... not until I'm dead or the sky wagons snatch me... or I get recalled to active duty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我必须回来...回到维加斯。我永远不会离开...除非我死了，或者天上的马车抓住我...否则我就会被召回服役。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNDrunkMarv_00005F6D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for the information. I should be going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你提供的信息，我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because it's time. They thought we were finished. Nothing is finished. Find them, bring them back. You'll need them all!
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为是时候了。他们以为我们完蛋了，没有完蛋。找到他们，带他们回来，你会需要它们的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNDrunkMarv_00005F6E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had a vision up in that sky wagon... I saw the future. There's gonna be enough blood for ten lifetimes, Al! You'll need everyone!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在那辆空中马车上看到了幻象...我看到了未来。那里的血够你喝十辈子了，艾尔！你需要每个人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNDrunkMarv_00005F6E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They told me to leave this town, called me crazy. Said I was old, done, washed up. I won't do it, Al. By God, I'm gonna light this town on fire!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们让我离开这个小镇，说我疯了，说我老了，没戏了，完蛋了。我不会这么做的，艾尔，我发誓，我要把这个镇子烧了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNDrunkMarv_00005F6E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you telling me this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要告诉我这些？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He gulps down a clear liquid from a liquor bottle.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他一口吞下酒瓶里的透明液体。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's my help. Know why? It's water. Pure, high-quality H20! I gave up drinking, Al! It's a miracle! I'm renewed... effervescent!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我的帮助，知道为什么吗？这是水，纯净，高品质的水！我戒酒了，艾尔！这真是个奇迹！我焕然一新...沸腾了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNDrunkMarv_00006840_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They thought I was crazy before... I was just drunk. You're gonna see both barrels filled with batshit crazy soon. Mark my words, Al.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们之前都觉得我疯了...我只是喝醉了，你很快就会看到两个桶都装满了疯狂的东西。记住我的话，艾尔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy Dillinger [03002311] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNDrunkMarv_00006840_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you should get some help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你应该寻求帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you gonna fucking make me? I'll talk how I want to any roaming cockwagon in this town, got it? I'm gonna run Freeside one day!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你他妈的要逼我？我想怎么跟镇上的人说就怎么说，明白吗？总有一天我会管理自由城！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoIn_0000232F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: High and mighty ass... I just had radroach for dinner! You gonna preach about cussing when I'm missing meals? Being hungry fucking sucks!
ESP.TRADUIT: 高高在上的混蛋...我刚吃了蟑螂当晚餐！你要在我没吃饭的时候说脏话吗？饿得他妈难受！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoIn_0000232F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And don't give me that do-good bullshit about "Profanity is a sign of bad character." Last night a hobo tried to molest me! That's bad character!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别跟我胡扯什么"脏话是不良品德的表现"，昨晚有个流浪汉想骚扰我！那才是不良品德！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoIn_0000232F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should watch your mouth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该说话客气点。
