ESP.ORIGINAL: Relax? I don't think so. Know what I've had to do to survive up here? I fucking escaped a dungeon. A fucking crazy man locked me in his dungeon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放松？我不这么想。你知道我为了在这里生存做了什么吗？我他妈的从地牢里逃出来了，一个疯子把我锁在他的地牢里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoIn_00002335_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me and a bunch of other kids, all locked up. Enslaved. Think I survived by talking pretty and being polite? Fuck that. Bet your ass I'm mean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和其他一群孩子，都被关起来了，被奴役。你以为我是靠漂亮的谈吐和礼貌活下来的吗？去他妈的，我跟你打赌我很卑鄙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoIn_00002335_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next asshole who tries to throw me in a dungeon is getting it, and I'm talking about next-level shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一个想把我扔进地牢的混蛋就有好果子吃了，我说的可是更高级的货色！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoIn_00002335_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He demonstrates his ability with the knife by performing a series of swift yet smooth slicing motions. He is clearly adept with the blade.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他通过一系列快速而流畅的切割动作来展示自己的刀法，他显然很擅长用刀。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Relax, I didn't mean to offend you. I'm just trying to find Marvin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放松点，我不是有意要冒犯你。我只是想找到马尔文。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you're one of those types. Listen up, perverts. Any of you try to touch me and I'll stab you right in the feminine artery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你就是那种人。听着，变态们，谁敢碰我我就一刀扎进你的女人动脉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoIn_00002330_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might get me in a rush, but one of you is gonna bleed out here. You wanna fucking try me? C'mon! Let's go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们可能会让我很忙，但你们其中一个会在这里失血过多而死。你他妈的想试试吗？来啊！我们上啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoIn_00002330_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for a guy named Marvin. You know him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一个叫马尔文的人。你认识他？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, you're just here to kill people? Shit, why didn't you say so? One hundred caps or three cartons of smokes. That's the going rate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你就是来杀人的吗？妈的，你怎么不早说？一百瓶盖或者三盒烟，这是现行的价格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoIn_00002331_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, it's not like that! We're trying to track down Marvin's boss so we can settle a score.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，不是那样的！我们是在找马尔文的老大好报复他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caps or smokes. What's it gonna be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 瓶盖或烟。会是什么呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoIn_00002338_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to get information on Marvin's whereabouts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道马尔文的下落。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Smooth and mild, just how my clients like 'em. Gonna get a nice return on these. Marvin likes to camp out by the old watchtower back there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 柔滑温和，正是我的客户喜欢的，会有不错的回报。马尔文喜欢在后面的瞭望塔旁露营。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoSm_0000233A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Obvious ruse, offering sandwiches and candy. Just... hurt him for me, okay? He took one of my friends who was hungry. Make him bleed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明显的诡计，提供三明治和糖果。就...替我伤害他，好吗？他带走了我一个饥饿的朋友。让他流点血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoSm_0000233A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give three cartons of cigarettes> Here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给他三盒烟>给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice doing business with you. Marvin likes to camp out by the old watchtower. Paid off some of the Kings and guards, slips in and out at night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴和你做生意。马尔文喜欢在旧瞭望塔旁露营，收买了几个猫王帮和守卫，晚上溜进溜出。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoCa_0000233C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Obvious scam, offering food and candy. Just... hurt him for me, okay? He took one of my friends who was hungry. Make him bleed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很明显的骗局，提供食物和糖果。就...替我伤害他，好吗？他带走了我一个饥饿的朋友。让他流点血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoCa_0000233C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Pay 100 caps> Here's the caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: <支付100瓶盖>给你瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, thanks. I practice everyday. This little baby has saved my hide... and other things... more than once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，谢谢，我每天都练习。这个小宝贝救了我的命...还有其他的事...不止一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoMe_00002339_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what... out of professional courtesy, I'm gonna hand you Marvin. He likes to camp out by the old watchtower back there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样吧...出于职业礼貌，我要把马尔文交给你，他喜欢在那边的旧瞭望塔旁露营。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoMe_00002339_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Obvious ruse, offering sandwiches and candy. Just... hurt him for me, okay? He took one of my friends who was hungry. Make him bleed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明显的诡计，提供三明治和糖果。就...替我伤害他，好吗？他带走了我一个饥饿的朋友。让他流点血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoMe_00002339_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not bad. You've got real talent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还不错，你真的很有天赋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: "It looks sharp." That's more than I can say for you, dumbass. Better believe I keep it sharp. Saved me more than once.
ESP.TRADUIT: “看起来很锋利。”我可不敢这么说，笨蛋。最好相信我一直很锋利，不止一次救了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoMe_0000233D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Creepy-ass old man says, "Come here, little boy. I got a present for you." Tries to grab me... Pow! Right through the Antilles tendon!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个恶心的老头说：“过来，小男孩，我有个礼物要送给你。”试图抓住我...噗！直接穿过跟腱！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoMe_0000233D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, yeah... knives are good. Sharp knives are gooder. Got it? Good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，对...刀很好，锋利的刀更好。明白了吗？很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoMe_0000233D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That looks sharp. You should be careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来很锋利，你要小心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, you want me to play some raggedy-ass victim? "Mister, I'm so hungry, of course I'll follow you into the dark alley." Like that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你想让我扮演一个衣衫褴褛的受害者？“先生，我太饿了，我当然会跟着你走进那条漆黑的小巷。”像这样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoPr_00002C0A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I support what you're doing, so I'll give you a discount: two hundred caps. I'm a professional, and you get what you pay for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我支持你的做法，所以我给你打个折扣，两百瓶盖。我是专业人士，一分钱一分货。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoPr_00002C0A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need you to act like a captive so we can break into a dungeon and kill a guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要你表现得像个俘虏，这样我们才能闯入地牢，杀掉一个人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Finally come around? Not a lot of willing or able actors of my caliber wandering around Freeside. Let's see the caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 终于想通了？没有多少像我这样有意愿或有能力的演员在自由城游荡了。让我们看看瓶盖吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoPr_00002C0B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to discuss hiring you to act as a captive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想谈谈雇你当俘虏的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't mention it. Beats hunting rats and stabbing bums. Guess it's back to the old routine in Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别客气，比抓老鼠和刺伤流浪汉强多了。看来又要回到自由之城的老套路了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoPr_000035E3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This little outing got me thinking... might be fun to see some other places. What do you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这次外出让我想到...去其他地方看看可能会很有趣。你觉得呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoPr_000035E3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for all your help, but I think it's time for you to go home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的帮助，但我想你该回家了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember, kids - I'll have more food for you tomorrow. I might even have some chocolate, so bring your friends!
ESP.TRADUIT: 记住，孩子们...明天我会给你们准备更多的食物。我甚至可能会有一些巧克力，所以带上你的朋友！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marvin [0300233E] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNMarvinChi_00002BE5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fowler? I don't know any Fowler. I'm a local, see. I'm just here to help out these kids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 福勒？我不认识什么福勒。我是本地人，明白吗？我只是来帮助这些孩子的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marvin [0300233E] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNMarvinInt_00002BF0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for information on your boss, Fowler.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找你老大的信息，福勒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He recoils from the blow and then doubles over, unable to breath. It takes him several moments to compose himself.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他因为这一击向后退缩，然后弯下腰，喘不过气。他花了好一会儿才使自己镇静下来。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marvin [0300233E] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, okay! He... he's at the hideout by the Northern Passage. Calls it "The Junction". Ships most of their kids up north.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧！他...他在北部通道的藏身处，称之为“枢纽”。把大部分孩子运到北方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marvin [0300233E] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNMarvinInt_00002BF9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait! You'll need me to get in. I have to escort you... unless you've got a kid to sell. Give me a moment and I'll take you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等！你会需要我。我得护送你...除非你有孩子要卖。等我一下，我带你去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marvin [0300233E] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNMarvinInt_00002BF9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Punch him in the liver> This is just a taste of the pain I can dish out. Give me Fowler.
ESP.TRADUIT: <一拳打在他的肝脏上>这只是我能给你带来的痛苦的一小部分，把福勒交出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, uh, uh... he, he's at a place. It's called "The Junction". By the Northern Passage. All the kids are there. Ships them north. Lots of buyers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，呃，呃...他，他在一个地方，叫做“枢纽”，在北部通道附近。所有的孩子都在那里，把他们运到北方，有很多买家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marvin [0300233E] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNMarvinInt_00002BF7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need me to get in, unless you're bringing a kid to sell. Can't get in if you kill me, okay? Please don't hurt me. I'm just doing my job!
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要我才能进去，除非你带着孩子去卖。杀了我就进不去了，知道吗？请不要伤害我，我只是做我的工作！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marvin [0300233E] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNMarvinInt_00002BF7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me Fowler or I'll hang you from that overpass and empty your guts out for the rats to eat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把福勒交出来，不然我就把你吊在天桥上，把你的肠子掏出来给老鼠吃。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, that's a serious accusation! You are way off-base. I'm a resident of New Vegas. I'm taking time out of my day to help these kids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，这可是个严重的指控！你大错特错了。我是新拉斯维加斯的居民，我从每天的工作中抽出时间来帮助这些孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marvin [0300233E] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNMarvinInt_00002BF1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This... this is a paranoid delusion. Go play vigilante with someone else. I wouldn't hurt anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个...这是一种偏执的妄想。去找别人玩治安维持会吧，我不会伤害任何人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marvin [0300233E] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNMarvinInt_00002BF1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you're taking kids to Fowler. Tell us where he is and you might live to see tomorrow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你要带孩子去找福勒。告诉我们他在哪里，你也许能活到明天。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you understand. We're just meeting the desires of our clients, nothing more. Who's to say that one desire is worse than the others?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你也清楚，我们只是满足客户的需求，仅此而已。谁又能说哪一种欲望比其他欲望更糟糕呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marvin [0300233E] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNMarvinCan_00002BF4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fowler runs a hidden pleasure den to the north, "The Junction". We keep the property there before shipping most of them up north.
ESP.TRADUIT: 福勒在北边经营着一个隐蔽的娱乐场所，“枢纽”。我们先把财产留在那里，然后再把大部分货物运到北方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marvin [0300233E] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNMarvinCan_00002BF4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll have to have me escort you if you want to get in. Otherwise you have to bring captives to sell. Only children. Extra for redheads...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想进去，得让我护送你，否则就只能带着俘虏去卖了。只要孩子，红头发的额外补贴...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marvin [0300233E] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNMarvinCan_00002BF4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We all have our hidden urges. I just want to talk business with Fowler, nothing more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都有隐藏的欲望。我只是想和福勒谈谈生意，没别的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Okay, okay. Can't be too careful with all these do-gooders around. Bad enough I have to pay off these local hoodlums.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]好吧，好吧。身边有这么多好心人，怎么小心都不为过。我还得付钱给当地的流氓就够糟了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marvin [0300233E] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNMarvinInt_00002BF6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fowler runs a joint called "The Junction" up by the Northern Passage. It's well-hidden. Entrance is very secure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 福勒在北部通道旁边开了一家叫"枢纽"的娱乐场所。它隐藏得很好，入口非常安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marvin [0300233E] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNMarvinInt_00002BF6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll need me to escort you unless you're bringing a live captive. We can head that way as soon as you're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要我护送你，除非你带了一个活的俘虏。等你准备好了，我们就往那边走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marvin [0300233E] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNMarvinInt_00002BF6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> Marvin, it's okay. We're not here to hurt anybody. We just want to talk business.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>马尔文，没事的，我们不是来伤害任何人的。我们只是想谈谈生意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Uh, I don't know what you're talking about... furthermore, your argument is... flawed.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]呃，我不知道你在说什么...此外，你的论点是...有缺陷的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marvin [0300233E] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNMarvinInt_00002BF8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kids these days are lazy. Spending time in slavery will instill a strong work ethic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在的孩子都很懒，当过一段时间奴隶可以培养一种强烈的职业道德。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Born here, fucker. Mom left me with the Followers and they did their best. I'm just too much of a badass for those nerds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里出生的，混蛋，妈妈把我留给了天启追随者，他们尽了最大努力。对那些书呆子来说，我太凶了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoBa_0000AF6B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got enslaved for a bit but eventually escaped. Seen a lot of my friends get snatched up over the years. They just disappear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 被奴役了一段时间，但最终逃脱了。这些年我看到了很多朋友被抓，他们就这么消失了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoBa_0000AF6B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you end up in Freeside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么到自由城来了?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, more or less. Weren't no collars or chains but that's what it was. Called it indented certitude or something... but it's slavery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，差不多吧。没有项圈或锁链，但就是这样。叫它缩进确定性还是什么的...但这是奴隶制。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoBa_0000AF6C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Head honcho guy was easily distracted, so I slipped away first chance I got. Some others might've gotten out, too. Heard shotgun blasts as I ran.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老大很容易分心，所以我一有机会就溜走了。其他的人可能也逃出来了，我跑的时候听到了霰弹枪的爆炸声。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoBa_0000AF6C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Funny... the thing I remember is the singing. Whenever I stab a hobo... I imagine it's him. It makes the voices quiet for a little while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣...我只记得歌声。每次我捅流浪汉的时候...我都会想这是他，能让声音安静一会儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoBa_0000AF6C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were enslaved?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你被奴役了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Okay, okay. Never let it be said that Ronaldo doesn't help his friends, okay? They won't suspect a thing, I promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]好吧，好吧。不要让人说罗纳尔多不帮助他的朋友，好吗？他们不会怀疑的，我保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoRe_00002C0E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The world is minus one Marvin thanks to us. How about a gesture of friendship?
ESP.TRADUIT: 多亏了我们，这个世界少了一个马尔文。来点友谊的表示怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Hell no, most of those little bastards are my competition! I'm scrapping day and night just to get a piece of rat.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]当然不想，那些小混蛋大多是我的竞争对手！我没日没夜地干活就为了弄到一块老鼠肉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoRe_00003BDF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you want to help save your friends?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不想救你的朋友吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a fucking bargain, you'll see. "Mister, I'm so lonely. Please take me back to your dark dungeon." Then we'll butcher those perverts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈是个便宜货，等着瞧吧。“先生，我好孤独，请把我带回你们黑暗的地牢吧。”然后我们就杀了那些变态！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoRe_00002C0C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Pay 200 caps> Here's the caps. You better be worth it.
ESP.TRADUIT: <支付200瓶盖>给你瓶盖，你最好值得。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like your moxy. Gonna kill my margins, but since it's for a good cause... fine, I'm in. Now let's go stab some perverts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢你的勇气。我的利润会减少，但既然是出于正当的理由...好吧，我加入。现在我们去捅死那些变态吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoRe_0000AF65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you want to knife these bastards. You should be paying me. Make it a hundred.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你想捅死这些混蛋，你应该付我钱。那就一百吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of these kids are idiots or downright feral. Good luck catching them, much less having a conversation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些孩子大多是白痴或彻头彻尾的野蛮人。想要逮到他们就很麻烦了，更别说交谈了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoRe_0000AF66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, go ahead with that. Try the crier twerp. He pisses all over himself when he's nervous, not to mention he shrieks. High quality.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，去吧，试试那个爱哭的笨蛋。他一紧张就尿得满地都是，更别提他还会尖叫。高品质。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoRe_0000AF66_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet one of these other kids would do it for less. Fifty caps is my final offer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢打赌这些孩子中肯定有人会为了更少的钱这么做，50瓶盖是我的最终报价。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not a redhead, so it's standard rates. Special client likes the gingers. We got booze and chems, so make yourself at home...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是红头发的，所以是标准价格，特别的客户喜欢红发。这里有酒和药品，不要拘束...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Guard [03002F79] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult05\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNFowlerGua_00003360_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get ready to bleed, perverts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好流血吧，变态们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNFowlerGua_00003361_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why in the sweet cinnamon fuck would I do that? I'd be bored out of my mind sitting around in that crappy, old fort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈的为什么要这么做？坐在那破旧的堡垒里我会无聊到发疯的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoFi_000035E9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you should join the Followers and get an education.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你应该加入天启追随者，接受教育。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I, uh... yes, yes! I'll do it! I'll hit the books, no acting up! I swear on my mama's grave!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我，呃...好的，好的！我会的！我要用功读书，不捣乱！我对着我妈妈的坟墓发誓！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Start studying with the Followers or I'll beat your ass like I was your daddy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟天启追随者一起学习不然我就像揍你爸一样揍你一顿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I, uh... yes, yes! I'll do it! I'll hit the books, no acting up! I swear on my mama's grave!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我，呃...好的，好的！我会的！我要用功读书，不捣乱！我对着我妈妈的坟墓发誓！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Start studying with the Followers or I'll beat your ass like I was your momma.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟天启追随者一起学习不然我就像揍你妈一样揍你一顿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Well... okay, I'll give them another shot. I'll try to be... less bad. I won't stab anyone, but no promises on fistfights!
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]嗯...好吧，我再给他们一次机会，我会试着...不那么坏。我不会刺伤任何人，但不会保证不打架！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoFi_00003BD9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay hard and keep killing perverts for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续努力，继续为我杀变态。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoFi_00003BD9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Freeside is a dead end. The Followers are your best ticket out of there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自由城是一条死胡同，天启追随者是你离开那里的最佳途径。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Bullshit. Virtue is not a reward. Rewards are the damn rewards! I want caps! Dinner that isn't roaches or rats! That's a fucking reward!
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]扯淡。美德不是回报，回报就是该死的回报！我要瓶盖！不要蟑螂和老鼠当晚餐！这就是他妈的回报！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoFi_00003BDA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Followers will help you lead a virtuous life, and that is its own reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天启追随者会帮助你过上一种高尚的生活，这本身就是一种回报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I'll do that. Thanks for the advice. Never pictured myself tied to one place anyway. Don't go getting soft. No mercy to perverts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我会的。谢谢你的建议，我从没想过自己会被绑在一个地方。不要心软，对变态绝不留情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoFi_00003BDD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The world is a lot bigger than Freeside. Hit the road and don't look back. You'll be fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 世界比自由城大得多。上路吧，不要回头，你会没事的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... thanks? Fuck it, I had fun. Good luck with your killing spree. See you around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...谢谢？去他妈的，我玩得很开心。祝你杀人顺利，回头见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronaldo [0300230F] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleChild01\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNRonaldoFi_00003BDE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not my problem, kid. Do what you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不关我的事，小子。做你想做的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lee, is that you? What are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 李，是你吗？你在这里做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anne [03003BB3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleGhoul02\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNAnneLeeScen_00003BB8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anne, I... just didn't expect to run into you. I'm... uh, I'm helping a friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安妮，我...我没想到会遇到你。我...呃，我在帮助一个朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNAnneLeeScen_00003BB9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Well, I... that's good to hear. As for me... I got caught trying to bust these kids out. Thanks for freeing them... and me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？嗯，我...很高兴听到你这么说。至于我...我在帮这些孩子越狱时被抓了，谢谢你救了他们...还有我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anne [03003BB3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleGhoul02\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNAnneLeeScen_00003BBA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Couldn't get the Kings or anyone from NCR to lift a finger, so you know me... had to do something. Not as sneaky as I used to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 猫王帮和NCR的任何人都帮不上忙，所以你知道我...总得做点什么。不像我以前那么鬼鬼祟祟了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anne [03003BB3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kids have been going missing for months. It's tough. We could sure use your help back in Freeside. You were always a good teacher, Patrick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几个月来一直有孩子失踪，这很艰难。我们在自由城确实需要你的帮助，你一直是个好老师，帕特里克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anne [03003BB3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I, uh... there's no chance, Anne. Not after all I've done. You don't even know the half of it. Can't go back to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我，呃...没机会了，安妮。毕竟我做了那么多事，你连一半都不知道。再也回不去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNAnneLeeScen_00003BBB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you're not an angel, Patrick. Most of that was so long ago that the smoothies wouldn't remember. I know you aren't all bad inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你不是天使，帕特里克，大部分都是很久以前的事了，滑皮们都不记得了。我知道你内心并不坏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anne [03003BB3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleUniqueNarrator\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNAnneLeeScen_00003BBC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you've done, I'd certainly be willing to forgive you if you started clean. You ain't Edward Sallow, honey. Help others and you'll heal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管你做了什么，只要你改过自新，我当然愿意原谅你，你又不是爱德华·萨隆，亲爱的。帮助别人，你就会痊愈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anne [03003BB3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I wasn't ready for this. To see you, to hear this. Truth is... hard to forgive myself, not sure if I could do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我对此没有做好准备。见到你，听到这些，事实是...我很难原谅自己，不确定我是否能做到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNAnneLeeScen_00003BBD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if... I got pressing business with these folks. Probably won't see you again, Anne. Please stay safe... and don't do this again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使...我跟这些人有紧急事务要处理，也许再也见不到你了，安妮。请注意安全...别再这么做了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forgive as the Lord forgave you, Patrick. Don't forget it. I... I still think of you. Stay safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 像上帝原谅你一样原谅别人吧，帕特里克。别忘了，我...我还是会想起你。注意安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anne [03003BB3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleUniqueNarrator\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNAnneLeeScen_00003BBE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye, Anne.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见，安妮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNAnneLeeScen_00003BBF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd appreciate it if you didn't mention that conversation to anyone, especially Walker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你不要跟任何人提起这次谈话，尤其是沃克，我会很感激的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeePostAnne_00003BC1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anne, a scientist I worked with... closely. She was at the dig site when I got exposed... nursed me as I inched ever so closely to death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安妮，一个和我一起工作过的科学家...很亲密。我暴露的时候她也在挖掘现场...在我一步步接近死亡的时候照顾着我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeePostAnne_00003BC6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She brought me back, convinced me to keep living even after the change. I... I cared about her. Goddamn, I wish I hadn't seen her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她让我起死回生，说服我即使改变了也要继续活下去。我...我在乎她，该死，我真希望没见过她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeePostAnne_00003BC6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's as if I accidently opened the page on an old book I'd closed long ago... looked right into a life I left behind. She saw right through me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就好像我无意中打开了一本很久以前就合上的旧书...直视着我身后的生活。她一眼就看穿了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeePostAnne_00003BC6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd rather tap dance through the Divide than have to look her in the eyes again. Damn it all to hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我宁愿跳着踢踏舞穿过大裂谷也不要再看着她的眼睛。都见鬼去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeePostAnne_00003BC6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who was she?
ESP.TRADUIT: 她是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. You don't come back from this, from what I've done. I made my choices, I own it. But... maybe... can't afford to think about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你不会从我做的事情中恢复过来的。我做出了自己的选择，我拥有它。但是...也许...我想不起来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeePostAnne_00003BC7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We got no time for this navel-gazing nonsense. There's a job to do, and only two of us are walking away from it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们没时间听这些无聊的废话了。我们有工作要做，而且只有两个人可以离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeePostAnne_00003BC7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's right. Behind all the bluster and bravado there's still good in you. I can see it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她说得对，在这些虚张声势的背后，你还是善良的。我能看见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't I know it. What's the line? “You will always be fond of me. I represent to you all the sins you never had the courage to commit.”
ESP.TRADUIT: 难道我不知道吗？那句话怎么说的？“你会永远喜欢我的，我代表你们犯下所有你们不敢犯的罪。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeePostAnne_00003BC8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's goddamn right, and I plan to keep it that way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说得太对了，我打算一直保持下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeePostAnne_00003BC8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I damn sure won't be trusting you. Once an outlaw, always an outlaw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我绝对不会相信你的。一日为不法之徒，终生为不法之徒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right as ever. There's more blood to spill and a pot of gold waiting at the end of this journey. Lead on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一如既往。在这段旅程的终点，还有更多的鲜血和一罐金子在等待着你。带路吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeePostAnne_00003BC9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll respect your privacy. In the meantime, we need to focus on the task at hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会尊重你的隐私。与此同时，我们需要专注于手头的任务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thick, powerful strokes. Full bodies in motion. Quivering sinews. Violence. Beauty. God. It's all there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 粗壮，强力的一击。整个身体在运动。颤抖的肌肉。暴力。美。神。都在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamIntro_00003FB7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you a thief or an assassin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是小偷还是刺客？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamIntro_00003FB7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How droll. A thief and a murderer. I suspect you didn't come here of your own volition. I'm hardly a known item. No, someone sent you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多滑稽啊，小偷和杀人犯。我怀疑你不是自愿到这里来的，我不怎么出名。不，是有人派你来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamIntroY_000042A1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Long list of potential sponsors. The Peeps? Too cheap. Bodeen? No, you're not one of his usual toadies. Walker? No. He was broken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 潜在赞助商的名单很长。窥视者？太便宜了；博丁？不，你不是他平时惯用的马屁精；沃克？不，他已经崩溃了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamIntroY_000042A1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He takes a moment to scan your face. His expression twists into a sardonic grin when he makes his conclusion.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他花了一点时间扫描你的脸。当他作出结论时，他的表情变成了嘲讽的笑容。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is Walker. Pure vengeance made manifest. I love it. I suspect you want to avoid trouble with Marcus. Commendable. Take me to Walker, now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是沃克。纯粹的复仇表现出来了，我很喜欢，我怀疑你是想避免和马库斯发生冲突，值得称赞。带我去见沃克，马上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamIntroY_000042A1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: These are all reprints, sadly. Why here? Why me? There is nothing of value... no, I can smell the lies from here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很遗憾，这些都是再版。为什么在这里？为什么是我？没有什么值钱的东西...不，我从这里就能闻到谎言的味道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamIntroT_000042A3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The question is which of my old employers wants to do away with me now? Robert is long gone, along with Richter. Not Bodeen. Too soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题是我以前的雇主中谁现在想除掉我？罗伯特和里克特早就不在了，也不是博丁，太快了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamIntroT_000042A3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't about money... it's pure, cold-blooded revenge. Walker, I suspect. Justifiable. He'll be direct, brutal. I can't wait. Take me to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这与钱无关...这是纯粹的、冷血的复仇。我猜是沃克，合理，他会直接粗暴。我等不及了，带我去见他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamIntroT_000042A3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> Thief.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>小偷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: "But when a god sends harm, no man can sidestep it, no matter how strong he may be." I won't shirk a fight to the death. I welcome it.
ESP.TRADUIT: “但当上帝带来伤害时，没有人能逃避，无论他有多么强大。”我是不会逃避战斗的，我对此表示欢迎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamIntroA_000042A4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you... you're not acting alone. Who's the puppeteer? The Booths? Dead. Richter? Dead. Gray? No, I'm too valuable. This isn't about money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是你...你不是单独行动，谁是操纵木偶的人？布斯吗？死了；里克特？死了；格雷？不，我太贵了。这与钱无关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamIntroA_000042A4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either you're a suicidal maniac... or you're helping Walker. He would do it, wouldn't he? And he'd be right. I look forward to it. Take me to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要么你是个有自杀倾向的疯子...不然你就是在帮沃克。他会这么做的，不是吗？他是对的，我很期待，带我去见他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamIntroA_000042A4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Assassin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 刺客。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Laughter>
ESP.TRADUIT: <笑声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamIntroN_000042A5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... you are as much an art dealer as I'm president. God, I needed that. Thank you. So, you're here to kill me, I presume?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...我是总统，你也是艺术品商人。天哪，我需要这个，谢谢你！我猜，你是来杀我的吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me guess... The brothers? No. El Reloj? Too far. Dickman? Possible, but not her style. The others are dead or gone east. No, this is personal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我猜猜...兄弟俩？不对。埃尔雷诺吗？太远了；迪克曼？有可能，但不是她的风格；其他人不是死了就是往东去了，不，这是私人恩怨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamIntroN_000042A5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That narrows it down. Walker. An avenging angel in the flesh. He must be impressive now, reborn in pure rage. I have to see it. Take me to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就缩小了范围。沃克，一个复仇天使的肉身。他现在一定很厉害，在纯粹的愤怒中重生。我一定要看看，带我去见他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamIntroN_000042A5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> Neither. I'm an art dealer.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>都不是，我是个艺术品商人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attempted assassinations are routine for me. I've ripped off barons, senators and warlords from here to Tacoma.
ESP.TRADUIT: 企图暗杀对我来说是司空见惯的事。从这里到塔科马，我敲诈过贵族，参议员和军阀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNWithWalke_000042A8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I stole an eagle from the Legion garrison in Kingman. A frumentarius tracked me down. I plucked out his eyes and sent him back. Like Basil.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从金曼的军团驻地偷了一只鹰。一个军团特务找到了我，我挖出了他的眼睛，把他送回去了。就像巴西尔二世。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNWithWalke_000042A8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their hit squads still harass me from time to time when I'm travelling. Once butchered an entire caravan I was accompanying. Poor souls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我旅行的时候，他们的刺杀小组仍然时不时地骚扰我。曾经屠杀了我随行的一整个车队，可怜的灵魂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNWithWalke_000042A8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's also a wealth of psychopathic employers who'd love to have me erased. I can blackmail them all, of course. Very unforgiving people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有很多精神变态的雇主想把我抹掉。当然，我可以勒索他们所有人，都是不可饶恕的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNWithWalke_000042A8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem unsurprised that someone is here to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人要杀你，你似乎一点都不惊讶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Recovering and preserving art is my great passion, at least since I left the Master's service so long ago. I steal it if necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恢复和保存艺术是我最大的热情，至少在我很久以前离开主教的服务之后就是这样了。如果有必要，我就偷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNWithWalke_00004B66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Often you can find these reprints and other antiquities adorning the musty lodge of an illiterate warlord. Even the simplest minds recognize beauty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你经常可以在一个不识字的军阀的发霉的住所里找到这些复制品和其他古董的装饰。即使是最简单的头脑也能识别美。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNWithWalke_00004B66_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I simply pluck them away to safety. I have a great collection in safe keeping. These are just my personal favorites from decades of... acquisition.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是把它们拖到安全的地方，我有很多东西收藏在安全的地方。这些都是我几十年来最喜欢的...收购。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNWithWalke_00004B66_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope to pass this collection to the Followers or some other responsible entity after I'm gone. Beauty will save the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望在我死后能把这些收藏品交给天启追随者或其他负责任的实体。美可以拯救世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNWithWalke_00004B66_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you manage to collect all those paintings?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么收集到这些画的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, Peter. My closest friend. I found him as a wandering, half-starved pup after his mother perished. Oh, he was a pitiful sight then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，彼得，我最亲密的朋友。他母亲死后，我发现他时，他还是一只流浪的半饥半饱的小狗，噢，那时候他的样子真可怜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_000042AB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: An unruly indigent wanted to eat him. I smashed his head with a rock and let Peter feast on his brains. I believe it enhanced his cognition.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个不守规矩的穷人想要吃掉他，我用石头砸烂了他的头，让彼得尽情享用他的脑浆。我相信这增强了他的认知能力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_000042AB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's utterly loyal and a good companion, though combat is not his forte. More of a spectator than participant. Good nose, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他非常忠诚，是个好伙伴，尽管战斗不是他的强项。与其说是参与者，不如说是旁观者。不过鼻子很灵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_000042AB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's with the coyote?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这头郊狼是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I enjoy stealing things. The challenge of remaining unseen... taking what I want with none the wiser... it's indescribably gratifying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢偷东西。保持不被发现的挑战...拿走我想要的东西，没有人知道...这是一种难以形容的满足感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_000042BD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bodeen may look the mindless thug, but he's a shrewd organizer and he pays well. He's also loyal, at least by criminal standards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 博丁可能看起来是个没头脑的暴徒，但他是个精明的组织者，而且报酬丰厚。他也很忠诚，至少从犯罪的标准来看是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_000042BD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He hired me for my expertise and honored the deal. Even paid a bonus. Fair man, though he could be... intemperate. Sensitive to criticism.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他因为我的专业知识而雇佣了我，并履行了协议，甚至还发了奖金。他是个公平的人，虽然他可能...没有节制，对批评很敏感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_000042BD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suspect that's why he shot Walker's wife. God, what a battle axe. Cursed the man in English and Spanish so badly that it made me blush.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怀疑这就是他射杀沃克妻子的原因。天啊，真是个悍妇，用英语和西班牙语咒骂那个人，骂得我都脸红了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some men would've ignored it... but Bodeen... well, I estimate he viewed it as an affront to his delicate ego. Childish in hindsight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些男人会无视...但是博丁...我估计他认为这是对他脆弱自尊的侮辱。事后看来很幼稚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_000042BD_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Walker's entitled to kill all the robbers, of course. I'll make no excuses. I was there. That's the life we chose, with its uncaring consequences.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，沃克有权杀死所有劫匪。我不会找借口，我当时在场。这就是我们选择的生活，以及它冷漠无情的后果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_000042BD_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you get mixed up with Bodeen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么跟博丁扯上关系的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Many of them are deceased or wandered away, reduced to myth. Take Robert, for example. Charming man, blessed with a green thumb.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们中的许多人已经去世或流落他乡，沦为神话。以罗伯特为例，有魅力的男人，有园艺天赋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_000042BE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I worked for his organization sporadically, made a good sum. They just... collapsed one day. Rumors abound. Probably infighting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我偶尔为他的组织工作，赚了不少钱。他们就是...有一天崩溃了。谣言四起，可能是内讧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_000042BE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the thing with these criminal groups. All the furtive conspiracies and profiteering can be undone in an instant when egos collide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些犯罪集团就是这样，所有的秘密阴谋和牟取暴利都可以在自我意识碰撞的瞬间被摧毁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_000042BE_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear stories, though. The strangest... is that Robert escaped the calamity and walked east, only to be enslaved. Terrible fate. I hope he's well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我也听说过一些故事。最奇怪的是...罗伯特逃过了劫难，向东走，结果却成了奴隶。可怕的命运，我希望他一切都好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_000042BE_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who were some of the past employers you mentioned?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你提到的过去的雇主都有哪些？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tonya Dickman, another member of Robert's organization. Vile harpy, that one. I'd rather gargle magma than be in a room with that witch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 托尼娅·迪克曼，罗伯特组织的另一名成员。邪恶的鹰身女妖，那个，我宁愿用岩浆漱口，也不愿和那个女巫共处一室。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_000042BF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gray, the mercenary. That was only one job. Hard man, but fair. No complaints. Mercenaries are overly maligned, I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格雷，雇佣兵，那只是一份工作。是个严厉的人，但很公平，没什么可抱怨的。我认为，雇佣兵受到了过度的诽谤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_000042BF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everything else was far beyond the Mojave, and usually short-term. I've forgotten most of them, save the Master. Impossible to forget.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他的一切都远在莫哈维沙漠之外，而且通常是短期的。除了主教，大部分我都忘了，这个没法忘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_000042BF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other employers of note?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其他有名的雇主吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surely you jest. No? Very well. [He takes a deep breath in anticipation.]
ESP.TRADUIT: 你肯定是在开玩笑，不是吗？好吧。[他深吸一口气，满怀期待。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_00006EC9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was a master. Not just a master, but criminally underappreciated. Unjustly maligned due to his association with the Counter-Reformation, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个大师，他不仅是大师，而且被严重低估了。由于他与反宗教改革运动的联系，他也受到了不公正的诽谤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_00006EC9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He captured the energy, the movement of life, all our passions. Lust. Hate. Raw menace pumping through muscles. Life is not still.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他捕捉到了生命的能量，生命的运动，我们所有的激情、欲望、仇恨，原始的威胁在肌肉中涌动，生命不是静止的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_00006EC9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take The Massacre of the Innocents. Bared breasts, bloody swords. Dead Babies. Piles of dead babies. It's our beautiful, hideous reality.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以《对无辜者的屠杀》为例。赤裸的胸膛，血淋淋的刀剑，死去的婴儿，成堆的婴儿尸体。这是我们美丽又丑陋的现实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_00006EC9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, the world is a fine place and worth fighting for... but sometimes you have to step over dead babies. That's the lesson!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，这个世界很美好，值得我们为之奋斗...但有时你不得不跨过死去的婴儿。这是教训！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_00006EC9_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to ask - why Rubens?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不得不问，为什么是鲁本斯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: After the Master's demise I was... well, lost. I wandered into a ghost town and found a pre-war bank with its vault intact. I became obsessed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主教死后，我...嗯，迷茫了。我走进一座鬼城，发现了一家战前的银行，金库完好无损，我着迷了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_0000BB6C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was the challenge... that's it. There's power in accessing something that's forbidden or sealed away. Many of them are time capsules.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个挑战...就是这样。获得被禁止或封印的东西是一种力量，其中很多都是时间胶囊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_0000BB6C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soft hands are the key. You have to listen with your fingertips. My personal best is cracking a Gruffudder in under five minutes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 柔软的手是关键，你必须用指尖倾听。我的个人最好成绩是在五分钟内破解一个Gruffudder。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_0000BB6C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you get started as a safecracker?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么开始撬保险箱的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll continue wandering with Peter at my side, steal... er, recovering art when I find it. I'll be more selective about my employers, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会继续和彼得一起流浪，偷...呃，当我发现艺术品的时候就去回收。不过，我会对我的雇主更加挑剔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_00006EBC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My time in Jacobstown has been brief, but I've enjoyed it immensely. I'd like to rest there in between my travels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在雅各布斯镇的时间很短，但我非常享受。我想在旅行间隙在那里休息一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_00006EBC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Permit me to inquire - what will you do? Any grand schemes for a wanderer like yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 请允许我问一问...你打算怎么办？像你这样的流浪者有什么宏伟的计划吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamBackgr_00006EBC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you going to do after all of this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 经历了这一切之后，你打算做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to see you, Walker. I'm sorry... Lee? Why? You fool, I'll have to kill you now. I rather liked you. What are you doing with Walker?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴见到你，沃克，我很抱歉...李？为什么？你这笨蛋，我只能杀了你了，我挺喜欢你的。你和沃克在一起做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamScene_000042B3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some insults have to be repaid with interest. As for being with Walker... that was not the plan. Not at all. Couldn't exactly refuse his offer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些侮辱是要以牙还牙的。至于和沃克在一起...这不是我的计划，完全不是。我不能拒绝他的提议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamScene_000042B4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck it. "All is for the best in the best of possible worlds." Right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 去他妈的。“在理想的最美好世界中一切都是为最美好的目的而设。”对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck it. "All is for the best in the best of possible worlds." Right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 去他妈的。“在理想的最美好世界中一切都是为最美好的目的而设。”对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Indeed it is. What about you, Walker? Any grim words to offer before we begin our pas de deux... or more accurately, pas de quatre?
ESP.TRADUIT: 的确如此。你呢，沃克？在我们开始双人舞之前，还有什么难听的话要说吗...或者更准确的说，四人舞？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamScene_000042B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You talk too much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你话太多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamScene_00004B57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come, Peter. Battle awaits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，彼得。战斗在等待着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamCallPe_000042B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I yield. I'd understand if you want to finish me off. I won't beg. I'll accept terms if you offer them, though. I can be an ally to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我屈服，如果你想干掉我，我也能理解，我不会乞求。不过，如果你提出条件，我可以接受，我可以成为你的盟友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamYield_00004B59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: More than fair. I know the way to his home up in Arrow Canyon. It can be a perilous route if you don't know the area. I can help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常公平。我知道他在箭头峡谷的家怎么走，如果你不熟悉这个地区，这可能是一条危险的路线。我可以帮忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamYield_00004B5E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Terms? How about you help us take down Bodeen, for starters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 条件？首先，你帮我们拿下博丁怎么样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Understood. I am at your mercy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 理解。我听凭你的摆布。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamYieldT_00004B5F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll talk to Walker, but I make no promises.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会和沃克谈谈，但我不能保证。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So be it. I only ask that you spare Peter. He's a good boy and wholly innocent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样吧，我只求你放过彼得。他是个好孩子，完全是无辜的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamYieldK_00004B61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time to lift the veil and see the other side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是时候揭开面纱，看看另一面了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamYieldK_00004B61_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> You have to pay, Sam. Can't talk your way out of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>你必须付出代价，山姆。这事你光说没用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was... he was still part of it. I... yeah, you're right. God knows I'm paying for my mistakes. He can pay for his, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是...他仍然是其中的一员，我...嗯，你说得对。上帝知道我在为我的错误付出代价，他也能付得起他的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerSamSu_00004B79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a thief, not a trigger-puller. He didn't kill anyone in Silver Springs. Give him a chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个小偷，不是扣扳机的。他没在银泉杀过人，给他一个机会吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry? Sorry won't bring my wife back! He can say "Sorry" in hell for all I care!
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉？抱歉不能让我妻子起死回生！就算他在地狱里说抱歉，我也不在乎！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerSamSu_00004B7A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think he's sorry for what he did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得他对自己的所作所为感到抱歉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do like the idea of travelling at night. It still doesn't sit right with me, but I'll trust your judgment. You've done right by me so far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确实喜欢夜间旅行这个主意。我还是觉得不对劲，但我会相信你的判断，到目前为止，你做得还不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerSamSu_00004B7C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sam and I work well in the dark. With the two of us scouting we could move better at night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 山姆和我在黑暗中工作得很好。有了我们俩的侦察，晚上行动起来就方便多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're the guide, so I'll trust your judgment. You're responsible for him, though. He sneaks off or double-crosses us.. you're paying for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是向导，所以我相信你的判断。不过你得对他负责，他偷偷溜走或出卖我们，你要为此付出代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerSamSu_00004B7B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lee mentioned that Bodeen is in Arrow Canyon. I don't know that area. We should bring Sam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李提到过博丁在箭头峡谷。我不了解那个地区，我们应该带上山姆。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A stealthy brahmin... of all the dumbass reasons... you know what? Fine. He's your responsibility. He fucks up, it's on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 潜行的婆罗门牛...在所有这些愚蠢的理由中...你知道吗？很好，他是你的责任，他搞砸了，全怪你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerSamSu_00004B7D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know all about the difficulties of long trips. He'd be like a stealthy pack brahmin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道长途旅行的种种困难，他就像头潜行的婆罗门牛。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Grim work, but it's gotta be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任务艰巨，但必须完成。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerSamSu_00004B71_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack Sam> Very well, let's get this over with.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击山姆>很好，让我们赶快结束吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, Sam. You'll guide us to Bodeen and help us kill him. Do all that, keep your word... and you're free. You owe this courier your life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，山姆。你会带我们找到博丁，帮我们杀了他。做到这些，遵守诺言...你就自由了。你欠这个邮差一条命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamHiredS_00004B74_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, Walker. I give you my word. You're a good man. For what it's worth, I'm sorry about what happened to Jessica. Wasn't right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，沃克，我向你保证。你是个好人，不管怎样，我对杰西卡的遭遇感到很抱歉。这是不对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamHiredS_00004B75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you say her fucking name. Not ever. You're on thin ice, mutant. Don't push it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别他妈叫她的名字，永远不要。你现在处境艰难，变种人。别逼我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamHiredS_00004B76_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sam, I know you're a Francophone, so let me put it to you in the language of King Louis: shut the fuck up... at least until Bodeen is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 山姆，我知道你说法语，所以让我用路易国王的语言对你说：你他妈闭嘴...至少在博丁死之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamHiredS_00004B77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Je comprends. Merci.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了，谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamHiredS_00004B78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's lurking around here somewhere. Probably picking cactus fruit. Wait, here he comes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他就藏在这附近，大概是在采摘仙人掌果实吧。等等，他来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeWhereThe_00005265_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you seen Sam?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到山姆了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The three of us should be able to handle Bodeen. After... well, Walker is just a bit too much for me alone. However... the two of us could manage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们三个应该能搞定博丁，之后...我一个人对付不了沃克。然而...我们两个可以。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeConspire_00005553_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll square up with him once Bodeen is dead. No guarantees, but it's worth the risk. We'll split the entire haul, fifty-fifty. How about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 博丁一死，我们就跟他算账。不能保证，但值得冒这个险。我们把所有的钱平分，五五分，怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeConspire_00005553_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you have in mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么想法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. Nobility is a nice luxury to have when your pockets are full.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。当你的口袋鼓鼓的时候，高贵是一种美好的奢侈品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeConspire_00005552_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want no part in whatever you're planning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想参与你的计划。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I figured as much. Little shit-stirring snake, that's what he is. I wish he would try it. Wipe that smarmy grin right off his rotten face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也猜到了，他就是个搅屎的卑鄙小人。我希望他能试试，把他那张臭脸上的谄媚笑容抹去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerDivul_00005556_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep up the act with him. Hell, boost his confidence. When he throws down... the two of us will make short work of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续跟他玩，见鬼，给他点信心。当他倒下的时候...我们两个人很快就能搞定他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerDivul_00005556_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should know that Lee is planning to kill you once Bodeen is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该知道，一旦博丁死了，李就会杀了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do that. You should also think about the blood and sweat you're spilling for this man. Five percent is not enough. Not by a long shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就这么做。你也应该想想你为这个男人付出了多少血汗，百分之五是不够的，绝对不行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeConspire_00005554_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, he's got a deathwish. He's saving the last bullet for himself once he returns that money. Let's put him out of his misery. Think on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说了，他有求死的愿望。等他把钱还回去，他就会把最后一颗子弹留给自己。让我们结束他的痛苦吧，好好想想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeConspire_00005554_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll think about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会考虑的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew you still had some brains knocking around up there. This is a good deal for all of us, including Walker. Man needs to be put to rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就知道你还挺有头脑的。这对我们所有人都是好事，包括沃克。人是需要安息的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeConspire_00005555_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll know when the time comes. Of course... Bodeen could kill us all, so what the hell. At least we have a plan, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到时候你就知道了。当然...博丁可能会把我们都杀了，管他呢。但至少我们还有个计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeConspire_00005555_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fifty-fifty split? Count me in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 五五分成？算我一个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm drinking in the wild air, friend. I'm intoxicated by nature, truly. So long as it's not devilishly hot, I enjoy my time outdoors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在享受这狂野的空气，朋友。我陶醉在大自然中，真的，只要天气不是特别热，我就喜欢在户外的时光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeCampfire_0000692C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a lot of caps... could live the quiet life for a few decades. Been stuck in this loop of chems, debt and outlaw shit for a long time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有很多瓶盖...可以过上几十年平静的生活。我被困在毒品，债务和不法之徒的循环中很久了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think? Any chance that an old crook like me could get a clean slate?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么看？像我这样的老骗子有可能改过自新吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeCampfire_0000692C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are you holding up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, for once I am putting aside the snark and chicanery. We've been watching each other's backs for a while now. I... sort of trust you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，就这一次，我要把你的挖苦和欺骗放在一边。我们互相照应已经有一段时间了，我...有点信任你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeCampfire_00006EB4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So how about it? You think I can live in civilization again? Be a taxpaying, do-good citizen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那怎么说？你觉得我还能回到文明世界吗？做一个纳税、行善的好公民？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeCampfire_00006EB4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you pulling my leg or really asking for my opinion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是在跟我开玩笑还是真的在征求我的意见？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We move at dawn. Reminds me of an operation I pulled outside Topaz Lake. We pushed out those raider scum with extreme prejudice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们黎明出发。让我想起了我在托帕兹湖外的一次行动，我们带着极端的偏见赶走了那些掠夺者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_0000691A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure how much action you've seen, but it should be a serious fight. Bodeen's probably managed to build up a small army by this point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你看过多少战斗场面，但这应该是一场激烈的战斗。此时，博丁应该已经组建了一支小规模的军队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_0000691A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll move in quickly, clear the buildings one by one. He'll make his presence known soon enough. I reckon he'll have family with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会迅速行动，逐个清理建筑。他很快就会露面的，我想他的家族会和他在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_0000691A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happens now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, cousins and such. Scumbag family is spread all over creation. I know Juan will be here. Mean as a deathclaw, that one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，堂表兄弟之类的，人渣家族遍布整个世界。我知道胡安会来，那家伙就像死亡爪一样凶残。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_00006923_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ramon will be the one to watch for. A demon with the rifle by all accounts. If he's here... well, it'll be interesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 雷蒙会是我们要提防的人，大家都说他是拿着步枪的恶魔。如果他在这儿...嗯，会很有趣的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_00006923_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for the rest, no idea. Those are the only two who are known to run with him on the regular. They're free to die with him, I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于其他的，就不知道了。只有这两个人经常和他一起活动，我想他们可以和他一起死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_00006923_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Family?
ESP.TRADUIT: 家族？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alone... it would be touch and go. Been in enough fights to know that luck is a factor. It's an uncomfortable truth, but that's the way it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 独自一人...这就是生死攸关了。我参加过足够多的战斗，知道运气是一个因素，这是一个令人不安的事实，但事实就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_00006924_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With you and Lee backing me up... yes. Anything can happen, but I'd take those odds. Gonna be bloody no matter what.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有你和李支持我...能。任何事情都有可能发生，但我愿意冒这个险，不管怎样都会很血腥的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_00006924_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On the level - you think you can beat Bodeen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 坦率的说，你觉得你能打败博丁吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I kind of sensed that about you. Some folks just got it, you know? Glad it was you that came through that door at the outpost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我也感觉到了。有些人就是这样，你知道吗？幸好是你从前哨的那扇门进来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_00006925_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good thing you brought me, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那还好你带我来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Zip-a-dee-doo-dah zip-a-dee-a, I'm gonna be rich tomorrow-ay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘶嘀嗒嘟嗒嘶啊嘀嗒，我明天就要发财啦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNCampfireExc_0000625D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That what you think? Decent chance we'll both be dead. Even if we do take out Bodeen... you're getting a slice, nothing more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是这么想的吗？很有可能我们都会死。即使我们干掉了博丁...你也只能分到一小份，仅此而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNCampfireExc_0000625E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're really gonna pack up those caps and haul them all the way back to Silver Springs? That's a fool's errand and you know it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的要把那些瓶盖打包，一路拖回银泉镇？那是白费力，你知道的。
