ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNCampfireExc_0000625F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean... holy shit, you might as well saddle up Rocinante and call me Sancho. It's madness, Walker... pure farce.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是...我操了，你还不如给驽骍难得套上马鞍，叫我桑丘。这太疯狂了，沃克...纯粹是闹剧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can dress it up all you want. There's no romance or righteous justice here. We're killing a lot of people for some greasy caps. That's it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想怎么打扮都行，这里没有浪漫或正义。我们为了这些油腻的瓶盖杀了很多人，就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know damn well I'm not doing this for the money. You might be... well, I suppose it's also your fragile ego.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很清楚我做这些不是为了钱。你可能是...嗯，我想也是因为你脆弱的自我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNCampfireExc_00006260_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a lot like him... both walking grenades with no fuze, no safety. One spark and you destroy everything around you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和他很像...都是行走的手榴弹，没有引信，没有保险。一个火花就能摧毁你周围的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNCampfireExc_00006261_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least Bodeen wore a charming mask. You? You're covered in death. It's all you have now, isn't it? I almost pity you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少博丁戴着一个迷人的面具。你呢？你浑身都是死亡，你现在只有这些了，不是吗？我都快可怜你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: That might hurt if it came from a real criminal. You're a fraud, Lee. Bodeen saw right through you. So do I.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这句话出自真正的罪犯之口，可能会很伤人。但你是个骗子，李，博丁看透了你，我也一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNCampfireExc_00006262_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll find out tomorrow, won't we? Only one thing standing between me and that money, Walker. You.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明天就知道了，不是吗？只有一件事能阻止我拿到那笔钱，沃克，就是你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNCampfireExc_00006263_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I for one think this would be a fine time for a ghost story. Have you heard the tale of the talking dog?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我个人认为这是一个讲鬼故事的好时机，你听说过会说话的狗的故事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNCampfireExc_0000654B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hate it already. Fine, tell your story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经开始讨厌了。好吧，讲讲你的故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNCampfireExc_0000654C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our story begins with a duster-clad adventurer who wanders from town to town assisting denizens of the wasteland. He is brave. He is noble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的故事始于一个穿着防尘罩衫的冒险家，他从一个城镇流浪到另一个城镇，帮助废土上的居民。他很勇敢，他也很高尚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNCampfireExc_0000654D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He happens upon a village. An ominous cloud lingers over the poorly-built shanties. The inhabitants are sickly and timid, saying nary a word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他偶然来到一个村庄，不祥的阴云笼罩在简陋的棚户区上空。居民们体弱多病，胆小怕事，一言不发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even the children cast their eyes downward. All is silent save the shifting sheet metal and creaking wood. The adventurer is on guard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 连孩子们的眼睛都是往下看的。一切都是沉默的，除了移动的金属板和吱吱作响的木头。冒险家保持着警惕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me guess... Goodsprings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我猜猜...清泉镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNCampfireExc_0000654E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quiet. The adventurer nervously fondles his magnificent moustache. His hand is on his pistol, ready to draw... when a dog strolls into the square.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安静。冒险家紧张地抚摸着他那漂亮的小胡子，他的手握着手枪，准备拔枪...这时一只狗散步到广场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNCampfireExc_0000654F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The adventurer sighs in relief. He reaches to pet the beast, but recoils when he hears a deep, otherworldly voice say, "I have a secret."
ESP.TRADUIT: 冒险家如释重负地叹了口气。他伸手去抚摸这只野兽，但他听到了一个低沉的、超凡脱俗的声音说：“我有一个秘密。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stunned, the adventurer blurts out, "But you're a dog!" The canine calmly replies, "That's the secret. I talk."
ESP.TRADUIT: 冒险家愣住了，脱口而出：“你是一条狗啊！”狗平静地回答说：“这就是秘密，我会说话。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: The adventurer's apprehension begins to melt away as he scans the dog. He is utterly normal, save his heterochromia.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当冒险家仔细观察这只狗时，他的恐惧开始消失。除了异色症，他完全正常。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hetero-fucking-what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么他妈的异性恋？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNCampfireExc_00006551_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eyes are different color. Now shut up. The dog's eye's twitch with nervous energy. The adventurer begins to think he's found a new friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 眼睛的颜色不同，给我闭嘴。狗的眼睛因紧张而颤动，这位冒险家开始觉得自己找到了一位新朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNCampfireExc_00006552_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He imagines the possibilities... a talking dog is a potent ally. It is at this moment that he notices the dog's gaze is fixated on his groin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他想象着各种可能性...会说话的狗是一个强有力的盟友。就在这个时候，他注意到狗的目光盯着他的腹股沟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: The townspeople begin to crowd around the duo. They are chanting in a strange language. The dog licks his chops. The adventurer shudders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 镇上的人开始围着他们，他们在用一种奇怪的语言吟唱。狗舔着他的肉排，冒险家不寒而栗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: He nervously sputters out, "So, uh... what's your name?" The chanting grows louder. Thunder erupts overhead. The sky turns red.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他紧张得语无伦次的说：“所以，呃...你叫什么名字？”吟唱声越来越大，头顶上雷声隆隆，天空变成了红色。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Gulp>
ESP.TRADUIT: <倒吸气>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNCampfireExc_00006553_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The dog grins and says, "Balls. You want to know why?" The adventurer's face is pallid. He is stiff with fear. Urine begins to pool around his feet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗笑着说：“蛋蛋。你想知道为什么吗？”冒险家脸色苍白，他吓得浑身僵硬，尿开始在他的脚下汇聚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNCampfireExc_00006554_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He wills his quaking lips to form the words. "W-w-why?" The dog inhales deeply. His eyes dance with excitement. The chants are now a deafening roar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他用颤抖的嘴唇念出了这些字：“为...为...为什么？”狗深深的吸了一口气，它的眼睛兴奋地跳动着，圣歌现在成了震耳欲聋的咆哮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Because it's the first thing I bite," the dog says. In a flash, he rips off the adventurer's scrotum. A geyser of blood erupts.
ESP.TRADUIT: “因为这是我咬的第一个东西，”狗说。一瞬间，他扯下了冒险家的阴囊，鲜血喷涌而出。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The adventurer slumps over in shock and screams in agony. The townspeople dance and scream, "Hail Satan!" The adventurer perishes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冒险家震惊的瘫倒在地，痛苦地尖叫起来。镇上的人们一边跳舞一边尖叫：“撒旦万岁！”冒险家完蛋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The hell hound is sated... temporarily. They say he still walks the wastes, always searching for a fresh sacrifice. Only two items will satisfy him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 地狱之犬吃饱了...暂时的。据说它还在废土上游荡，总是在寻找新的祭品，只有两样东西能使它满意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A knife... preferably with blood on it... or warm testicles torn from a living body. Beware of strange dogs. Beware... of Balls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一把刀...最好是带着血的...或者从活人身上撕下来的温暖睾丸。小心陌生的狗，小心...你的蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The end. Good night, everyone. Sweet dreams!
ESP.TRADUIT: 结束。各位晚安，做个好梦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He wills his quaking lips to form the words. "W-w-why?" The dog inhales deeply. His eyes dance with excitement. The chants are now a deafening roar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他用颤抖的嘴唇念出了这些字：“为...为...为什么？”狗深深的吸了一口气，它的眼睛兴奋地跳动着，圣歌现在成了震耳欲聋的咆哮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I try to imagine how they'll look, who they'll take after. Picture me with a grandson on my knee, telling stories on the front porch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我试着想象他们会是什么样子，他们会像谁。想象一下，我膝上坐着孙子，在前廊讲故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00006911_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and if you ever call me grandpa... I'll kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，如果你叫我爷爷...我会杀了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00006911_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're a grandfather?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说你当爷爷了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, it is. Might as well get back to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，的确。还是回到正题吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00006910_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's all in the past now. No point dwelling on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在都过去了，没有必要纠结于此。

ESP.ORIGINAL: She doesn't want anything to do with me, especially after what happened to Jessica. Reckon I'll stay away if that's what she wants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她不想和我有任何瓜葛，尤其是在杰西卡的事之后。如果她想要的话，我就离她远点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_0000690E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever thought about contacting her?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想过联系她吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's more to it. She saw... the anger. Just before she ran off, she saw something that... well, something I regret every day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有更多。她看到了...愤怒，就在她跑掉之前，她看到了一些东西...嗯，这是我每天都后悔的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_0000690F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I, uh... well, Jessica was threatening to leave me a few years back. The hours, my inability to... turn off the anger after work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我，呃...杰西卡几年前威胁要离开我。时时刻刻，我无法...在下班后停止愤怒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_0000690F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We were trying to make it work, thought we'd turned a corner. I found out Jessica had gotten pregnant... then got an abortion without me knowing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们试着解决问题，以为已经有转机了。我发现杰西卡怀孕了...然后在我不知情的情况下堕胎了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_0000690F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I confronted her... and she threw it right in my face, said she did it to spite me. Said she didn't want to raise a boy around me. So I hit her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我质问了她...她直接扔在我脸上，说她这么做是为了刁难我。她说她不想在我身边抚养一个男孩，所以我打了她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_0000690F_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just one time, but there's no excusing it. Makes me sick to think about it. Sicker still that Hannah saw it. Now you know why she hates me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就一次，但这是不可原谅的，一想到这事我就恶心。更可怕的是，汉娜看到了，现在你知道她为什么恨我了吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_0000690F_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was a long time ago. Maybe you can mend the relationship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是很久以前的事了，也许你可以修复这段关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't argue with you. Can't undo what I did, damn sure won't dance around it or make excuses. All I want... is to do one thing right for her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会和你争论的。我做过的事无法挽回，我绝对不会逃避，也不会找借口。我想要的...就是为她做一件正确的事
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00006919_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I may be a piece of shit, but I've still got a job to do. All I ask is that you help me see it through to the finish. Let's get moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我是个混蛋，但我还有工作要做。我只希望你能帮我把事情做完,我们行动起来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00006919_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're garbage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个垃圾。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It wasn't good, to be honest. Not long after I was kicked out of office, then turned into a loafer. Don't know why she put up with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说实话，并不好。没过多久我就被踢出了办公室，然后变成了一个懒汉，不知道她为什么会容忍我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00006917_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like to think she saw a better version of me than what was in front of her, maybe hoping I'd shed that skin and turn out good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我愿意相信她看到了一个比眼前更好的我，也许希望我褪去那层皮，变得更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00006917_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what burns me up... that I didn't do that for her before she was killed. Best I can do is get justice for her. Let's... let's get moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这让我很生气...在她被杀之前我没有为她做这些，我现在能做的就是为她讨回公道。我们...让我们开始吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00006917_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you make the marriage work after that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那之后你是怎么维持婚姻的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Absolutely. Seen enough wife beaters in my day to know the excuses, the rationalizing bullshit that comes out of their mouths.
ESP.TRADUIT: 绝对的。我以前见过很多打老婆的人，所以知道从他们嘴里说出的借口和合理化的屁话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00006918_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did wrong. All I can do now is try to get that woman a small slice of justice for all the hell I put her through while she was alive. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做错了。我现在能做的，就是为那个女人讨回一点公道，因为她活着的时候，我让她经历了那么多苦难。我们走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerBack0_00006918_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It only happened once?
ESP.TRADUIT: 只发生过一次？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pretty much. Even if we could talk, I wouldn't. I want to make sure this place stays dead when we're done with Bodeen. Let the buzzards have it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 差不多。就算我们能谈谈，我也不会，我要确保在我们解决了博丁之后，这个地方不会再出现。让那些秃鹫吃吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_00006922_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a moot point in the end. This isn't a town, it's an armed camp full of predators. Reckon they're keeping slaves, so... no mercy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说到底，这里是一个悬而未决的问题，这不是一个小镇，这是一个满是掠食者的武装营地。估计他们还在蓄奴，所以...毫不留情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_00006922_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With that said... use judgment. There are liable to be a few noncombatants running around. Don't be a maniac.
ESP.TRADUIT: 话虽如此...运用判断力。可能会有一些非战斗人员在附近活动，不要像个疯子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_00006922_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So there's no chance of talking our way in there? We just go in guns blazing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我们没有机会通过谈判进入那里？ 我们就这么开着枪冲进去？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know that, but you better learn. You start gunning down slaves and such... you'll be squaring up with me long before we meet Bodeen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道，但你最好学学。你开始枪杀奴隶之类的...在我们见到博丁之前，你就会和我决斗了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_00006926_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Discretion is not my strong suit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谨慎不是我的强项。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Same for me. Good night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也一样。晚安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_00006921_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I better rest up, then. Good night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我最好休息一下。晚安。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure yet. I'll be returning the bulk of the money to Silver Springs, obviously. After that? Haven't made up my mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还不确定，我肯定会把大部分钱还给银泉镇。之后呢？我还没拿定主意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_00006927_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've been working together for a while... so I wouldn't mind your input. Any thoughts?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在一起工作有一段时间了...所以我不介意你的意见。有什么想法吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_00006927_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And what happens after all this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一切之后会发生什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Even if I swallow my pride and make the attempt, who's to say she'd want anything to do with me? Stubborn, just like her mother.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]就算我放下自尊去尝试，谁能保证她会愿意和我扯上关系呢？很固执，就像她妈妈一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_00006BC5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you should seek out your daughter and make amends. You still have a family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你应该去找你女儿弥补过错，你还有家人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] No, not happening. I know her too well. She doesn't want to see my face. I'll be lucky if she'll take money that I send her.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]不，不可能。我太了解她了，她不想看到我的脸。如果她能接受我寄给她的钱，我就很幸运了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_00006BC6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you should seek out your daughter and make amends. You still have a family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你应该去找你女儿弥补过错，你还有家人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Badge will feel a little heavier this time around, I think. Well, I just don't know. I'll think about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？我觉得这次的警徽会重一些。嗯，我只是不知道，我会考虑的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_0000692A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you should go back to being a lawman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你应该回去当执法者。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's been a ride. Won't lie... it's been satisfying to catch up with these men. Wouldn't mind doing it again if I manage to survive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这段旅程，我不会说谎...能追上这些人让我很满足。如果我能活下来，我不介意再做一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_0000692B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Money ain't bad, either. The seven agencies pay well from what I hear. I could send my earnings to my daughter, make a trust for my grandkids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 钱也不坏，据我所知，这七家机构的报酬都很高。我可以把我的收入寄给我女儿，为我的孙子们建立一个信托基金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_0000692B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That... that could work. More useful than what I had planned. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这...这可能行得通，比我的计划更好。谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_0000692B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem to have a knack for hunting down bad guys. Might try bounty hunting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你似乎对追捕坏人很有一套，也许可以试试赏金猎人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I suppose it is. Won't put that burden on anyone else. I'll handle it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我想是的。我不会把这个负担推给别人的，交给我吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_00006929_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's your call.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说了算。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Jesus, I wish that conversation with Anne never happened. Dredged up old feelings... old memories I'd buried.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]天啊，我真希望我和安妮的对话从未发生过。旧情复燃...被我埋葬的旧记忆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeCampFire_00006EB5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if I did... it would be a slap in the face to all the... the truly good people like Anne. No, I can't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使我做了...这对所有人来说都是一记耳光...像安妮这样真正善良的人。不，我不能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeCampFire_00006EB5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can see myself retiring or starting over... but going back to the Followers? Never gonna happen. I won't live a lie. I need a real option.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以预见自己退休或重新开始...但回到追随者那里？永远不会发生的。我不会活在谎言中，我需要一个真正的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeCampFire_00006EB5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should go back to the Followers, like Anne said. Put this behind you and help others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该像安妮说的那样，回到天启追随者那里去。放下这些事，去帮助别人吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] No, I'm not falling for that insipid crap. I need a real plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]不，我才不信那些无聊的废话。我需要一个真正的计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeCampFire_00006EBA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like they say at the Sierra Madre: "Begin Again."
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像他们在马德雷说的：“重新开始。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, go east? I mean... I can pass through Caesar's territory easy enough. Just have to be... well, not a criminal. I could do that, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么，往东走？我是说...我可以轻而易举地穿过凯撒的领地。只要...好吧，不是罪犯，我想我能做到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeCampFire_00006EB6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to see Texas, though. Heard some of the other ghouls mention it in passing. Wild stories trickle in sometimes. Yeah, why not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我还是想去德州看看，我听到其他食尸鬼顺便提起过。有时会有一些荒诞的故事，嗯，为什么不呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeCampFire_00006EB6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Appreciate your input. Get some rest, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢你的建议。好好休息吧，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeCampFire_00006EB6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's possible. I'd recommend you leave the Mojave, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是可能的，不过我还是建议你离开莫哈维。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're the voice of my gut. Too set in my ways, like an old hound dog. It has its moments, you know? Living wild in a wild place. You should try it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是我的心声。我太固步自封了，像只老猎犬，猎犬有猎犬的时刻，你知道吗？生活在荒野，你应该试试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeCampFire_00006EB7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been all right to me, so let me give you a fair warning... as a friend... don't get between me and those caps. I need them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一直对我很好，所以我给你一个公平的警告...作为朋友...别挡在我和那些瓶盖之间。我需要它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeCampFire_00006EB7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now it's time to dance with Morpheus and forget all these troubles for a brief moment. Good night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在是与摩耳甫斯共舞的时候了，暂时忘掉所有的烦恼。晚安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeCampFire_00006EB7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wanted to live free, right? Stick the life you know and stop second-guessing yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想过自由的生活，对吧？坚持你熟悉的生活，不要再怀疑自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I... I... maybe. I need to sleep on this. Yeah. Thank you... for everything. Didn't expect this from a fellow wanderer. Life is funny.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]我...我...也许吧，我得好好考虑一下。嗯，谢谢你！为我所做的一切，没想到一个流浪者会这么说。生活很有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeCampFire_00006EB8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's all get some rest. All this banter is for naught if we die tomorrow, anyway. Good night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 们都休息一下吧。无论如何，如果我们明天就死了，所有这些玩笑都是徒劳的。晚安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeCampFire_00006EB8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every saint starts as a sinner. I believe you can be a good man again, Lee.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个圣人一开始都是罪人。我相信你能再次成为一个好人，李。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Uh, yes it is. Are you damaged in the head or something? C'mon, give me a real option here.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]呃，是的。你脑袋受伤了还是怎么的？拜托，给我个真正的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeCampFire_00006EBB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not a lie if you believe it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你相信，那就不是谎言。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Educate the mind and the heart, huh? "Kids, don't be a murdering shitbag." Something like that? Might prevent another Edward Sallow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 教育思想和心灵，是吧？"孩子们，别做个杀人的混蛋"之类的？也许能阻止另一个爱德华·萨隆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeCampFire_00006EB9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe. I need to sleep on this. You need to sleep, too. All this speculation will be for naught if we die. Good night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许吧，我得好好考虑一下。你也要睡觉了，如果我们死了，所有这些猜测都将毫无意义。晚安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeCampFire_00006EB9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With your experience you can impart knowledge and wisdom. That's a rare gift. Don't waste it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用你的经验，你可以传授知识和智慧。这是一种罕见的天赋，别浪费了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lord, this is gonna be rough. Assuming we do make it through tomorrow... I... yeah, I'll do it. I'll look her in the eyes and apologize.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，这将会很艰难。假设我们能撑过明天...我...嗯，我会的。我会看着她的眼睛向她道歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_00006BCA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eating a bullet sounds better than that... but I'll do it. God as my witness, I'll do it. Now let's get some sleep and pray we survive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吃一颗子弹听起来都比这好...但我会去做的，上帝作证，我会照做的。现在让我们睡一觉，祈祷我们能活下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_00006BCA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You won't know for sure until you meet her in person. Never give up on your family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你亲自见到她，否则你无法确定。永远不要放弃你的家人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't that simple and you know it. No, sending her money will be enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没那么简单，你知道的。不，给她寄钱就够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_00006BCB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just tell her you're really sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉她你真的很抱歉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, when you put it like that... sound like my old grandpappy. Might not have been a walking thesaurus like Lee, but he had a way with words.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你这么说的时候...听起来像我的老祖父。他可能不像李那样是个活的词典，但他对语言很有一套。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_00006BCC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll do it. No more whining or excuses. I'll look her right in the eyes and tell her I'm wrong. Then I'll know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会做的，不再抱怨，不再找借口。我会看着她的眼睛告诉她我错了，然后我就会知道了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_00006BCC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A man's got to do what a man's got to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 男人要做男人该做的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, straight at me... okay, fair enough. So it's a question of nerves? I know what it's like to fail... I don't want to feel that again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，就冲着我来...好吧，有道理。所以这是一个神经问题？我知道失败是什么感觉...我不想再有那种感觉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerCampf_00006BCD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got enough nerves to handle yourself in a shootout. Surely you can talk to your daughter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有足够的勇气在枪战中应付自如，你当然可以和你女儿谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And what a battle it will be. I'd like to see it depicted with oil on canvas, in the style of... The Death of Decius Mus. Very appropriate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这将是一场多么激烈的战斗啊，我想看到它在画布上被描绘成油画，风格是...《德西乌斯之死》非常合适。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamFuture_00006ECA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: May fortune favor you in your endeavors. I for one believe you will stop the barbarian horde. Ils ne passeront pas!
ESP.TRADUIT: 愿好运垂青于你，我相信你能阻止蛮族部落。决不让敌人通过！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamFuture_00006ECA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll probably wander from job to job until things kick off at Hoover Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可能会从一个工作换到另一个工作，直到胡佛大坝的事情开始。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fortuitous that you should mention that... rumor has it that William Gray may be opening a new branch in town. If so, do look him up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你提到...真是太巧了。据说威廉·格雷要在城里开一家新分店。如果是这样，一定要去找他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamFuture_00006EC3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wouldn't be surprised if House had a hand in his move to Vegas. War is profitable. War on behalf of Robert House would be very profitable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果豪斯参与了他的维加斯之行，我一点也不惊讶。战争是有利可图的，为罗伯特·豪斯而战将是非常有利可图的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: So many opportunities. Hope you sleep well. We may all be knocking on heaven's door tomorrow. Good night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 机会太多了。希望你睡个好觉，也许明天我们都要去敲天堂的门。晚安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamFuture_00006EC3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm thinking of working as a mercenary for a spell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在考虑做一段时间的雇佣兵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now there's a business that won't ever go out of style. Agencies are flourishing these days. Lots of bounties up in the basin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在有一种永远不会过时的生意。这些天，代理机构蓬勃发展，盆地里有很多悬赏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamFuture_00006EC4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just be careful when you get up in the wild places. Stay away from Mount Irish, whatever you do. Bad mojo, as they say. Very bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在野外的时候一定要小心，不管你做什么，都要远离爱尔兰山。俗话说，坏兆头，非常糟糕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamFuture_00006EC4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, if you're in need of an Enkidu to assist your Gilgamesh, I'm more than happy to help take on the monsters of our world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，如果你需要一个恩奇都来帮助你的吉尔伽美什，我很乐意帮忙对付我们世界的怪物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamFuture_00006EC4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might even recover some art while we're at it. Anything is possible on the open road. Now... now it is time to rest my weary bones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说不定还能顺便找回一些艺术品呢，在开阔的道路上，一切皆有可能。现在...现在是让我疲惫的骨头休息的时候了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamFuture_00006EC4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bounty hunting is always an option.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赏金狩猎永远是一种选择。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A veritable vacquero, that's what you are. Keep your powder dry, then. I sense grim tidings... dark days may be ahead. Stay sharp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是个名副其实的牛仔，那就做好万全的准备。我嗅到了不祥的消息...黑暗的日子可能就在前方，保持警惕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamFuture_00006EC2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and if we should survive this bloody fracas, do look me up in Jacobstown. I can be an extra hand on your great cattle drive through the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们能挺过这场血战，一定要来雅各布斯镇找我。我可以在你穿越莫哈维的伟大赶牛之路上帮你一把。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamFuture_00006EC2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Us cowpokes, we take it as it comes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们这些牛仔，都是顺势而为。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, you as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，你也一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamFinalG_00006EC7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good night to you and Peter. Hope you both sleep well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你和彼得晚安，希望你们俩都睡个好觉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is evil... and there is evil. Whatever is stirring in those mountains is the latter. It's malignant in essence, not just some passing devilry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有很多邪恶...全都是恶。无论那些山脉中发生了什么，都是后者。它本质上是恶，而不仅仅是一些转瞬即逝的恶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamFinalM_00006EC8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've seen things you people wouldn't believe. Brotherhood ships on fire off Rushmore. I watched C-beams glitter in the dark near the Gateway...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我见过你们这些人不会相信的事。兄弟会的船在拉什莫尔附近着火，我看到C光束在盖特韦附近的黑暗中闪闪发光...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamFinalM_00006EC8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All these images are nothing compared what I've heard about Mount Irish. Blood sacrifices... ancient rituals... a Red Prince on a throne.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有这些图像与我听说的爱尔兰山相比都不算什么。血祭...古老的仪式...王位上的红王子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamFinalM_00006EC8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Avoid it at all costs... or if the opportunity arises, use a nuclear warhead. Give it the Old Testament treatment. That would do nicely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何都要避免...或者，如果有机会，使用核弹头。用旧约的方式来对待它，那就太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamFinalM_00006EC8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, lots to think about. Good night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，有很多值得思考的地方。晚安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamFinalM_00006EC8_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the deal with Mount Irish?
ESP.TRADUIT: 爱尔兰山是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, Walker... you got me. See why you didn't start shooting off the bat. Wanted your gun-hand to back you up. Well played.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，沃克...你抓到我了。看看你为什么不马上开枪，想让你的枪手帮你撑腰。干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenInt_0000B556_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was it really worth it? I mean, don't get me wrong, I'm impressed... but all that killing... just to get me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的值得吗？我是说，别误会，我很佩服...但所有的杀戮...就为了抓住我？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: To look you in the eyes... to tell you I'm gonna kill you? Goddamn right it was worth it. I'd kill every man in this valley twice for that chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看着你的眼睛...告诉你我要杀了你？该死的，这太值得了。为了这个机会，我愿意把山谷里的每个人都杀两次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenInt_0000B55A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bodeen, you and Walker should take a trip together. You both love misery and killing everything around you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 博丁，你和沃克应该一起去旅行。你们都喜欢痛苦，喜欢杀死身边的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenInt_0000B55B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lee, whatever happens here... you're getting the first bullet, you rat fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李，不管发生什么...你都是第一个挨枪子儿的，你这个鼠辈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenInt_0000B55C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Walker... I'm not keen on all this talking. You want speeches, go chat with the Booth boys. Pull that Roscoe when the mood hits you. I'm game.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃克...我不喜欢说这些，你想听演讲，去找布斯的人聊。情绪不好的时候就把左轮拉出来，我奉陪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenInt_0000B55C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lee, whatever happens here... you're getting the first bullet, you rat fuck. Sam, you're second. Should've stayed away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李，不管发生什么...你都是第一个挨枪子儿的，你这个鼠辈。山姆，你是第二个，我应该离你远点的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenInt_0000B58D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Walker... I'm not keen on all this talking. You want speeches, go chat with the Booth boys. Pull that Roscoe when the mood hits you. I'm game.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃克...我不喜欢说这些，你想听演讲，去找布斯的人聊。情绪不好的时候就把左轮拉出来，我奉陪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenInt_0000B58D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's dance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来跳舞吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenTri_0000B561_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you... what's your part in this? Why in the fiddler's fuck would you help Walker with this suicide mission?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有你...你在其中扮演什么角色？你他妈的为什么要帮沃克完成这个自杀任务？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenGre_0000B563_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I'm a little fucking dyspeptic after you destroyed everything I worked so hard to build. You could say I'm in a mood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，你毁了我苦心经营的一切之后我都有点消化不良了。你可以说我心情不好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenGre_0000B56A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know how hard it was to get this place up and running? My mentor, Roy... the sacrifices he made... you got no idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道把这个地方建起来有多难吗？我的导师罗伊...他做出的牺牲...你根本不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenGre_0000B56A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think we're bad? Should've seen the crew that was here before us. Roy buried them. Then came the goddamn Dog Pecker Flies!
ESP.TRADUIT: 觉得我们是坏人？真该看看比我们先来的那些人，罗伊把他们埋了。然后是该死的啄狗蝇！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenGre_0000B56A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A swarm straight from the pits of hell... and Roy beat them. We were on the verge of greatness... and you just shit on our world. Upset? Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一群直接从地狱深处出来的蜂群...罗伊打败了它们。我们正处在伟大的边缘...而你却毁了我们的世界。沮丧？对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenGre_0000B56A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem upset.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来很沮丧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caps? You did it for the caps? Lord knows that Walker isn't giving you much. Different circumstances I might make a counter-offer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瓶盖？你这么做是为了瓶盖？上帝知道沃克给不了你多少。如果情况不同，我可能会还价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenPla_0000B572_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But after what you pulled... the men you killed... they were loyal to me. I took care of them, cared about them. Even the Cram guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但在你做了那些事之后...你杀的那些人...他们忠于我。我照顾他们，关心他们，即使是那个叫克拉姆的家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenPla_0000B572_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You killed them like they were dumb animals. Reap what you sow, cocksucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把他们当成愚蠢的动物一样杀了。种瓜得瓜，混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenPla_0000B572_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm in it for the caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是为了瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I earned it. Took a slug from Ranger McCall before I ripped it off his corpse. Toughest bastard I ever fought. Tougher than any of you, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我应得的，在我从游骑兵麦考尔的尸体上扯下来之前挨了他一枪。我对付过的最狠的混蛋，反正比你们任何人都狠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenPla_0000B56C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Much as I appreciate the compliment, I'd like to stick to the point - what the hell are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我很感激你的赞美，但我还是想坚持我的观点：你到底在这里做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenPla_0000B56C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice outfit. Where'd you get it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 衣服不错，你从哪儿弄来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're gonna have to earn it, boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这得靠你自己争取，小子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenPla_0000B56D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't rate that armor. I'm taking it back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不配穿这件盔甲，我要把它拿回去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're gonna have to earn it, bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这得靠你自己争取，婊子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenPla_0000B58C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't rate that armor. I'm taking it back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不配穿这件盔甲，我要把它拿回去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, Ramon... that's the kind of honesty I can respect. Damn shame how this has to go down. I could've used someone like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瞧，雷蒙...这才是我能尊重的诚实。这件事要这样下去真是太可惜了，我很需要你这样的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenPla_0000B56F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No point putting it off any more. Let's find out who got right with Jesus this morning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有必要再拖延下去了，让我们来看看今天早上谁去见耶稣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenPla_0000B56F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was bored.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就是无聊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all you got? I'm right and you're wrong? Know how many kill-crazy maniacs have thrown that at me? You really believe it. Hell fire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就知道这些？我是对的，你是错的？知道有多少杀人狂把这句话扔给我吗？你还当真了。真是折磨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenPla_0000B574_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Highfalutin little fuck-nugget... preaching at me while you're killing half of creation. I mean... look around you! You're the grim reaper!
ESP.TRADUIT: 自以为是的小混蛋...你一边对我说教，一边杀死一半的造物。我是说...看看你的周围！你就是死神！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenPla_0000B574_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good chance most of us are about to meet our maker here in a moment, so let me ask one last question - you got any remorse?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很有可能我们中的大多数人马上就要在这里见到我们的造物主了，所以让我问最后一个问题，你有后悔吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenPla_0000B574_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was the right thing to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是正确的选择。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还没。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenPla_0000B57B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got no right to throw that at me. You're a raider. A slaver. A murderer. It ends now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没资格对我这么说，你是个掠夺者、奴隶贩子、杀人犯。现在结束了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A wise choice, friend. Think fast!
ESP.TRADUIT: 朋友，这是个明智的选择。快想想！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you can't blame me for trying. Now... let's see if you can catch lightning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你不能责怪我的尝试。 现在...让我们看看你能否抓住闪电。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: No thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不了谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They weren't angels, but great things aren't built by moral men. We made the hard choices, laid the foundation for something better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们不是天使，但伟大的事物不是由有道德的人建造的。我们做出了艰难的选择，为更好的生活奠定了基础。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenRem_0000B57A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can say it now... I regret killing Walker's wife. Happened in a flash. Woman told me... well, it was bad. Couldn't lose face, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在就可以说...我后悔杀死沃克的妻子。一瞬间就发生了，那个女人说我...嗯，很糟糕。不能丢面子，你知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenRem_0000B57A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Figure I'll pay for it at some point. Maybe it's today. Walker ain't the first to come after me, though. I'll take my chances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总有一天我会为此付出代价的，也许是今天。不过沃克不是第一个来找我麻烦的人，我要碰碰运气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenRem_0000B57A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have plenty of regrets, but cleaning out this canyon isn't one of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有很多遗憾，但清理这个峡谷绝不是其中之一。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well ain't you something. Ice cold to the core. Let's see if you flinch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真了不起，冷酷到骨子里。让我们看看你会不会退缩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenRem_0000B579_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're gonna feel regret when I nail your skin to the walls, motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我把你的皮钉在墙上的时候你会后悔的，混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodeen [0300734D] (mod) Quest : ([0300B554]aaSGFNBodeenDialogue) Bodeen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult09\aaSGFNBode_aaSGFNBodeenRem_0000B578_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My only regret is not killing you before you had a chance to speak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我唯一的遗憾就是没有在你开口之前杀了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing like that click, is there? So satisfying. Bodeen proposed using a thermal lance at the Silver Springs bank. I refused.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有那种咔哒声，对吧？太令人满足了。博丁建议在银泉银行使用热喷枪，我拒绝了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamLockPe_0000BB6E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know... I'm something of a safecracker myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的...我自己也是个撬保险箱的高手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's done, Lee. Take your share and go home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 结束了，李。拿上你的那份，回家去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNFinalFaceOf_0000BE69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say revenge is the sweetest morsel cooked in hell. A bag of stolen money is a close second in my book.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们都说复仇是地狱里烹制的最甜蜜的食物。在我看来，一袋偷来的钱仅次于它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNFinalFaceOf_0000BE6A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lee... you did your part. Take your share and walk while you can. I'm losing my patience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李....你完成了你的任务，拿着你的那份，趁你还能走的时候走。我快没耐心了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNFinalFaceOf_0000BE6D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That! That's why I won't go. "Losing my patience." Like you're the noble father figure of the wastes. You're a bully, Walker. Same as Bodeen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这！这就是我不走的原因。“我快没耐心了。”就好像你是废土上高贵的父亲一样。你真是个恶霸，沃克，和博丁一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNFinalFaceOf_0000BE6E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you... don't you say that again. This is your last warning, Lee.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不...你再说一遍。这是最后一次警告你，李。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNFinalFaceOf_0000BE6F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're alone for a reason. You'll always be alone. I'm ready when you are, sheriff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你独自一人是有原因的，你将永远孤独。你准备好了我就好了，治安官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNFinalFaceOf_0000BE70_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Whistling.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <吹口哨>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNFinalFaceOf_0000C15B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Yes... yes, it is. All right, my fellow masochist... let's hear it.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]是的...是的，的确。好吧，我的受虐狂同伴...让我们来听听。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalSpe_0000C170_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been with you every step of this journey. That's worth something, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直陪着你走过这段旅程的每一步。这是有价值的，不是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Oh, you want chivalry? Fine, we'll handle it like Hamilton and Burr!
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]噢，你想要骑士精神？好啊，我们就像汉密尔顿和伯尔那样处理！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalSpe_0000C171_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't you two work this out like gentlemen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们俩就不能像绅士一样解决这件事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell yes! You ready to back me up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然啊！准备好支持我了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalAgr_0000C167_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember your plan to split the caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还记得你的分瓶盖计划吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. No hesitation!
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，不要犹豫！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalAgr_0000C16A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack Walker.> I'm in. Let's do this.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击沃克>我加入，就这么办吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fucking snake. "Go thou, and fill another room in hell!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这该死的卑鄙小人。“你去吧，去填满地狱的另一个房间吧！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalAgr_0000C169_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> You overplayed your hand, Lee. Can't let you do this.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>你玩得太过火了，李。我不能让你这么做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it's about to be final. You hear that, Walker? Fine. Spit it out, quickly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，快解决了，你听到了吗，沃克？好吧。快说出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalCoo_0000C16D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy, let's talk this out before things get... final.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放轻松，我们在事情...最终解决之前好好谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, the master of rhetoric makes an appeal to reason! Well, out with it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔，修辞学大师诉诸理性了！好吧，说出来吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalDic_0000CD86_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Calm the fuck down and listen to me unless you want to end up dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静点，听我说，除非你想死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn... there's pulling out the big guns... and then there's pulling out the nuclear howitzer and aiming it right at my face. Fuck me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死...这下放大招了...然后拿出核榴弹炮对准我的脸。我操了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalAnn_0000C176_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine... off into the sunset I go. Walker... from the bottom of my heart, I hope to never see you again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧...我会朝着夕阳远去。沃克...我打心底里希望永远不要再见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalAnn_0000C176_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And as for you... thank you. Doubt I'll see you again, but who knows. Got a feeling your life is about to be a lot more interesting than mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于你...谢谢你！也许我还会再见到你，但谁知道呢。感觉你的生活要比我的有趣多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalAnn_0000C176_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you know what? I'm okay with that. Farewell and safe travels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗？我不介意。再会，一路平安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalAnn_0000C176_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember what Anne told you - there's still a place for you in the Followers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记住安妮跟你说的话，天启追随者中还有你的一席之地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Damn it! Yeah... you're right. Play it cool, play it smart. Got greedy with Bodeen and look what happened. Yeah, time to cash out.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]可恶！是啊...你说得对，沉着冷静，举止聪明。对博丁的事太贪婪了，看看发生了什么。是啊，该套现了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalSpe_0000CD89_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine... off into the sunset I go. Walker... from the bottom of my heart, I hope to never see you again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧...我会朝着夕阳远去。沃克...我打心底里希望永远不要再见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalSpe_0000CD89_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And as for you... thank you. Doubt I'll see you again, but who knows. Got a feeling your life is about to be a lot more interesting than mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于你...谢谢你！也许我还会再见到你，但谁知道呢。感觉你的生活要比我的有趣多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalSpe_0000CD89_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you know what? I'm okay with that. Farewell and safe travels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗？我不介意。再会，一路平安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalSpe_0000CD89_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a survivor. Taking crazy risks isn't how you've made it this far. Play the long game.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是一个幸存者，你不是靠铤而走险才走到今天的。要做长远打算。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Your conscious is just a moral lookout, not a guide. Yeah, I've heard enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]你的意识只是一种道德观，而不是一个向导。嗯，我听够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalSpe_0000CD8C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let your conscience be your guide!
ESP.TRADUIT: 让你的良心指引你吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never tell me the odds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别告诉我概率有多大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalNer_0000C173_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Math was not my strong suit... clearly. You're right. Put so much into getting those caps I didn't want to fold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 数学不是我的强项...很明显，你说得对。我费了那么大劲才弄到这些我不想叠的瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalNer_0000C173_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. I'll take my share and make new opportunities in a more... civilized place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是对的。我将接受我的份额，并在更...文明的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalNer_0000C173_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know I'm normally the loquacious sort, but... I think it's best if I just left now. Good luck to you, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道我通常是那种话多的人，但是...我想我最好现在就离开。祝你好运，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalNer_0000C173_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The possibility of surviving this shootout is approximately 3,720 to 1.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这场枪战中存活的概率约为3720比1。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Here at the moment of decision and you want to quibble? We're talking about a killing, not haggling over fucking fruit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么？在做出决定的时候你还想争辩？我们说的是杀人，不是为了买水果讨价还价！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalAgr_0000C16B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it would be a mistake. Hear me out for a moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得这是个错误，听我把话说完。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just had to take a sledgehammer straight to my ego, huh? I mean... I wasn't planning on dying, but I get your point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这么狠狠打击了我的自尊心，是吧？我的意思是...我没打算死，但我明白你的意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalGun_0000C174_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can argue that pride isn't worth it. Fine. But caps? There's a price for everyone... and this is mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以说自尊不值得你这么做，很好，但是瓶盖呢？每个人都有价格...这是我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalGun_0000C174_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Walker is better and you know it. I never took you as someone who'd die for pride.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃克更好，你知道的。我从不认为你会为尊严而死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，算不上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalGun_0000CD88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aren't you tired of shooting people?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不厌倦开枪杀人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I regret telling you that... part of a life that's long gone. But yes... I still respect the Followers, and that carries weight. Say your piece.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很遗憾地告诉你...这是一段早已逝去的生活。但是对...我仍然尊重天启追随者，这很重要。说出你的观点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalFol_0000CD87_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Followers of the Apocalypse] You're a learned man, Lee. You know this is wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: [天启追随者]你是个有学问的人，李。你知道这是不对的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of all the people... and to do it like this... goddamn you. Goddamn you. Hope you like spending these caps in hell, you rat fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这么多人当中...这样做...去你妈的，你这混蛋。希望你喜欢在地狱里花这些瓶盖，你这个混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerStage_0000C469_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack.> I didn't come here for a slice. I want the whole pie.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>我不是来分蛋糕的，我要吃掉整个蛋糕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He reciprocates with a firm handshake.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他以坚定的握手作为回应。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye, friend. Safe travels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见，朋友。一路顺风。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerStage_0000C467_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Shake his hand.> Goodbye, Walker.
ESP.TRADUIT: <和他握手>再见，沃克。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never change. See you down the line.
ESP.TRADUIT: 永远不要改变。以后见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerStage_0000C468_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad this shit is over. Just pay me and be on your way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴这破事结束了。给我钱我就走人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That... that's the gun that killed my wife. No, I never want to touch it. I'd like to think it will be a force for good in your hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这...就是这把枪杀了我妻子。不，我不想碰它，我希望它能在你手中成为一股正义的力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerStage_0000C466_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a strong feeling that you're going to be putting it to a lot of use soon. Just be faster than Bodeen and you'll be all right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一种强烈的感觉，你很快就会让它派上大用场。只要比博丁快就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerStage_0000C466_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope to see you again in a time and place where we don't have to pack pistols. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望能在一个不用带手枪的时间和地点再见到你。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerStage_0000C466_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Uncaring Consequences] I picked up Bodeen's pistol. Hope you don't mind if I keep it.
ESP.TRADUIT: [冷漠的后果]我捡了博丁的手枪，希望你不介意我留着它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our mustachioed nemesis lies defeated and the aim of your quest will soon be in hand. I have honored my end of the arrangement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的大胡子宿敌被打败了，你的目标很快就会实现。我已经履行了我的约定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNAdiosSam_0000C472_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless you object, I will make my exit. I sense that today's carnage may not be at an end, and I want no further involvement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不反对，我就走了。我感觉今天的大屠杀可能还没有结束，我不想再卷入其中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNAdiosSam_0000C472_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: North. Before our... encounter... I heard whispers that the mad warlord Requin is hoarding precious art in his squalid stick-fort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 北方。在我们...相遇之前...我听到传言说，疯狂的军阀鲛鲨在他那肮脏的木堡里囤积着珍贵的艺术品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNAdiosSam_0000C473_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He must be... relieved of these antiquities. It's a matter of good taste. My course is charted, I must follow it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他一定是...拆了这些文物。这是品味的问题，我的路线已经画好了，我必须遵循它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNAdiosSam_0000C473_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After that... back to the Mojave. Seek me out at my cabin. Perhaps we can conduct a joint rescue of the arts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那之后...回到莫哈维，来我的小屋找我吧。也许我们可以共同拯救艺术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNAdiosSam_0000C473_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where will you go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要去哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're all the wrong people. Some are just more wrong than others. None is more wrong than that sadistic madman. Oh, and steal? Dirty word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都是错的人，只是有些人比其他人更错，但没有人比那个虐待狂疯子更错了。哦，还说偷？肮脏的词汇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNAdiosSam_0000C474_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm nothing if not cautious. Remember... I served in the Master's Army. These trifling dirt kings of the Basin are a parody of real rulers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我很谨慎。记住...我在主教的军队里服过役，盆地里这些微不足道的土王是对真正统治者的拙劣模仿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNAdiosSam_0000C474_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like that. Just be careful you don't steal from the wrong people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很乐意。小心别偷到了错的人头上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, no. It was a matter of honor, not caps. I've stolen enough caps to last me ten human lifetimes. But a Rubens? I'd hug you to death. Literally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不，这是荣誉问题，不是瓶盖问题。我偷的瓶盖够我活十辈子了，但鲁本斯？我会抱你到死。字面意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNAdiosSamT_0000C475_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It would please me if you took that sum and donated it to the Followers. Most factions are rife with vicious machinations, but not them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你把这笔钱捐给天启追随者，我会很高兴的。大多数派系都充斥着邪恶的阴谋诡计，但他们不是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNAdiosSamT_0000C475_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, they produce an oddball dictator every now and then, but nobody's perfect. Help them in my name, please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，他们时不时会产生一个古怪的独裁者，但没有人是完美的。请以我的名义帮助他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNAdiosSamT_0000C475_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Pay him 200 caps.> Thank you, Sam. Here's something for your trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: <付给他200瓶盖>谢谢你，山姆。这是给你的补偿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you as well. Great trials await you, young hero. Just remember to stop and enjoy the beauty of this world between the bursts of carnage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也是。伟大的考验在等待着你，年轻的勇者。只要记得在大屠杀爆发的间隙，停下来欣赏这个世界的美丽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNAdiosSamC_0000C476_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do not rage, do not regret. Stay in the present, and do as the writer instructed: "Live to the point of tears." Adieu!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不怒不悔，活在当下，按照作者的指示去做：“活到流泪。”再会了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNAdiosSamC_0000C476_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye, Sam. Stay safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见，山姆。注意安全。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll consider that an amicable jab born out of mutual respect. I wish you good fortune in the coming struggles... I fear they will be plentiful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会认为这是出于相互尊重的友好攻击。祝你在接下来的战斗中好运连连...恐怕数量会很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNAdiosSamD_0000C477_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beat it, mutant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚开，变种人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fair question. I despise half-measures, bargains or settlements in their many forms. It's a reminder of the indignities I swallowed in my old life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问得好。我鄙视各种形式的折衷、讨价还价或和解，这让我想起了过去生活中所遭受的侮辱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalOut_0000CA50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My former wife humiliated me... carped and nagged... belittled... it took this transformation to shake me from my stupor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的前妻羞辱了我...吹毛求疵，唠叨不休...贬低...这种转变使我从昏迷中清醒过来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalOut_0000CA50_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never again. The spoils go to the victor, and I've won. Walker is dead and I'm not. I have no quarrel with you... not yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再也不会了。战利品归胜者，我赢了，沃克死了，我还活着。我和你没有矛盾...还没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalOut_0000CA50_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you doing this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要这么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm an academic!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我是个学者！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalOut_0000CD8D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The first thing I'm cutting off is your lying tongue. Then I start between your legs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要切掉的第一件东西就是你说谎的舌头，然后我从你两腿之间开始。
