ESP.ORIGINAL: A wise choice. This concludes our business. If I see you again... well, I'll assume the worst and start shooting. You understand. Farewell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明智的选择，我们的生意到此结束。如果我再见到你...那我就做最坏的打算，然后开枪，你理解的。再见了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalOut_0000CD8A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give him the caps.> I'm not going to fight you over caps, Lee.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给他瓶盖>我不会和你争瓶盖的，李。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我会的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalOut_0000CD8B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack.> You want the caps? Come and take them.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>你想要瓶盖？来拿吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks to the Courier's involvement, the journey to avenge Walker's wife and recover the stolen caps was concluded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多亏了邮差的参与，为沃克的妻子报仇并找回被劫瓶盖的旅程结束了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleUniqueNarrator\aaSGFNEndi_aaSGFNEndingInt_0000D384_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before leaving Arrow Canyon, the Courier paused to reflect on the events that had unfolded... and pondered the consequences of his actions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在离开箭头峡谷之前，邮差停下来反思了一下发生的事情...并思考他的行为的后果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks to the Courier's involvement, the journey to avenge Walker's wife and recover the stolen caps was concluded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多亏了邮差的参与，为沃克的妻子报仇并找回被劫瓶盖的旅程结束了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleUniqueNarrator\aaSGFNEndi_aaSGFNEndingInt_0000D385_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before leaving Arrow Canyon, the Courier paused to reflect on the events that had unfolded... and pondered the consequences of her actions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在离开箭头峡谷之前，邮差停下来反思了一下发生的事情...并思考她的行为的后果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: During the walk back to the Mojave, the Courier took satisfaction in his accomplishments, but also believed that his greatest struggles lay ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在返回莫哈维的路上，邮差对自己的成就感到满意，但他也相信最大的挑战还在后面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleUniqueNarrator\aaSGFNEndi_aaSGFNEndingOut_0000D686_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And with that, the Courier walked out of Arrow Canyon and back to the Mojave Wasteland, where new challenges awaited him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样，邮差走出了箭头峡谷，回到了莫哈维废土，新的挑战在那里等着他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleUniqueNarrator\aaSGFNEndi_aaSGFNEndingOut_0000D686_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: During the walk back to the Mojave, the Courier took satisfaction in her accomplishments, but also believed that her greatest struggles lay ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在返回莫哈维的路上，邮差对自己的成就感到满意，但她也相信最大的挑战还在后面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleUniqueNarrator\aaSGFNEndi_aaSGFNEndingOut_0000D687_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And with that, the Courier walked out of Arrow Canyon and back to the Mojave Wasteland, where new challenges awaited her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样，邮差走出了箭头峡谷，回到了莫哈维废土，新的挑战在那里等着她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleUniqueNarrator\aaSGFNEndi_aaSGFNEndingOut_0000D687_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DEAD}Though many considered Jed's death justified, his wife's demise was widely considered to be an act of cold-blooded murder.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DEAD}尽管许多人认为杰德的死是正当的，但他妻子的死被普遍认为是一种冷血的谋杀行为。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleUniqueNarrator\aaSGFNEndi_aaSGFNEndingPhi_0000D393_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Accounts of Bethany's death would soon reach her family, the Vegas. Rumors swirled that a large posse was forming to avenge her death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 贝瑟妮的死讯很快传到了她在新维加斯的家人那里。谣言四起，说一支庞大的武装队伍正在组建，为她的死报仇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SPARED}Grateful for Walker's mercy, Jed and Bethany Phillips would leave the Mojave Wasteland and establish a small farm outside Prescott, Arizona.
ESP.TRADUIT: {SPARED}感谢沃克的仁慈，杰德和贝瑟妮·菲利普斯离开了莫哈维废土，在亚利桑那州普雷斯科特城外建立了一个小农场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleUniqueNarrator\aaSGFNEndi_aaSGFNEndingPhi_0000D394_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While their homestead initially thrived due to the peace and security provided by the Legion, Jed's good fortune soon ended.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然他们的家园最初因为军团的和平与安全而蓬勃发展，但杰德的好运很快就结束了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the local centurion demanded a number of their herd, Jed loudly scoffed at what he considered to be an unfair offer by the official.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当地的百夫长向他们索要牧群的数量时，杰德大声嘲笑这位官员的不公平出价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jed was summarily crucified and his entire family enslaved.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰德当场被钉死在十字架上，全家人都成了奴隶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: {FREESIDE}Ronaldo eagerly resumed his illicit activities in Freeside. He would ruthlessly employ violence and intimidation to expand his criminal empire.
ESP.TRADUIT: {FREESIDE}罗纳尔多急切地恢复了他在自由城的非法活动，他会无情的使用暴力和恐吓来扩张他的犯罪帝国。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleUniqueNarrator\aaSGFNEndi_aaSGFNEndingRon_0000D390_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In time, Ronaldo would corner a sizeable portion of the Freeside chem trade. However, his brutality would spur his enemies to conspire against him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着时间的推移，罗纳尔多将垄断自由城毒品交易的很大一部分。然而，他的残暴会刺激他的敌人密谋反对他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: In a dramatic twist, Ronaldo's subordinates would turn on him en masse and kill him in the very manner he so often utilized - by stabbing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个戏剧性的转折是，罗纳尔多的下属会集体背叛他，用他经常使用的方式——刺死了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: {BOUNTY}Taking the Courier's advice to heart, Ronaldo soon departed New Vegas and took up the bounty hunter trade.
ESP.TRADUIT: {BOUNTY}把邮差的建议牢记在心，罗纳尔多很快离开了新维加斯，开始了赏金猎人的生意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleUniqueNarrator\aaSGFNEndi_aaSGFNEndingRon_0000D391_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: His expertise with edged weapons would soon earn him the moniker of "The Knife". Unsurprisingly, Ronaldo rarely brought back his targets alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在锋利武器方面的专长很快为他赢得了“尖刀”的绰号。不出所料，罗纳尔多很少能活着救出他的目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually, Ronaldo drifted north into the Great Basin and was never seen again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终，罗纳尔多向北漂流到了大盆地，再也没有出现过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: {FOLLOWERS}Ronaldo reluctantly joined the Followers of the Apocalypse. While initially a lackluster pupil, he hit his stride when he discovered medicine.
ESP.TRADUIT: {FOLLOWERS}罗纳尔多不情愿的加入了天启追随者。起初，他只是一个平庸的学生，但当他发现医学后，他开始大放异彩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleUniqueNarrator\aaSGFNEndi_aaSGFNEndingRon_0000D392_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With an unquenchable thirst for knowledge about anatomy and a zeal for dissection, Ronaldo would eventually find his place as a surgeon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凭借对解剖学知识不可抑制的渴望和对解剖的热情，罗纳尔多最终找到了自己的位置，成为一名外科医生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: Short on empathy and long on expertise, he would go on to distinguish himself as the premiere trauma surgeon in the Followers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他缺乏同理心，却拥有丰富的专业知识，他后来成为了天启追随者中最出色的创伤外科医生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rats and feral children would soon descend upon Jimmy's corpse and pick it clean. His rancid flesh would sate the appetites of countless children.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老鼠和野孩子很快就会扑到吉米的尸体上，把它啃得干干净净。他那腐臭的肉体可以满足无数孩子的胃口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleOld01\aaSGFNEndi_aaSGFNEndingJim_0000D38C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, Jimmy's body was an unholy reservoir of chems and moonshine. Any man or beast that consumed his flesh was soon gripped by madness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，吉米的身体是一个邪恶的储物池，里面充满了化学物质和私酒。任何吃了他肉的人或野兽很快就会被疯狂攫住。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soon thereafter the Followers would begin treating an outbreak of endless babbling they dubbed, "The Jimmies."
ESP.TRADUIT: 此后不久，天启追随者们开始治疗他们称之为“吉米综合症”的无休止的胡言乱语。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jimmy continued raving at anyone within earshot until the Kings finally ejected him from Freeside. He then argued with himself outside the gate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吉米继续对任何听得见的人咆哮，直到猫王帮最终将他驱逐出自由城。然后他在大门外自言自语。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleUniqueNarrator\aaSGFNEndi_aaSGFNEndingJim_0000D38D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soon thereafter, Jimmy vanished. His disappearance coincided with sightings of strange lights north of town. His exact fate remains unknown.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不久之后，吉米消失了。他失踪的同时，有人在城镇北部看到了奇怪的灯光。他的确切命运仍然未知。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DEAD}Though Sam's time at Jacobstown had been brief, he had already developed strong bonds of friendship with his fellow supermutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DEAD}尽管山姆在雅各布斯镇的时间很短，但他已经和他的超级变种人伙伴建立起了牢固的友谊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: After burying his remains, they would mourn his passing with a small service, with the eulogy delivered in French. Several observers wept.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在埋葬了他的遗体后，他们会举行一个小型的仪式来哀悼他的去世，悼词用法语发表。几个旁观者流下了眼泪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: {ALIVE}Sam and Peter merrily bounded across the high deserts of the Great Basin, stealthily "recovering" artifacts and antiquities at multiple sites.
ESP.TRADUIT: {ALIVE}山姆和彼得愉快的在大盆地的高原沙漠中跳跃，在多个地点偷偷“回收”文物和古董。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleUniqueNarrator\aaSGFNEndi_aaSGFNEndingSam_0000D397_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: During his travels, Sam was pleased to hear of the Courier's new adventures. He smiled at accounts of strange companions and distant journeys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在他的旅行中，山姆很高兴听到邮差的新冒险。他对着那些陌生的同伴和遥远的旅行的故事笑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wars in the Sonoran desert, raids into Arizona, grand battles to defend towns, flying saucers... all these rumors piqued his interest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 索诺兰沙漠的战争、对亚利桑那州的突袭、保卫城镇的大战、飞碟...所有这些传言都引起了他的兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unsure what could be fact or exaggeration, he only hoped that the Courier remained safe, happy and grounded in a code of honor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不知道哪些是事实，哪些是夸张，他只希望邮差能保持安全、快乐，并恪守荣誉准则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not long after, Sam and Peter were last seen crossing into the territory of Requin, the most feared warlord of the Great Basin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不久之后，山姆和彼得最后一次被看到出现在大盆地最可怕的军阀鲛鲨的领地上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: {FOLLOWERS}With his head held low, Lee would quietly re-enter service in the Followers of the Apocalypse. However, he would soon find fulfillment as a teacher.
ESP.TRADUIT: {FOLLOWERS}李会低着头，安静的重新加入天启追随者。然而，他很快就找到了当老师的成就感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleUniqueNarrator\aaSGFNEndi_aaSGFNEndingLee_0000D399_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Working side-by-side with Anne, Lee would come to relish his role as a professor of Classics. In time, his wanderlust and greed would fade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与安妮并肩工作，李会慢慢享受他作为古典学教授的角色。随着时间的推移，他的流浪欲望和贪婪会逐渐消退。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: For the first time in his life, Lee found himself truly happy. He hoped to see the Courier again, if only to extend his heartfelt thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是他人生中第一次感到真正的幸福。他希望能再见到邮差，哪怕只是表达他衷心的感谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: When he heard the stories of the Courier's travels and travails, he was jealous for a fleeting moment, then locked eyes with Anne.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当他听到邮差的旅行和艰辛的故事时，他嫉妒了短暂的一瞬间，然后与安妮对视。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lee would smile and put the thoughts aside. He had found love and purpose, and that was enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李会微笑着把这些想法放在一边。他找到了爱和目标，这就足够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: {TEXAS}Taking the Courier's advice to heart, Lee turned east after departing Arrow Canyon. He had made up his mind to reach a strange, unknown land: Texas.
ESP.TRADUIT: {TEXAS}李把邮差的建议牢记在心，离开箭头峡谷后转向东方。他已经下定决心去一个陌生的、未知的地方：德克萨斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleUniqueNarrator\aaSGFNEndi_aaSGFNEndingLee_0000D39A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: During his trip through Legion territory, Lee chuckled at the stories of the Courier's exploits that trickled through the caravan lines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在穿越军团领地的旅途中，李听到了在商队中流传的邮差事迹，不禁暗自发笑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was last seen crossing out of Legion territory somewhere near Cloudcroft. Caravaneers claimed he was headed for Fort Davis, Texas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他最后一次被人看见是在克劳德克罗夫特附近穿越军团的领地。商队的人声称他要去德克萨斯州的戴维斯堡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: {OUTLAW}With a pocketful of caps and newfound pride from his recent victory, Lee set out for the Great Basin, determined to make his mark as an outlaw.
ESP.TRADUIT: {OUTLAW}带着一口袋瓶盖和新近胜利带来的自豪感，李出发前往大盆地，决心以亡命之徒的身份留下自己的印记。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleUniqueNarrator\aaSGFNEndi_aaSGFNEndingLee_0000D96E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He soon assembled a motley assortment of rogues and hired guns to assist him in his efforts. He was on the verge of becoming a true warlord.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他很快就召集了一群形形色色的流氓，并雇佣了一些枪手来协助他的行动。他即将成为一个真正的军阀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, he soon ran afoul of El Reloj in a territorial dispute. In what was supposed to be a peaceful parley, Lee insulted the veteran bandito.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，他很快就在领土争端中与埃尔雷诺发生了冲突。在一场本应和平的谈判中，李侮辱了这位老强盗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before Lee could touch his pistol, El Reloj drew and shot him between the eyes. His body would be unceremoniously dumped in a ditch and burned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李还没来得及触碰他的手枪，埃尔雷诺就拔出枪，射中了他的眉心。他的尸体会被随意的扔进沟里烧掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DEAD}Lee would die forgotten, outside a handful of Followers who remembered him in his former life.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DEAD}李死后将被遗忘，除了少数记得他前世的天启追随者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DEAD}In time, his bloated corpse would serve as fodder for the burgeoning swarm of insects inside Arrow Canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DEAD}随着时间的推移，他膨胀的尸体将成为箭头峡谷内迅速壮大的昆虫群的饲料。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DEAD}Word of Walker's death would eventually reach his estranged daughter. Though conflicted, she acknowledged his effort to avenge her mother.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DEAD}沃克去世的消息最终传到了与他关系疏远的女儿那里。尽管她很矛盾，但她承认他为母亲报仇的努力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleUniqueNarrator\aaSGFNEndi_aaSGFNEndingWal_0000D39B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She would hold a small memorial service for Walker, then erect a tombstone next to her mother's grave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她将为沃克举行一个小型的追悼会，然后在她母亲的墓旁立一座墓碑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: {GENERIC INTRO}Walker would make the long trek back to Silver Springs, carefully safeguarding the bank haul every step of the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: {GENERIC INTRO}沃克长途跋涉回到银泉镇，一路上小心翼翼的保护着银行的货物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleUniqueNarrator\aaSGFNEndi_aaSGFNEndingWal_0000D39C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Many of the townspeople were stunned at his appearance; they were positively shocked at the return of most of the stolen caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 许多镇上的人看到他的出现都惊呆了，他们对大部分失窃的瓶盖都被归还感到非常震惊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: Several of the town leaders extended an opportunity for Walker to return as acting sheriff, but he politely refused.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几位镇领导给了沃克一个机会，让他重新担任代理治安官，但他礼貌的拒绝了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SUICIDE}Instead, he strolled over to his wife's grave, drew his pistol and shot himself. He would be buried with full honors beside her.
ESP.TRADUIT: {SUICIDE}相反，他走到妻子的墓前，拔出手枪饮弹自尽。他将以最隆重的礼仪被安葬在妻子身边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SHERIFF}Instead, Walker began serving as sheriff in the remote mining town of Rochester. There he upheld the law without succumbing to anger.
ESP.TRADUIT: {SHERIFF}相反，沃克开始在偏远的采矿小镇罗切斯特担任治安官。在那里，他维护了法律，没有屈服于愤怒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: The townspeople would grow to admire their sheriff and dismiss stories of his past brutality. Raiders would still avoid the town, however.
ESP.TRADUIT: 镇上的人会逐渐钦佩他们的治安官，并对他过去的暴行不予理会。然而，掠夺者仍然会避开这个城镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: {BOUNTY}Instead, he headed south and took up the bounty hunting trade. He would pride himself on bringing most of his marks in alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: {BOUNTY}相反，他南下从事赏金狩猎生意，他会为自己把大部分的目标都活着带回来而感到自豪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some time later he went south in search of the mutant Ares, reputed to be active in the Altar Desert. Walker was never seen again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一段时间后，他前往南方寻找变种人阿瑞斯，据说他活跃在阿尔塔沙漠。沃克再也没有出现过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: {FAMILY}Instead, Walker sought out his estranged daughter. When he knocked, his grandson would answer the door, prompting Walker to break down in tears.
ESP.TRADUIT: {FAMILY}相反，沃克找到了他疏远的女儿。当他敲门时，他的孙子给他开了门，这让沃克潸然泪下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: He would soon reconcile with his daughter and live out his days as a bailiff, content to mentor his grandson and keep his family safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他很快就与女儿和解，并以法警的身份度过余生，满足于指导他的孙子，保护他的家庭安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: Depopulated and dilapidated, Arrow Canyon was soon visited by another predatory swarm of Dog Pecker Flies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于人口稀少和破败不堪，箭谷很快就被另一群掠食性的啄狗蝇造访。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleUniqueNarrator\aaSGFNEndi_aaSGFNEndingArr_0000D395_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without the strong leadership of Bodeen or Roy Bee to oppose them, the rapacious insects set about infesting every corner of the canyon at will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有了博丁和罗伊·比强有力的领导，这些贪婪的昆虫开始随意侵扰峡谷的每一个角落。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: The flies would flourish in the canyon, and periodically great swarms would spring forth and terrorize neighboring towns and highways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 苍蝇会在峡谷里大量繁殖，成群结队的苍蝇会周期性地涌现出来，威胁到邻近的城镇和高速公路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: In time, travellers would refer to the site as "Dog Pecker Canyon" out of recognition for the insects' mastery of the location.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着时间的推移，由于昆虫对这个地方的掌控，旅行者们会把这里称为“啄狗峡谷”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey from Finance [0300CDA2] (mod) Quest : ([0300CD37]aaSGFNEnding) Endling Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then that wraps up this grand misadventure. Too bad for Walker, but good for us, right? Don't spend your half too quickly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么这场大灾难就告一段落了。对沃克来说很糟糕，但对我们来说是好事，对吧？不要太快花掉你的那一半。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalSpl_0000D388_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... will be out of sight and out of mind. Lot of dead bodies in your future, if I were a betting man. Pardon me if I keep my distance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...就眼不见心不烦了。如果要我打赌的话，你的未来会有很多尸体，请原谅我和你保持距离。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalSpl_0000D388_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalSpl_0000D388_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That works for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这对我很有用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You rat fuck. All right... see if you can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个鼠辈。好吧...看看你能不能做到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNLeeFinalSpl_0000D389_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack.> Wrong. I'm taking it all.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>错了，我全都要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, a David! I remember selling this to him. Well, he won't be needing it now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，大卫！我记得我卖给他这个，他现在不需要了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamDavidP_0000DC71_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I know this director! A real pioneer in the "Singing, homicidal cowboy" style. Lots of fatalities on set. Filmmaking is a dangerous business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我知道这个导演！他是"唱歌，杀人牛仔"风格的真正先驱。他的片场有很多死亡事件，电影制作是一个危险的行业。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamPoster_0000DC73_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that's a leader I'd follow to the ends of the earth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这才是我愿意追随到天涯海角的领袖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamPoster_0000F28B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I find that forgiving yourself for your own mistakes is the hardest act in life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现原谅自己的错误是人生中最难的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamPoster_0000F28C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A short film, so I hear. A simple delivery job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说是一部短片，一个简单的送货工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamPoster_0000F28D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's nothing more repugnant than a fence-sitter. We all have to pick sides at some point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有什么比中立者更让人讨厌的了。在某些时候，我们都必须选边站。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamPoster_0000F28E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If war is hell then war in the desert is a special hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果说战争是地狱，那么沙漠战争就是一个特别的地狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamPoster_0000F28F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha! So that's what the Enclave thinks of us! "Yes, humans, we carry bayonets stained with infant blood. We will eat your babies!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！原来英克雷的人是这么看我们的！“是的，人类，我们带着沾满婴儿鲜血的刺刀，我们要吃掉你们的孩子！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamPoster_0000F299_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It saddens me to think America's legacy is reduced to the Enclave. All the trappings and symbols but none of the dignity or freedom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想到美国的遗产只剩下英克雷，我感到很难过。所有的装饰和象征，却没有尊严和自由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamPoster_0000F299_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They just need better leadership... like George Washington. I had the pleasure of speaking with him once in Utah. Never met a nobler hound.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们只是需要更好的领导...比如乔治·华盛顿。我曾有幸在犹他州与他交谈过一次。从没见过比他更高贵的猎犬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamPoster_0000F299_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Delivery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 交付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [0300DC74] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult03\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNSamCourie_0000DC76_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thought you could get away with it, didn't you? Killing my sister in cold blood. Bethany didn't deserve that. She was the best of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为你能逃脱惩罚，是吗？冷血的杀害了我的妹妹，贝瑟妮不应该这样，她是我们当中最好的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Vega [0300DC7C] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNAdamVegaC_0000DC7F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never approved of her running off with that dipshit, but he made her happy. Good enough for me. You had no right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从不赞成她和那个混蛋私奔，但他让她很开心，对我来说已经足够了。你没有这个权利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Vega [0300DC7C] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNAdamVegaC_0000DC7F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't survive three tours to have my kid sister gunned down like a rat by some wandering, fuckboot mailman. Die in fear and pain, cocksucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我好不容易熬过了三次出征，我的妹妹就像老鼠一样被一个流浪的快递员枪杀了。在恐惧和痛苦中死去吧，王八蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Vega [0300DC7C] (mod) Quest : ([03000E0F]aaSGFNMisc) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFNMisc_aaSGFNAdamVegaC_0000DC7F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cocksure and steadfast, I like it. Yeah, it was right. Wasn't necessarily clean, but we settled it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自信而坚定，我喜欢。嗯，没错，虽然不是很干净，但我们解决了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerRight_0000DCC1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seen a lot of evil men get away with it, live out lives in peace and abundance... I'd like to think we pushed the scales back towards justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到很多恶人逍遥法外，过着平静富足的生活...我觉得我们把天平向正义的方向推了回去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerRight_0000DCC1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Absolutely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 绝对。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It always comes down to that, doesn't it? I didn't expect to survive, honestly. Still... well, still dealing with it. Strange feeling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事情总是这样，不是吗？说实话，我没指望能活下来。不过...嗯，还在处理，奇怪的感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerRight_0000DCC2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad it's done, but I don't revel in it. No celebration. Just... did our duty. Wish it could've been cleaner, but it's an imperfect world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴结束了，但我并不为此陶醉，没有庆祝，只是...尽了我们的责任。真希望它能更干净，但这是个不完美的世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerRight_0000DCC2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was him or us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是他就是我们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any one of them would've faced a trial in NCR. I guess that's what gives me pause... knowing we bypassed due process and the rest of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们中的任何一个人都会在NCR面临审判。我想这就是让我犹豫的原因...知道我们绕过了正当的程序。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerRight_0000DCC3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad it's done, but I don't revel in it. No celebration. Just... did our duty. Wish it could've been cleaner, but it's an imperfect world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴结束了，但我并不为此陶醉，没有庆祝，只是...尽了我们的责任。真希望它能更干净，但这是个不完美的世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerRight_0000DCC3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a little late for second thoughts since we just wiped out the entire town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在再考虑有点晚了，因为我们刚刚摧毁了整个小镇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yep. Make a decision and stick with it, see it through to the brutal finish. We settled the score. Now we just got to live with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。做出一个决定并坚持下去，直到残酷的结局。我们讨回了公道，现在我们只能接受现实了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Walker [03000AE0] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleAdult08\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNWalkerRight_0000DCC0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A man oughta do what he thinks is best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个人应该做他认为最好的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll get you taken care of. Just stand still...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会照顾好你的。站着别动...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_aaSGFNDocTylerH_0000E2EC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Pay 50 caps.> Patch me up, doc.
ESP.TRADUIT: <支付50瓶盖>给我包扎一下，医生。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course. How can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然可以。我如何帮助你？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_aaSGFNDocTylerN_0000E2E9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need medical treatment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要治疗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's what I have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_aaSGFNDocTylerB_0000E6A0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to buy some medical supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想买一些医疗用品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's what I have. Full discount, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我的。当然是全额折扣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_aaSGFNDocTylerB_0000E6A1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to buy some medical supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想买一些医疗用品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It happens to the best of us. Just one moment and I'll get you cleaned up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使是最优秀的人也会遇到这种事。请稍等，我帮你清除一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_aaSGFNDocTylerC_0000E2EB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Pay 50 caps> I'd like for you to cure my addiction, please.
ESP.TRADUIT: <支付50瓶盖>我希望你能治好我的成瘾，拜托了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know the nausea is awful. We'll take care of that in a jiffy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道很恶心很难受，我们马上就会解决的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_aaSGFNDocTylerR_0000E2ED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Pay 50 caps> Can you take care of my radiation poisoning?
ESP.TRADUIT: <支付50瓶盖>你能治好我的辐射中毒吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sam... he's gone? That breaks my heart. I... I knew him in Reno. Good soul. A thief, yes... but had a pure heart in his chest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 山姆...他死了？这让我很伤心。我...我在里诺认识了他，善良的灵魂，小偷，是没错...但他有一颗纯洁的心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_aaSGFNDocTylerP_0000E2E1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We had some lean years up there in Reno, but we could always count on Sam to help see us through the tough times. Oh, that breaks my heart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在里诺度过了一些艰难的岁月，但我们总能指望山姆帮我们度过难关。噢，真让我伤心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_aaSGFNDocTylerP_0000E2E1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you mentioned a will... what did he leave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，你说有遗嘱...他留下了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_aaSGFNDocTylerP_0000E2E1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to let you know that Sam died. He left you some things in his will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想告诉你山姆死了，他在遗嘱里给你留了些东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I'm sorry. I'm easily distracted. It's just west of the Thorn. Should be open in less than a week. Please come visit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，对不起，我很容易分心。就在荆棘街的西边，不到一周就能开张了。请来参观。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_aaSGFNDocTylerP_0000E988_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where exactly are you building the clinic?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底要把诊所建在哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just got here from Reno. Wanted a change of scenery. This place has its challenges, but I think we can make a difference once the funding picks up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 刚从里诺过来，想换换环境。这个地方有很多挑战，但我认为一旦资金恢复我们就能有所作为。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_aaSGFNDocTylerB_0000E2E0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't seen you here before. What brings you to New Vegas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以前没在这儿见过你，什么风把你吹来新维加斯了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's just rotten. Crime is rampant, corruption everywhere. Even seeps into the Followers sometimes. I couldn't stand it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 简直烂透了，犯罪猖獗，腐败无处不在，有时甚至会渗透到天启追随者中。我受不了了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_aaSGFNDocTylerB_0000E2EA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got tired of losing friends and patients out in the Great Basin, too. It's a wilderness... just devours people, even the strong ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也厌倦了在大盆地失去朋友和病人。这是一片荒野...它会吞噬人，即使是强壮的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_aaSGFNDocTylerB_0000E2EA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: People are hopelessly naive about settling in wild places like that. Everything is against you... raiders, wild animals... even the weather.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们在那种荒无人烟的地方定居实在是太天真了。一切都对你不利...掠夺者，野兽...甚至是天气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_aaSGFNDocTylerB_0000E2EA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But it's the brutality more than anything... even the good people go bad when they get hungry. Yeah, I'm glad I left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但最重要的是暴行...即使是好人饿了也会变坏。嗯，我很高兴我离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_aaSGFNDocTylerB_0000E2EA_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why'd you want to leave Reno?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要离开里诺？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_aaSGFNDocTylerW_0000E2E4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind, let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了，我们聊点别的吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This... this is incredible! God bless you, Sam. I promise you it will be put to good use. We'll begin construction immediately!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这...太不可思议了！上帝保佑你，山姆，我向你保证，这笔钱会派上用场的。我们马上开始施工！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_aaSGFNDocTylerW_0000E2E5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was there anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有别的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_aaSGFNDocTylerW_0000E2E5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give 5,000 caps> Sam wanted the Followers to have this. It's his life savings.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给她5000瓶盖>山姆想把这个交给天启追随者，这是他毕生的积蓄。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This was one of Sam's favorites. A Rubens, of course. Never hurts to have the goddess of health on our side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是山姆的最爱之一，当然是鲁本斯的作品。有健康女神在身边总是好事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_aaSGFNDocTylerW_0000E2E8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for doing this. I know Sam thanks you, too. I hope to see you at the new clinic!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你做了这些，我知道山姆也会感谢你的。希望能在新诊所见到你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_aaSGFNDocTylerW_0000E2E8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give painting> He also wanted you to have this painting.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给她画>他还想把这幅画给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, that does it. We have the funding to finally get some real medical care in Westside. Thank you for doing this. I'm sure Sam thanks you, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，就这样，我们终于有资金让西区得到真正的医疗服务了。谢谢你这么做，我相信山姆也会感谢你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Tyler [0300DFEC] (mod) Quest : ([0300DFEF]aaSGFNDocTylerDialogue) Doc Tyler's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\FemaleAdult03\aaSGFNDocT_aaSGFNDocTylerP_0000E2E7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> No, that's everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>不，就这些了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then lay on, wretch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就躺下吧，无耻之徒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamIntroA_0000F28A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> I'm not here for conversation. Shall we?
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>我不是来聊天的。好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Because it's the first thing I bite," the dog says. In a flash, he rips off the adventurer's scrotum. A geyser of blood erupts.
ESP.TRADUIT: “因为这是我咬的第一个东西，”狗说。一瞬间，他扯下了冒险家的阴囊，鲜血喷涌而出。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: The adventurer slumps over in shock and screams in agony. The townspeople dance and scream, "Hail Satan!" The adventurer perishes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冒险家震惊的瘫倒在地，痛苦地尖叫起来。镇上的人们一边跳舞一边尖叫：“撒旦万岁！”冒险家完蛋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: The hell hound is sated... temporarily. They say he still walks the wastes, always searching for a fresh sacrifice. Only two items will satisfy him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 地狱之犬吃饱了...暂时的。据说它还在废土上游荡，总是在寻找新的祭品，只有两样东西能使它满意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: A knife... preferably with blood on it... or warm testicles torn from a living body. Beware of strange dogs. Beware... of Balls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一把刀...最好是带着血的...或者从活人身上撕下来的温暖睾丸。小心陌生的狗，小心...你的蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: The end. Good night, everyone. Sweet dreams!
ESP.TRADUIT: 结束。各位晚安，做个好梦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was hoping for something simple like The Golden Arm, but you had to conjure up images of Satan in canine form. Wait, what was that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本来希望是像金臂人这样简单的东西，但你必须想象出撒旦以狗的形式出现。等等，那是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lee [03000AE1] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaSGFN01) Seven Graves From Now EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSGFN01_aaSGFNGhostStory_00006555_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's frightening Peter. He suffers from anxiety... I don't want to exacerbate his condition. Besides, it's a grisly tale, not fit for the young.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太吓人了，彼得，他患有焦虑症...我不想让他的病情恶化。再说，这是个恐怖的故事，不适合年轻人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamFinish_0001013F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why didn't you finish your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不把故事讲完？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, all right. I'll try not to butcher the conclusion. Nothing worse than a lackluster final act.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好吧。我会尽量不把结局弄得太草率，没有什么比平淡无奇的最后一幕更糟糕的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamFinish_00010719_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we'd all like to hear the ending.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我们都想听听结局。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, then I'll trust you. Stay strong, Peter. The world is full of horrors and you must learn to face them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，那我就相信你了。要坚强，彼得，这个世界充满了恐怖，你必须学会面对它们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamFinish_00010718_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A story like this could help Peter develop resiliency.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样的故事可以帮助彼得培养韧性。

ESP.ORIGINAL: At once!
ESP.TRADUIT: 马上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamFinish_00010715_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fear can be instructive. Finish the story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐惧是有益的，把故事讲完。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. Yes, I'll finish the puppy story for you. Listen closely!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。好的，我会给你讲完小狗的故事。听好了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamFinish_00010717_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Want puppy story!
ESP.TRADUIT: 想听小狗故事！

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Fearful Whimper>
ESP.TRADUIT: <害怕的呜咽>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peter [03003EC5] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\VoiceDoNotRecordF\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNPeterWhim_0001042A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Fearful Whimper>
ESP.TRADUIT: <害怕的呜咽>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peter [03003EC5] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\VoiceDoNotRecordF\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNPeterWhim_0001042B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Fearful Whimper>
ESP.TRADUIT: <害怕的呜咽>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peter [03003EC5] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\VoiceDoNotRecordF\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNPeterWhim_0001042C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On behalf of Peter, thank you. Sleep well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我代表彼得谢谢你。睡个好觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [03003EC3] (mod) Quest : ([03003EC6]aaSGFNSamDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\SevenGravesFromNow.esm\aaSGFNSamVoiceType\aaSGFNSamD_aaSGFNSamFinish_00010716_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. We'll finish the story another time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对，我们下次再把这个故事讲完。

ESP.TRADUIT: 前往箭头峡谷

ESP.TRADUIT: 再见，李

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Beauty will save the world."
ESP.TRADUIT: “美丽将拯救世界。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: "The Wild still lingered in him and the wolf in him merely slept."
ESP.TRADUIT: "荒野仍在他心中徘徊，狼在他心中沉睡。"

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Without Sam's guidance, your party takes several days to reach the outskirts of Arrow Canyon. Your companions arrive exhausted, and will not be in peak condition for the coming fight.
Before making your approach, you elect to camp in a narrow gorge some distance from the canyon entrance. This is an opportune moment to confer with the other party members before the final confrontation with Bodeen.
ESP.TRADUIT:
没有山姆的指引，你的队伍要花好几天才能到达箭头峡谷的外围。你的同伴们到达时已经疲惫不堪，在即将到来的战斗中不会处于最佳状态。
在你接近之前，你选择在距离峡谷入口一段距离的狭窄峡谷中露营。这是在与博丁进行最后对决之前，与其他成员进行商议的最佳时机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Campsite
ESP.TRADUIT: 营地

ESP.ORIGINAL: Walker takes a breath and then instructs Jed to leave. The Phillips soon make a hasty departure out of view. It is uncertain if your paths will cross again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃克吸了一口气，然后命令杰德离开。菲利普斯一家很快就匆匆离开了，不知道你们是否会再次相遇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mercy
ESP.TRADUIT: 宽恕

ESP.ORIGINAL: "There is no hunting like the hunting of man, and those who have hunted armed men long enough and liked it, never care for anything else thereafter."
ESP.TRADUIT: “没有哪种狩猎像人类的狩猎，那些武装的狩猎者一直乐此不疲，却从来也不在乎其他的事。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: After waiting quietly for several hours, you notice a group of Powder Gangers creeping towards the ambush site.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在安静的等待了几个小时后，你注意到一群炸药帮正在向伏击地点爬行。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
First in raids, first in building bridges and first in destroying bugs.
As a leader, he bridged a gap between distant communities and led the way in building new infrastructure.
As a warrior, he crushed our enemies, drove them before us and laughed at the lamentations of their women.
As a mayor, he bravely led the fight against the marauding swarm of Dog Pecker Flies which almost destroyed our beloved town. Though he perished in the effort, Arrow Canyon endures and is buoyed by his indomitable spirit.
Dedicated in 2279.
ESP.TRADUIT:
他是突袭第一人、架桥第一人、消灭虫子第一人。
作为领导者，他在遥远的社区之间架起了桥梁，并带头建设新的基础设施。
作为一名战士，他击溃了我们的敌人，把他们赶到我们面前，并嘲笑他们女人的悲鸣。
作为一名市长，他勇敢地领导了与啄狗蝇的斗争，因为它们几乎摧毁了我们心爱的小镇。虽然他在战斗中牺牲了，但箭头峡谷在他不屈不挠的精神鼓舞下得以延续。
于2279年建成。

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Roy Bee, Founder."
ESP.TRADUIT: “罗伊·比，创始人。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lee collects his share and quietly strolls toward the exit of Arrow Canyon. Near the canyon's end he turns around and delivers a half-hearted wave. Soon after he disappears into the shadowy narrows of a gorge. It is uncertain if your paths will cross again in the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李拿起他的那份，悄悄的走向箭头峡谷的出口。在峡谷的尽头，他转过身来，漫不经心地挥了挥手，不久，他消失在阴暗狭窄的峡谷中。未来你们的道路是否会再次交叉是不确定的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Farewell
ESP.TRADUIT: 告别

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rumors reach you that a gruff man at the Mojave Outpost is seeking to hire an experienced guide for the region. His appearance is supposedly connected to the recent bank robbery in Silver Springs. Speak to Walker to learn details of the job offer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说莫哈维前哨有个脾气暴躁的人想要为该地区聘请一位经验丰富的导游，据说他的出现与最近银泉的银行抢劫案有关。和沃克谈谈，了解这份工作的细节。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seven Graves From Now
ESP.TRADUIT: 七寇墓碑记

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Every trail has its end, and every calamity brings a lesson."
ESP.TRADUIT: “每条路都有尽头，每一场灾难都会带来教训。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Deserve‘s got nothin‘ to do with it."
ESP.TRADUIT: “这与值不值得无关。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Guard against the impostures of pretended patriotism."
ESP.TRADUIT: “谨防虚伪的爱国主义。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
After a night of restless sleep, you stir before dawn and gather your belongings. You and your fellow travellers swiftly make your way through the gorge into Arrow Canyon.
Walker peers over a nearby ridge with binoculars and then returns with a grim expression on his face. He reports that the site is occupied by a large number of well-armed raiders. You are in for a lengthy fight.
ESP.TRADUIT:
经过一夜的不安的睡眠，你在黎明前起床，收拾你的东西。你和你的同伴们迅速穿过峡谷进入箭头峡谷。
沃克用双筒望远镜望着附近的山脊，然后带着一副严峻的表情回来了。他报告说，该地点被大量装备精良的突袭者占领。你将面临一场漫长的战斗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Arrow Canyon
ESP.TRADUIT: 箭头峡谷

ESP.ORIGINAL: The skull of Big Nasty, Roy's arch-enemy. Roy bested his nemesis in single combat, finishing him with a fork through the eye socket.
ESP.TRADUIT: 罗伊的死敌，大流氓的头骨。罗伊在一场单枪匹马的战斗中击败了他的宿敌，用叉子刺穿了他的眼窝。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Skull of Big Nasty
ESP.TRADUIT: 大流氓的头骨

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Let your plans be dark and impenetrable as night, and when you move, fall like a thunderbolt."
ESP.TRADUIT: “难知如阴，动如雷霆。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Cram."
ESP.TRADUIT: "午餐肉。"

ESP.ORIGINAL: Walker stuffs the bulk of the caps into his duffle and then slowly climbs up the northern cliffs. He pauses to recover near the top of the ascent. After catching his breath, he looks back and gives you a subtle nod. Soon thereafter he disappears over the ridgeline. It is uncertain if your paths will cross again in the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃克把大部分瓶盖塞进他的行李袋，然后慢慢爬上北部的悬崖。他在接近山顶的地方停下来恢复体力，他喘了口气，回过头来，对你微微点了点头。不久之后，他消失在山脊线上。你们的道路是否会在未来再次交叉是不确定的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Farewell
ESP.TRADUIT: 告别

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slide 01
ESP.TRADUIT: 幻灯片 01

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slide 02
ESP.TRADUIT: 幻灯片 02

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slide 03
ESP.TRADUIT: 幻灯片 03

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slide 04
ESP.TRADUIT: 幻灯片 04

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slide 05
ESP.TRADUIT: 幻灯片 05

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slide 06
ESP.TRADUIT: 幻灯片 06

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slide 07
ESP.TRADUIT: 幻灯片 07

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slide 08
ESP.TRADUIT: 幻灯片 08

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slide 09
ESP.TRADUIT: 幻灯片 09

ESP.ORIGINAL: A preserved Dog Pecker Fly specimen. A swarm of these menacing insects attacked Arrow Canyon in 2279. Roy perished while personally leading the fight against this threat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保存完好的啄狗蝇标本。2279年，一群凶猛的昆虫袭击了箭头峡谷，罗伊在亲自领导抗击这种威胁的过程中牺牲了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog Pecker Fly
ESP.TRADUIT: 啄狗蝇

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Narrator catches his breath...
ESP.TRADUIT: 叙述者屏住了呼吸...

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Narrator moves on...
ESP.TRADUIT: 叙述者继续...

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Hunger is good discipline."
ESP.TRADUIT: “饥饿是可贵的锻炼。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: "You must pay for everything in this world, one way or another. There is nothing free, except the grace of God."
ESP.TRADUIT: “世界上所有的东西都是有代价的，不管是什么。没有免费的午餐，除了上帝的恩典。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: "A leader is a dealer in hope."
ESP.TRADUIT: “领袖就是贩卖希望的商人。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: "The only way we can redeem our past is by suffering."
ESP.TRADUIT: "我们救赎过去的唯一方法就是受苦。"

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bugslayer, Roy's weapon of choice. Before he stood agains the Dog Pecker Flies, Roy made his reputation by crushing the great ant swarms of 2273 and 2275. When Roy wielded this tomahawk, no bug was safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀虫者，罗伊的首选武器。在他对抗啄狗蝇之前，罗伊以2273年和2275年粉碎大蚁群而闻名。当罗伊挥舞这把战斧时，没有一只虫子是安全的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bugslayer
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀虫者

ESP.ORIGINAL: "What a man knows isn’t important. It’s what he is that counts."
ESP.TRADUIT: “一个人知道什么并不重要，重要的是他是什么。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Too weird to live, too rare to die!"
ESP.TRADUIT: "活着太奇怪，死得太稀奇！"

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Happy families are all alike; every unhappy family is unhappy in its own way."
ESP.TRADUIT: "幸福的家庭总是相似的，而不幸的家庭则各有各的不幸。"

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Your ride's over, mutie. Time to die."
ESP.TRADUIT: "你的旅程结束了，变种人。该去死了。"

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're watching you...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们在看着你...

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Thanks to Sam's guidance, your party quickly reaches the outskirts of Arrow Canyon. Your travelling companions are well-rested and in high spirits. They should be in fine form for the coming fight.
Before making your approach, you elect to camp in a narrow gorge some distance from the canyon entrance. This is an opportune moment to confer with the other party members before the final confrontation with Bodeen.
ESP.TRADUIT:
在山姆的指引下，你的队伍迅速到达了箭头峡谷的外围。你的旅伴们休息得很好，精神抖擞，他们应该能在接下来的战斗中保持良好的状态。
在你接近之前，你选择在距离峡谷入口一段距离的狭窄峡谷中露营。这是在与博丁进行最后对决之前，与其他成员进行商议的最佳时机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Campsite
ESP.TRADUIT: 营地

ESP.ORIGINAL: "There are worse things than killing men, Bayard. There are worse things than being killed."
ESP.TRADUIT: "有比杀人更糟糕的事，贝亚德。还有比被杀更糟糕的事。"

ESP.ORIGINAL: Arrow Canyon is a distant location north of the Mojave Wasteland. Food, ammunition and water may be scarce during your journey. This will be a one-way trip until your mission is complete. Do you wish to continue?
ESP.TRADUIT: 箭头峡谷位于莫哈维废土北部的一个遥远的地方。在你的旅途中，食物、弹药和水可能会短缺。在你完成任务之前，这将是一次单程旅行。你希望继续吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Long Journey
ESP.TRADUIT: 漫长的旅程

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remain in the Mojave Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 留在莫哈维废土。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Travel to Arrow Canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往箭头峡谷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This path leads from Arrow Canyon back to the Mojave Wasteland. You are confident that you'll never return here. Are you sure you want to leave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这条小路从箭头峡谷通向莫哈维废土，你确信自己再也不会回到这里了。你确定要离开吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Door to the Mojave Wasteland
ESP.TRADUIT: 通往莫哈维废土的门

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remain in Arrow Canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 留在箭头峡谷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to the Mojave Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到莫哈维废土。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Skip the slideshow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跳过幻灯片。

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Taking a new step, uttering a new word, is what people fear most."
ESP.TRADUIT: "迈出新的一步，说出一个新的单词，是人们最害怕的。"

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sam activates his Stealth Boy and swiftly bounds away with Peter in tow. It is uncertain if your paths will cross again in the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 山姆启动了他的隐身小子，拖着彼得飞快地跑开了。你们的道路是否会在未来再次交叉是不确定的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Au Revoir
ESP.TRADUIT: 再会了

ESP.ORIGINAL:
THIS SUMMER... Albert Breach, in association with John Goodman, proudly presents a tale of daring, destruction and rebirth... BEGINNING OF THE END!
Steel your senses for an epic display of adventure, romance and revenge! Terrible, new enemies will manifest! Long-lost companions will walk great distances and re-emerge! Calamity will loom and the apocalypse will seem all but assured... until the intrepid intervention of our hero! World-shattering battles! Feral Children! Singing Cannibals! All this and more await you in BEGINNING OF THE END! Will it prove to be the end - or just the beginning of something new? Tune in to find out!
DISCLAIMER: Consult your physician before viewing "Beginning of the End." Side effects may include sobreity.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这个夏天，阿尔伯特·布雷奇与约翰·古德曼联手，隆重推出一个关于大胆、毁灭和重生的故事...结束的开始！
让你的感官沉浸在史诗般的冒险、浪漫和复仇之中！可怕的新敌人将会出现！失散多年的同伴将长途跋涉，重新出现！灾难迫在眉睫，世界末日似乎已成定局...直到我们的英雄无畏地介入！震惊世界的战斗！野孩子！会唱歌的食人族！所有这一切，还有更多，都将在结束的开始中等待着您！这将是终结，还是新的开始？别换频道，我们一探究竟！
免责声明：观看结束的开始之前，请咨询您的医生。副作用可能包括戒酒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beginning of the End!
ESP.TRADUIT: 结束的开始！

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Nothing is written."
ESP.TRADUIT: "事在人为。"

ESP.ORIGINAL: "You cannot be disciplined in great things and undisciplined in small things."
ESP.TRADUIT: "你不可能在大事上自律而在小事上不自律。"

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The crumpled paper bears a hastily-written message:
"New shop is up and running by the Northern Passage. No one - and I mean no one - gets in if you don't escort them. Exceptions for traders, provided they bring live children. Remember to mention the bonus for redheads. The big guy always pays extra.
- Fowler"
ESP.TRADUIT:
皱巴巴的纸上潦草地写着一句话：
“北部通道附近有一家新店开业了。如果你不护送，没有人...我是说没有任何人...能进去。对商人来说是例外，只要他们带着活的孩子。记得提一下红头发的奖金，那个大块头总是付额外的钱。“
- 福勒

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Stand firm, then, and do not let yourselves be burdened again by a yoke of slavery."
ESP.TRADUIT: "所以要站立得稳，不要再被奴仆的轭挟制。"

ESP.ORIGINAL: "War is a racket."
ESP.TRADUIT: "战争是一场骗局。"

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boudreaux's Blackened Radroach
ESP.TRADUIT: 布德罗的熏制辐射蟑螂

ESP.ORIGINAL: Armfield's Slave Mart
ESP.TRADUIT: 阿姆菲尔德的奴隶市场

ESP.TRADUIT: 雷神之锤

ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈维前哨站兵营
